Learn how to automatically transfer New Lead Generations from HubSpot Forms to your Google Contacts

requirements: Basic knowledge in Marketing
courses.description:
Welcome to this Zapier Marketing Automation Course for Beginners.
This online course will introduce you to the concept of Marketing Automation via introduction to the Zapier Tool. Zapier is an award wining and revolutionary tool in the marketing automation space. Zapier helps you to quickly link the most commonly used web applications, making repetitive tasks simple to automate. It helps you to build automated tasks between different applications or the same ones. With Zapier, by creating automatic actions called Zaps, you can connect apps to speed up your lead generation process.
This latest and updated course trains you on the latest features within Zapier.
Who this course is for:
Marketers just starting off in marketing automation
Marketers who want to learn new skills and automate their lead generation process
Mid-career professionals who seek to break into a marketing automation career
College Grads who are interested to start their Marketing Automation career.
Senior marketers wishing to further develop their knowledge.
Jobseekers wishing to upskill in Marketing Automation and make themselves job market ready as the industry now speeds up hiring  professionals knowing marketing automation technology.
Remember , this Zapier marketing automation course will help you grow your business & save time.
In this course Kanishka has covered basic concepts and then proceeded in a step-by-step manner to more advanced concepts and have shown you practical demos on building single-stage Zaps , Multi-stage Zap and connecting Zapier to an email marketing system to automate your lead generation and nurturing process.
In summary,  in this Zapier marketing automation course, Kanishka has shown you how to set up an automation system like Zapier inside your business , so you can just focus on creating amazing marketing strategy to grow your business while Zapier takes care of the rest.
target_audience: Beginners
College Grads interested to kickstart their career in Marketing Automation
Small and Medium Scale Business Owners interested to explore Marketing Automation options to scale their lead generations
MBA - Marketing specialization students
Mid-Career marketing executives interested to learn Zapier Marketing Automation and implement in their organization

courses.title: Analytical Methods for Effective Data Analysis
courses.bio: Master data analytics and explore marketing, social media, predictive, and prescriptive analytics.
objectives: Analyze customer data using segmentation models for targeted marketing campaigns.
Implement Recency Frequency Monetary (RFM) models to optimize customer engagement.
Evaluate the success of social media campaigns by measuring brand mentions and sentiment.
Apply predictive analytics techniques to make informed predictions about future events.
Utilize prescriptive analytics to develop strategies for achieving specific business goals.
Create revenue optimization models to optimize profit through data-driven decisions.
Demonstrate an understanding of dynamic pricing and its role in revenue management.
Develop practical skills in setting up and utilizing sentiment analysis for text data.

Analytics Beginnings and Marketing Analy: WATCH ME: Essential Information for a Successful Training Experience

requirements: A basic understanding of data analytics is beneficial.
courses.description:
**This course includes downloadable exercise files to work with**


Welcome to Analytical Methods for Effective Data Analysis. This course is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of data analytics by breaking it down into four main components: marketing analytics, social media analytics, predictive analytics, and prescriptive analytics.


In this course, you will learn how these different types of analytics fit together seamlessly. We'll start by exploring the customer-centric world of marketing analytics, covering topics such as customer life cycles and various marketing models, including customer segmentation, acquisition, RFM, market basket analysis, and more. You'll discover how these models can help retain and engage customers effectively.


Moving on, we will dive into social media analytics, where you'll gain insights into measuring, collecting, and analyzing data from social media platforms. You'll also explore sentiment analysis, a crucial tool for understanding public opinions and sentiments expressed in textual content.


The course's third section focuses on predictive analytics, using statistics, machine learning, and data mining to predict future events. Additionally, we'll delve into prescriptive analytics, which guides decision-making by optimizing key metrics based on past performance and trends.


By the end of this course, you will possess the skills and knowledge needed to excel in the world of data analytics. Whether you're a marketing professional, business analyst, or anyone interested in harnessing the power of data, this course will help equip you with practical tools and insights to make informed decisions and drive success in your field. Don't miss this opportunity to master analytical methods for effective data analysis.


In this course, students will learn how to:
Analyze customer data using segmentation models for targeted marketing campaigns.
Implement Recency Frequency Monetary (RFM) models to optimize customer engagement.
Evaluate the success of social media campaigns by measuring brand mentions and sentiment.
Apply predictive analytics techniques to make informed predictions about future events.
Utilize prescriptive analytics to develop strategies for achieving specific business goals.
Create revenue optimization models to optimize profit through data-driven decisions.
Demonstrate an understanding of dynamic pricing and its role in revenue management.
Develop practical skills in setting up and utilizing sentiment analysis for text data.


This course includes:
3 hours of video tutorials
20 individual video lectures
Exercise files to follow along
Certificate of completion
target_audience: People who want to learn data analytics and different analytical methods.
Those who want to understand marketing, social media, predictive, and prescriptive analytics.
Marketing professionals, business analysts, or anyone interested in harnessing the power of data.

courses.description:
Bienvenue à toi dans cette formation en ligne Google Tag Manager !
Si tu lis ce message c'est que tu as déjà entendu parler de la puissance de Google Tag Manager ou que tu l'as toi même déjà installé et commencé à l'utilisé.
Tu t'es peut-être laissé surprendre par la simplicité avec laquelle on peut mettre en place des balises et puis tu as réalisé qu'il y avait certains notions à maîtriser. C'est courant. Le fait est que, si certaines bases sont faciles à comprendre (la configuration des balises, par exemple), la puissance de Google Tag Manager va bien au-delà de ces choses.
Mais même avec quelques compétences préliminaires, tu peux faire des choses géniales avec GTM.
Google Tag Manager résout un grand nombre des problèmes les plus courants que rencontrent les spécialistes du marketing en matière d'analyse. Prends le temps et investis en toi-même ; ton avenir dans le marketing peut en dépendre.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs, étudiants et marketeurs qui souhaitent collecter des données sur leur site

courses.bio: メルマガスタンドをお探しの方にはConvertKit（米国製）を推奨します。この講座ではなぜConvertKitが優れているのかという基礎的な説明から具体的な使い方まで解説していますのですぐにConvertを使い始めることができます。

なぜ海外メルマガスタンドを使うべきか

リアルタイムメルマガ（Broadcast）の使い方

requirements: PCまたはスマホで講義を視聴することができます
courses.description:
低予算で高品質なメルマガスタンドを使いたいネット経営者のみなさまへ
日本のメルマガスタンドって料金の割にメール到達率が低いと感じたことはありませんか？なぜならば、日本のメルマガスタンドではエンゲージメントの低い読者を排除せずに低品質なメルマガ配信をしている業者が多いためです。これは海外の情報を見れば明らかで、Gmailなどのメーラーなどではスパムや低品質なメールを自動的に迷惑メールにしたり、プロモーションタグに移動してメール読者の利便性を高める取り組みをしているためです。
あなたが海外のメルマガ配信スタンドに興味を持ったということは、あなたの大切なメルマガ読者様と親密なやりとりをして、売り上げ向上を実現したい、そう思っているはずです。しかし、日本のメルマガスタンド業者は料金が高い割に到達率が低いという評判が常にありました。だから、あなたも
本当にメルマガは読者に届いているのだろうか？
また迷惑メールに仕分けされてセールスが失敗してしまうのではないか？
と不安になるのもわかります。
私も同じ悩みを持っていた人間としていろいろな情報を探して、「メール到達率だけでなく機能の優れたメルマガ配信スタンド」を模索してきました。その結果、米国では多くのマーケターが利用しているConvertKitに行きついたわけです。
このオンラインコースでは、メルマガ配信スタンドを選ぶ上で知っておくべき知識と、ConvertKitの優位性や使い方を解説します。具体的には、
メルマガ配信スタンドの必要要件とは
海外メルマガスタンドの優位性とは
ConvertKitの成り立ちと優位性
ConvertKitの申し込みと初期設定方法
ConvertKit無料版で使える機能と設定方法
これだけで綺麗なランディングページやフォームを作成でき、リストビジネスを開始し、あなたの商品を読者にオファーすることができます。
このオンラインコースでConvertKitの基本的な使い方を学び、まずオンラインビジネスでのスタートダッシュを決めて利益を積み上げてください。

Google Analytics已經成為目前網站分析中的經典，不論是推廣人員、網站開發人員、產品經理，都需要能夠使用Google Analytics，原因是當數位的行為都能被記錄，身為相關人員都非常想要知道這些行為是什麼呢？可以怎麼讓這些行為數據變成更進一步的行動計畫。

requirements: A Salesforce Marketing Cloud Environment would be beneficial but is not mandatory.
courses.description:
Become a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Email Specialist: Master the Art of Email Marketing
Ready to elevate your email marketing game and become a certified Salesforce Marketing Cloud Email Specialist? This comprehensive course will equip you with the skills and knowledge you need to succeed. We'll take you from the fundamentals of Marketing Cloud all the way to building sophisticated email campaigns that deliver real results.
What you'll learn:
Marketing Cloud Essentials: Gain a solid understanding of the platform's capabilities and how it can transform your email marketing efforts.
Hands-on Administration: Configure Marketing Cloud like a pro, setting up everything necessary for efficient email campaign management.
Data Mastery: Learn the ins and outs of subscriber and data management, including building relational data models to personalize your communications.
Email Design & Content Creation: Craft compelling emails using Content Builder and other powerful tools within Email Studio.
Delivery & Sending Methods: Master various email application sending methods to reach your audience effectively.
Tracking & Reporting: Analyze campaign performance with insightful reports and data-driven insights.
Marketing Automation: Build complex, automated email journeys that nurture leads and drive conversions.
Journey Builder Deep Dive: Harness the power of Journey Builder to create personalized, multi-channel customer experiences.
Practice Makes Perfect:
Prepare for the certification exam with two integrated tests within the course. These tests feature questions similar to those on the actual exam, giving you the confidence you need to succeed. We'll also provide a final summary highlighting key topics for last-minute review.
Key Topics Covered:
Automation Studio, Playbooks, Query Activity, and other Activity Types
Data Extensions and Lists
CAN-SPAM Compliance
Email Validation Tools
HTML Paste
Triggered Automation
Personalization Strings
Send Classification
A/B Testing
Email Design Best Practices
Segmentation (Drag & Drop, Audience Builder)
Data Relationships
AMPscript
Email Templates

courses.description:
Marketing departments have moved to a more customer-centric way of engaging customers.  The organization of the marketing department has shifted from purely a brand, product or channel focus to a stronger role of being the faithful steward of the customer relationship.  Marketers have finally recognized the importance and power of shaping customer interactions and the necessity of creating value for their customers.  To meet this challenge, marketers require a better understanding of customer interactions.
This applied course helps the marketing, CRM, Sales and Analytics professional develop existing and transformational skills and competencies needed to compete in a more customer-centric digital age.  A strategic intelligence framework will link competencies in customer insights, advanced analytics, artificial intelligence, scenario planning, digital and social media, business intelligence and experimentation together to drive a more relevant Omni-Channel experience for the customer.
This is a strategy course with a detailed discussion of the "how-to" and execution elements of setting up a digital and analytics nervous system for a firm but emphasizes an overall understanding of the people, processes, and technologies required to build a data-driven customer intelligence function.  The course discusses the types of analytics, data science, AI, and Martech from a managerial/user and consumer perspective but is not a computational math or statistical methods course or a programming course in these disciplines.  The goal is to help marketers, analysts and executives build multi-disciplinary skills, allowing them to connect the dots and be stronger practitioners overall.
target_audience: Marketing , Analytics, CRM, Operations and other business professionals.

Sales, Customer Experience and other Customer facing professionals.

Anyone who uses data to make decisions.

courses.title: APPRENDRE MAILCHIMP - LES FONDAMENTAUX
courses.bio: Les fondamentaux de MAILCHIMP
objectives: Apprendre les fondamentaux de la plateforme MAILCHIMP
requirements: Aucun pré-requis n'est nécessaire et aucune compétence requise
courses.description:
Qui n'a jamais reçu une newsletter de sa marque de vêtement préféré? Qui n'a jamais reçu d'e-mail promotionnel et saisi sur le champs l'occasion de faire une bonne affaire lors d'une vente privée. Enfin, à qui Amazon n'a-t-il pas encore souhaité l'anniversaire à travers un e-mail bien tourné ?Dans ce cours, nous explorons les coulisses de l'e-mail par le prisme concret d'un logiciel bien connu des spécialistes de la communication digitale : MailChimp.
MailChimp est une plateforme marketing offrant une solution de gestion de campagnes e-mailing très complète. Avec plus de 10 millions d'utilisateurs actifs et une audience totale de 4 milliards de personnes, MailChimp est un outil incontournable dans le domaine du webmarketing. Dans ce cours, nous partons de la découverte de la plateforme jusqu'à la présentation de features avancées comme l'e-mail automation. A mi-chemin, nous apprenons à concevoir une campagne e-mailing de A à Z avec : la création d'une liste de destinataire, l'intégration d'un formulaire d'inscription à votre newsletter, la conception de l'e-mail, le paramétrage de la campagne, son déploiement et enfin, l'analyse des résultats. Nous nous perfectionnons plus encore avec entre autres l'A/B testing et l'e-mail personnalisé.
PROGRAMME DÉTAILLÉ DE LA FORMATION
1 - Prise en main de l'outil
2 - Gestion d'une audience
3 - Création d'un formulaire d'inscription à une newsletter
4 - Intégration d'un e-mail
5 - Paramétrage d'une campagne e-mailing
6 - Test et programmation de la campagne
7 - Analyse des résultats
8 - Paramétrage d'une campagne d'A/B testing
9 - Introduction aux fonctions avancées
target_audience: Jeune entrepreneur qui souhaite améliorer son business via L'email Marketing
Tout débutant Marketing qui souhaite découvrir la puissance de la plateforme MailChimp

requirements: El curso contiene una sección introductoria a R por lo que el único prerrequisito del curso es un conocimiento básico de estadística.
courses.description:
Descubre el poder del Análisis de Clústeres para revolucionar la Segmentación de Mercados con Python y la innovadora asistencia de ChatGPT
Bienvenido al curso más avanzado y práctico en análisis de clústeres para la segmentación de mercados. Soy Carlos Martínez, con un amplio bagaje académico y profesional, incluyendo una Maestría en Finanzas, un MBA de INCAE, y un Ph.D. de la Universidad de St. Gallen en Suiza. Con más de 25 casos de enseñanza publicados y una profunda experiencia en R, ahora te brindo la oportunidad de unirte a mí en esta nueva aventura que incorpora Python y ChatGPT para llevar tus habilidades en ciencia de datos a un nuevo nivel.
¿Por qué este curso es un cambio de juego?
Hemos ampliado el curso para incluir dos nuevas secciones revolucionarias que utilizan Python, el lenguaje de programación preferido para la ciencia de datos, junto con la asistencia de ChatGPT. Este enfoque no solo te permite manejar el preprocesamiento de datos, la estandarización y la implementación de modelos de clústeres con Python sino que también te capacita para interpretar los resultados y construir narrativas convincentes sobre tus datos.
Análisis de Clústeres (K-Means) con Python y ChatGPT: Aprenderás desde cómo estandarizar tus datos hasta implementar el algoritmo K-Means en Python. Pero vamos más allá: utilizando ChatGPT, te enseñaremos a perfilar y entender a tus clientes como nunca antes.
K-Means + Componentes Principales (PCA) con Python y ChatGPT: Te llevaremos a través de técnicas avanzadas como PCA para reducir la dimensionalidad y mejorar tus análisis de clústeres. Con ChatGPT, interpretaremos los resultados para crear perfiles de clientes detallados y estrategias de marketing precisas.
Este curso es ideal tanto para profesionales del área estadística que buscan aplicar sus conocimientos en escenarios del mundo real como para profesionales de marketing que desean explorar herramientas de minería de datos avanzadas. Con una sección introductoria a R y ahora extendido con Python y ChatGPT, el único requisito es un conocimiento básico de estadística.
¿Qué te llevarás de este curso?
Dominio del análisis de clústeres con Python para segmentación de mercados.
Capacidad para preprocesar y estandarizar datos, determinar el número óptimo de clústeres, e implementar K-Means.
Habilidades para usar PCA en la mejora de tus análisis y en la visualización de datos.
Competencia en el uso de ChatGPT para interpretar datos y construir narrativas potentes que respalden tus estrategias de marketing y toma de decisiones.
Únete a nosotros en este viaje hacia la maestría en análisis de clústeres y abre nuevas puertas a oportunidades ilimitadas de segmentación de mercados. Inscríbete hoy y transforma tu capacidad para entender a tus clientes y tomar decisiones basadas en datos. ¡Nos vemos en la primera clase!
target_audience: Estudiantes y profesionales de estadística, ciencia de datos y otras áreas numéricas interesados en desarrollar su capacidad de análisis y enfoque de negocios
Estudiantes y profesionales de marketing y otras áreas funcionales relacionadas interesados en aprender herramientas de analítica de datos para aplicarlas a su práctica profesional

courses.description:
LinkedIn Buzz is a program that helps businesses expand their reach and visibility on LinkedIn. The program provides a suite of tools and resources to help businesses create and share content, build and engage with their professional network, and generate leads and sales.
The main features of LinkedIn Buzz  include:
Content creation and distribution: The program provides guidance and best practices for creating and sharing content on LinkedIn that will resonate with your target audience and help you establish thought leadership in your industry.
Network building: The program helps businesses grow their professional network by providing strategies for finding and connecting with the right people.
Lead generation and sales: The program provides tools and resources to help businesses generate leads and convert them into sales using LinkedIn's advanced targeting and engagement capabilities.
Reporting and analytics: The program provides businesses with detailed analytics and reports to help them track their performance and make data-driven decisions.
Account management and support: The program includes dedicated account management and support to help businesses get the most out of their LinkedIn presence.
It is a paid program that comes with a dedicated account manager and customized strategy, it is designed to help companies to expand their business, generate leads, and increase brand awareness on LinkedIn.

courses.description:
¿Estás listo para llevar tu carrera y tus proyectos al siguiente nivel?

¡Este es el momento perfecto! Nuestro Máster en Inteligencia Artificial, ¡Desde 0 Hasta Experto!  te brindará las herramientas, estrategias y conocimientos más avanzados para dominar la tecnología que está revolucionando el mundo.


¿Por Qué Elegir Nuestro Curso?


1. Aprende con un Experto Reconocido

Este máster es impartido por Renato Yacolca, consultor y creador de uno de los canales más influyentes en el mundo digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 189,000 estudiantes en todo el mundo y el reconocimiento oficial de YouTube (Botón de Plata). Su experiencia práctica y visión estratégica serán tu guía en cada paso.


2. Formación Integral en Inteligencia Artificial

Este máster está diseñado para que domines la IA y ChatGPT desde cero hasta un nivel avanzado, aplicándola en proyectos reales que impulsarán tu carrera o negocio digital.
Con esta formación integral, saldrás con un kit completo de habilidades en IA aplicada, listo para crear proyectos digitales de alto impacto.


3. 100% Enfoque Práctico

No solo aprenderás teoría: desde la primera clase aplicarás lo aprendido en casos reales y proyectos prácticos. Construirás tus propias soluciones con IA y ChatGPT listas para usar en tu negocio, emprendimiento o carrera profesional.


4. Flexibilidad Total

Accede al contenido del máster en cualquier momento y desde cualquier lugar. Aprende a tu propio ritmo con nuestra plataforma en línea y adapta tu aprendizaje a tu estilo de vida.


5. Acompañamiento y Soporte Personalizado

No estarás solo en tu camino. Renato estará disponible para responder a tus dudas, guiarte y ayudarte a sacar el máximo provecho de tu formación.


6. Certificación de Alto Valor

Al finalizar el máster, recibirás un Certificado Oficial de Finalización, que podrás añadir a tu currículum o perfil de LinkedIn para destacar tus habilidades ante clientes y empleadores en un sector de altísima demanda.


¿Qué Aprenderás en Nuestro Curso?


Crear artículos y contenido optimizado para SEO con herramientas de Inteligencia Artificial como ChatGPT, SEOWriting AI, Hostinger AI Assistant Plugin y Elementor AI.


Generar imágenes únicas y artísticas con ChatGPT y Google Gemini, desde ilustraciones estilo Studio Ghibli hasta figuras personalizadas y diseños creativos.

Construir páginas web completas con WordPress y ChatGPT, personalizando menús, tipografías, colores y páginas clave como Inicio, Servicios y Contacto.


Crear agentes de Inteligencia Artificial en N8N e insertarlos en tu web para ofrecer experiencias interactivas a tus usuarios.


Montar una tienda online profesional con WordPress y ChatGPT, incluyendo productos, envíos y pasarelas de pago.

Crear un blog en WordPress con Inteligencia Artificial, redactando artículos de calidad, personalizando el diseño y traduciendo el contenido fácilmente.


Crear una página web con Inteligencia Artificial en Hostinger, diseñando tu logotipo, personalizando cada sección, optimizando el SEO y asegurando una experiencia perfecta en móviles.

Crear páginas web en Wix usando Inteligencia Artificial, aprovechando su flexibilidad para personalizar contenido y diseño.



Da el Gran Paso Hoy

El mundo está cambiando y la Inteligencia Artificial ya es una ventaja competitiva. Este máster te convertirá en un profesional capaz de crear contenido, aplicaciones, páginas web, tiendas online y proyectos innovadores con ChatGPT y las mejores herramientas de IA.



Únete ahora al Máster en Inteligencia Artificial, ¡Desde 0 Hasta Experto! y conviértete en el experto que todos necesitan.

Renato Yacolca

courses.description:
This course covers a solid, simple outreach strategy to book you new sales calls for your marketing agency. Showing you how the system works step by step, how to apply it to get your next client within 30 days (my first time using this method I started generating calls after 1 week and closed a client by week 2), and how to completely automate the process so all you have to do is show up for the calls! This course also goes in-depth on the art and mastery of the sales call with over 5 hours of sales training content!


I show how I generated tons of sales calls for my agency with INTERESTED prospects (no cold outreach).
These are prospects that not only WANT. your service, but are actively LOOKING for someone to provide it for them. In this course you will be learning how and where to reach out to people that actually want to hear your pitch!


I personally used this method to book sales calls and close new clients with NO TESTIMONIALS, NO PORTFOLIO, AND NO SOCIAL PROOF.
I still use this entire method today.


If you're a beginner agency owner looking to get your first ever clients, this course is great for you!
If you're an experienced agency owner looking to create a new stream of sales calls and revenue, this course is great for you!
If you're a freelancer just looking to take on new jobs for yourself, beginner or veteran, this is great for you!

Whether you're a small business owner, a digital marketer, or a consultant, you’ll find invaluable insights and practical tools to revolutionize your marketing efforts.

作为企业业务中关键的一环，如何才能实现最有效的获客？2C和2B都需要进行获客，但是获客的方法却完全不同，那么如何在B端进行高效的获客呢？本节课程将为你解答这个问题。

courses.title: Customer lifetime value predictive model with Python
courses.bio: A very useful marketing AI model course that enables you to master machine learning and application into business
objectives: How customer lifetime value works in market strategy to promote business
How to use Python as a programming tool to perform data analysis and exploration
How to build customer lifetime value model using Python
How to conduct statistical analysis and feature selection
How to implement Xgboost and lightgbm algorithms
requirements: Basic math background
Basic computer skills
courses.description:
If you wish to start the data analytics career or apply machine learning expertise into business, this is the right course you must choose!
Here I will provide a series of lectures on a practical marketing AI model -- 'Customer Life Value Model', or CLV model. The method is also sometimes called the 'repurchase modeling'. I would say what you will learn is a very useful AI forecasting model for marketing campaign and promotion. Because the CLV models I am teaching in this course are currently widely used in retail banking, insurance, and other sales-related industries. Why? Since it helps business owners select the most valuable customers to get their business better and better!
The value of my course is mainly reflected in the following aspects:
1. The CLV models can be quickly created because the process and features for building models are very concise and efficient.
2. One can utilize the model to predict the customer's purchase behavior or purchase preference for a specific merchandise in a given future time period.
3. The CLV model can be used to predict the probability of customers' repurchase behavior.
4. The CLV model can be used to analyze the activity and loyalty of different customers -- help you solve customer retention problems.
5. Based on the output of the CLV model, business owners can calculate and rank the customer lifetime value.
The objective of the course is to let you master how to effectively use the big data and AI algorithms for intelligent marketing. For example, if you can successfully predict who will buy the commodities in the next month based on historical transaction data, then you would effectively apply some market strategies into these customers, like by launching advertisements, applying recommender systems for ‘cross sales’ or ‘cross recommendation’ At the same time, The business owners will also realize from the model's prediction who are not interested in the goods or services they are providing, perhaps they can adopt some other marketing strategies or promotion to make these silent customers become more 'active' or 'waked up'.
In addition to the business value you can absorb from the course, I also teach you some practical statistical, machine learning and AI algorithm knowledge and skills, combined with the Python programming coding. This mainly covers:
1. Various statistical distribution functions such Geometric / Negative Binomial used in the CLV models and interpretations.
2. Lifetime package in Python to create BG/NBD CLV model.
3. Different analytical and graphics tools in Lifetime package including implementation methods and interpretation.
4. Data exploration, cleaning and feature generation for CLV models with Python programming.
5. Model feature selection, feature engineering, cross validation and performance tracking.
6. Lecture on how to apply the third party data into CLV modeling.
7. Introduction of gradient boost tree algorithms’ framework and implementation including Xgboost and Lightgbm algorithm into CLV modeling.
target_audience: Anyone who wishes to learn how to apply machine learning and predictive modeling approaches into business
Anyone who needs to get started data science career in marketing, retail banking, insurance and intelligent sales related industries

courses.title: HubSpot CRM: Manage Sales, Marketing & Customers
courses.bio: HubSpot CRM for Digital Marketers: Capture, Nurture, Convert Leads, Drive Business Growth and Sales.
objectives: Understand the core features and interface of HubSpot CRM
Create and manage contacts, companies, and deals effectively
Set up and customize sales pipelines to track progress

courses.description:
CRITICAL NOTICE Prior to Enrollment:


This course does not serve as a substitute for official vendor materials necessary for certification exams. It lacks endorsement from the certification vendor, and participants will not receive official certification study materials or a voucher as part of this course.
Are you ready to take control of your sales, marketing, and customer relationships like a pro? Whether you’re an entrepreneur, a sales or marketing professional, or someone looking to boost your CRM skills, this course is your complete guide to mastering HubSpot CRM.
HubSpot CRM is one of the most powerful and user-friendly customer relationship management platforms available today.
In this course, you’ll learn how to navigate and use HubSpot CRM to manage contacts, track leads, automate workflows, organize sales pipelines, and streamline your marketing efforts—all without needing any prior experience.
You’ll start by understanding the core features of HubSpot CRM and how it fits into the broader world of sales and marketing automation.
We’ll walk you through how to create and manage contacts, deals, and companies, set up your sales pipeline, send marketing emails, and analyze performance using HubSpot’s reporting tools. You’ll also explore integrations and automation tools that help you save time, increase productivity, and improve customer engagement.
By the end of the course, you’ll feel confident using HubSpot CRM to attract leads, manage relationships, and close deals more efficiently.
Whether you’re managing a small team or just getting started with customer relationship management, this course will give you the practical knowledge and skills you need to succeed.
Enroll now and start using HubSpot CRM like a pro!
Thank you

Sales and marketing professionals who want to streamline their workflow using HubSpot
Beginners with no prior experience in CRM tools
Freelancers and consultants who want to organize client information and communication
Startup teams aiming to automate and track their sales and marketing activities
Anyone interested in learning HubSpot CRM to enhance their digital skills or career

courses.title: Price Analytics
courses.bio: Learn how to price a product or service for better marketing strategy
objectives: You will learn advantages and disadvantages of 11 pricing techiniques
You will learn how to evaluate price based on your financial targets
You will be able to conduct break-even analysys
You will learn Net Present Value Capital Budgeting Model
You will be introduced to Internal Rate of Return model
You will learn how to use Excel and Data Analysis options in Excel for evaluating price
You will learn concept of Price Elasticity and Optimal Pricing
You will learn how to collect data for and and operate with Demand Curve

Pricing Assessment: Net Present Value Capital Budgeting Model
Internal Rate of Return Capital Budgeting Model

requirements: Basic knowledge of Excel
courses.description:
Don’t you know that price is the first thing majority of customers look at? Marketing consulting firms estimate that improving pricing by 1 percent can result in as much as 10 percent increased profits. Price Analytics is a skill of high demand among marketing manager who work on the marketing strategy. And not only them! Entrepreneurs, business executives, and senior decision makers often feel shaky when it comes to pricing assessment.

Pricing is one of the major elements of marketing. Price analytics is one of the key elements of it.
The technology of pricing is an art. Rounding off the numbers may be good for small endeavors but never for an organization. The art of setting prices for products or services has been an ever-challenging task for organizations. Paying attention to the changing economic system, strong competitors in the marketplace, and client budget, the secret to success of pricing goods has been based mainly on a psychological assessment of the client and solid price analytics.
Few institutions offer education in price analytics, and none offer online courses on it. The Scandinavian Institute of Business Analytics has taken a step forward and has developed unique courses in business analytics for online education.
In the course, Price Analytics by SCANBA, you will follow Lars and his company, Lars Coffee Mugs.
Together with Lars, you will study different pricing techniques, pricing assessment methods, concepts of profitable pricing, and learn about price discrimination.
You will learn:
11 pricing techniques
3 pricing assessment methods, including break-even analysis and net present value capital budgeting model
5 Excel spreadsheet examples
Concepts of elastic demand, optimal pricing, and price discrimination.


Why wait? Take the course now; it is worth it.
target_audience: Students interested in marketing and business education.
Entrepreneurs, business developers, and start-up owners.
All levels of business analysts

courses.title: Dominando o Account-Based Marketing (ABM)
courses.bio: Impulsione o Crescimento B2B Com Estratégias Personalizadas, Campanhas Direcionadas e Sucesso Mensurável De ABM
objectives: Aprenda os princípios básicos do marketing baseado em contas, incluindo abordagens de marketing personalizadas e a segmentação de contas de alto valor.
Descubra como criar estratégias personalizadas de ABM, desde a identificação de contas-alvo ideais até o desenvolvimento de um manual personalizado de ABM.
Explore como aproveitar os canais digitais e off-line, criar conteúdo personalizado e alinhar vendas e marketing para obter o máximo impacto.
Entenda as principais métricas, ferramentas e técnicas para monitorar o sucesso da ABM e promover a melhoria contínua com estudos de caso reais.
Aprenda os princípios básicos do ABM - Account-Based Marketing.

Módulo 1: Introdução ao Account-Based Ma: 1.1 O Que é o Account-Based Marketing (ABM)?
1.2 Importância do ABM no Marketing Moderno
Módulo 2: Construindo uma Base ABM Forte: 2.1 Identificação e Seleção de Contas Alvo
2.2 Pesquisa e Percepções para Contas Alvo
2.3 Desenvolvendo uma Estratégia e um Plano de ABM
Módulo 3: Táticas e Implementação do ABM: 3.1 Elaboração de Mensagens e Conteúdo de Marketing Personalizado
3.3 Alinhamento de Vendas e Marketing no ABM
Módulo 4: Estratégias Avançadas de ABM: 4.3 ABM para Expansão de Contas e Upselling
Módulo 5: Medição e Otimização do Desemp: 5.1 Definindo Métricas de Sucesso para ABM
5.2 Ferramentas e Técnicas para Medir a Eficácia do ABM
Módulo 6: ABM na Prática: Aplicativos do: 6.1 Estudos de Casos de Implementações Bem-Sucedidas de ABM
6.3 Palestras e Informações sobre o Setor
Módulo 7: Projeto Capstone e Recursos Ad: 7.1 Projeto Capstone: Projetando uma Estratégia ABM Abrangente

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência prévia com plataformas de ABM, mas os alunos devem estar abertos a aprender sobre CRM, automação de marketing e ferramentas de análise usadas em campanhas de ABM.
courses.description:
Aprenda a estratégia que as empresas B2B mais bem-sucedidas estão usando para fechar grandes negócios e crescer de forma inteligente.
Se você ainda aposta em campanhas genéricas para atrair clientes de alto valor, é hora de mudar o jogo. O Account-Based Marketing (ABM) é a abordagem que está transformando a forma como negócios B2B conquistam, nutrem e fecham contas estratégicas — com precisão, personalização e resultados impressionantes.
Este curso é um guia completo e prático para quem quer dominar o ABM do início ao fim, com técnicas modernas, cases reais e ferramentas testadas por empresas como Slack, HubSpot, Dropbox e Zendesk.
O que você vai aprender:
Fundamentos do ABM: Entenda o que é, como funciona e os principais modelos (Um-para-Um, Um-para-Poucos e Um-para-Muitos).
Como identificar contas estratégicas: Saiba como escolher e priorizar os clientes certos com base em potencial de receita e alinhamento com seu negócio.
Planejamento de campanhas personalizadas: Crie mensagens, conteúdos e abordagens alinhadas com cada etapa da jornada do decisor.
Integração entre marketing e vendas: Aprenda a alinhar equipes para que trabalhem juntas em torno dos mesmos objetivos.
Campanhas multicanal de alto impacto: Descubra como usar e-mail, LinkedIn, eventos, webinars e outros canais de forma integrada e eficaz.
Medição e otimização de resultados: Use métricas como engajamento, conversão e retenção para ajustar campanhas e garantir evolução contínua.
Diferenciais do curso:
Acompanhamento passo a passo: Da escolha das contas até o fechamento dos deals.
Estudos de caso reais: Aprenda com as estratégias usadas por grandes players do mercado.
Exercícios práticos e templates: Ganhe experiência real criando campanhas e estratégias de ABM.
Táticas avançadas: Saiba como usar inteligência artificial, dados preditivos e ABM para upsell e cross-sell.
Ferramentas para download: Acesse modelos de planejamento, dashboards e frameworks prontos para aplicar na sua empresa.
Para quem é este curso:
Profissionais de marketing B2B que querem transformar suas estratégias e gerar mais impacto.
Executivos de vendas e gerentes de contas que buscam fechar contratos com leads mais qualificados.
Líderes de marketing e diretores comerciais que desejam implementar um programa de ABM escalável e orientado a resultados.
Empreendedores e donos de negócios que querem atrair clientes ideais com uma abordagem mais inteligente e direcionada.
Por que o ABM funciona (e por que você precisa dominar agora):
ABM é mais do que uma técnica — é uma metodologia comprovada. Empresas que adotam o ABM estão experimentando ciclos de vendas mais curtos, relacionamentos mais profundos com clientes e retornos sobre investimento muito superiores a outras estratégias. Segundo pesquisas, 87% dos profissionais de marketing afirmam que o ABM supera qualquer outro modelo em ROI.
Além disso, 75% dos compradores B2B valorizam conteúdo personalizado. Em outras palavras: quem personaliza, converte. E quem domina o ABM, lidera.
Ao final do curso, você será capaz de:
Criar e executar campanhas de ABM que entregam resultados concretos
Alinhar marketing e vendas para uma colaboração estratégica e eficiente
Produzir conteúdos personalizados que impactam os decisores certos
Medir e otimizar continuamente o desempenho das suas campanhas
Inscreva-se agora e torne-se um especialista em ABM. Se o seu objetivo é atrair contas de alto valor, aumentar conversões e crescer com inteligência, este curso vai te entregar as ferramentas, o método e a visão estratégica para chegar lá.
target_audience: Profissionais de Marketing B2B
Equipes de Vendas e Gerentes de Contas (Account Managers)
Gerentes e Executivos de Marketing
Empresários e Empreendedores
Sales Development Representatives (SDR's)
Account Executives
Business Development Representatives (BDR's)

courses.title: Master Google Tag Manager: Go From Beginner to Advanced
courses.bio: Custom templates, single page application, content grouping, ads tracking, server-side GTM and more - in this course.
objectives: Learn several advanced use cases of Google Tag Manager
Find out how GTM work behind the scene
Get started with server-side fundamentals of Google Tag Manager
Understand the application of custom templates
Learn how to connect GTM with Google Ads and Facebook
Understand the advanced use cases of Video tracking on your website
requirements: About 5-10% of the chapters has discussions on JavaScript, you would need the understanding of JS for only those few chapters. Rest of them don't have any prerequisite.
courses.description:
You can use Google Tag Manager to send simple page views data to your GA account, or you can use it to collect complex business data. This course will take you from the former to the latter.
We will look at straightforward use cases such as button click tracking, form tracking, element visibility, outbound link tracking, etc. Then we will move to discuss more complex scenarios such as Facebook pixel implementation, advanced techniques for google ad conversion tracking, YouTube, and non-YouTube video tracking. We will learn how to capture custom data such as User ID and product information with GTM variables. We will learn how to move the GTM computations to the server-side and set up tracking for single-page applications. Then, there are custom templates, and more.
We look at implementation steps, concepts, and behind the scene working of the GTM.
I am Rudranil, and I have about a decade of experience in SaaS marketing, during which I oversaw the implementation of GTM for many SaaS businesses. I am offering this course with hours of content and material, an enormous discount, and a 30 days refund offer. It means that you have zero risk in subscribing to the course.
I hope you do give it a try. Thank you.
target_audience: Beginners of Google Tag Manager
Basic and Intermediate users of Google Tag Manager
Web Analytics Professional

courses.title: Facebook Reklam Verilerini API ile BigQuery'e Aktarmak
courses.bio: Oluşturacağımız Facebook-BigQuery Connector ile, BigQuery'de Verileri Analiz Edip Data Studio'ya Aktarım Yapacağız.

BigQuery ile Temel Analiz: BigQuery'de SQL ile Veriler Üzerinde Analiz Yapma (cpc, ctr, en çok harcayan vb)
BigQuery'de SQL ile Veriler Üzerinde Analiz Yapma #2
BigQuery'de SQL ile Veriler Üzerinde Analiz Yapma #3
Data Studio'ya Verileri Aktarma ve Görse: BigQuery Scheduled Queries ile Data Studio'yu Otomatik Güncelleme

requirements: Facebook Reklam Hesabı Erişimi
Google Cloud Platform'da Üyelik
courses.description:
Facebook reklamlarının (Facebook / Instagram) verilerini BigQuery’e aktarmak için genellikle paralı ürünler mevcut. Google’da araştırdığınız zaman sonuçların hepsinin ücretli tool’lar olduğunu göreceksiniz. Bu içeriğimizde, Facebook reklam hesabımızdaki verileri, BigQuery'e ücretsiz olarak aktarmayı öğreneceğiz. Çünkü kendi bağlantı entegrasyonumuzu yaratacağız. Bunu öğrenirken, Facebook Marketing API kullanımını, Google Cloud Platform'da temel düzeyde Cloud Functions, Cloud Scheduler kullanımlarını, basit düzeyde SQL komutları yazarak reklam verilerimizi yorumlamayı da yapacağız. Daha sonra verileri Data Studio'ya nasıl aktarabileceğimizi ve bu süreci nasıl otomatikleştirebileceğimizi göreceğiz.
Google Analytics 4 ve Google Analytics 360 verilerini kolay bir şekilde BigQuery’e aktarılabiliyor. Google Ads verileri de. Ama Facebook verilerini aktarmak zahmetli ama zevkli bir süreç gerektiriyor.


Peki buna neden ihtiyacınız var?


Tool satın almak yerine ücretsiz bir şekilde bu aktarımı yapabilmek.
BigQuery'de Google Ads, Google Analytics verilerinizi depoladığınız yerde, Facebook reklam verilerini de depolayarak, farklı kanalları tek bir çatı altında toplayabilmek ve bu kanallar arasında birbiriyle ilişkili analizler yapabilmek.
BigQuery'de oluşturacağınız Facebook tablolarınızdan verileri çekip Data Studio'da Facebook reklam raporlamasını otomatik ilerleyen bir süreç haline getirmek.
Google Cloud Platform, Google BigQuery, Facebook Marketing API konularında bilgi sahibi olarak kariyeriniz için öğrenimlerinizi artırmak.


Bu içeriği ücretsiz olarak sunuyorum, amacım Türkçe dilimizde bu tarz içeriklerin çoğalmasına katkı sağlamak.
Tabii hem blog içeriğimin, hem de bu videolu eğitimin çıkmasını sağlayan yararlandığım kaynak Medium sitesinde bulduğum bir içerik olmuştur. Burada link kabul edilmiyor. Ama Google'a "Writing your data connector from Facebook ads to Google BigQuery" yazdığın zaman çıkan medium sitesi linkli blog yazısı kaynağımdır.

objectives: Understand core product analytics concepts such as funnels, retention, churn, and LTV, and how they relate to user behavior and product success.

requirements: Some familiarity with product management concepts is helpful, but no technical or coding experience is required.
courses.description:
Are you a product manager, growth lead, marketing manager, or founder looking to make smarter product decisions using data without relying on a data science team?
In this hands-on course, you’ll learn how to track, interpret, and act on product analytics to improve user experience, retention, and revenue. Whether you're launching a new product or optimizing an existing one, this course gives you the frameworks, metrics, and thinking tools you need to turn user behavior into actionable insights.
We'll go through some real life examples and use cases from products in the iGaming industry.


We’ll cover essential concepts like funnels, retention, churn, LTV, and segmentation, and guide you through practical exercises using real-world data patterns. You’ll learn how to define what to track, make sense of messy spreadsheets, and prioritize decisions that move your product forward.
No coding or advanced math required, just a curiosity for product data and a desire to build better experiences.
By the end of this course, you’ll be able to:
Understand and apply core product analytics concepts

courses.description:
※初心者向けの内容ではありません。


■ GTMの「カスタムJavaScript変数」で、一歩進んだGA4データ計測を
このコースでは、Googleタグマネージャー（Google Tag Manager／GTM）の「カスタムJavaScript変数」を活用し、標準機能では取得できない詳細なアクセス解析データを計測するためのスキルを習得します。


「もっと解像度の高いデータが欲しいけど、GTMを使っても限界がある…」
「クリックされたバナー画像の情報が欲しい」
「タグを増やしすぎて、GTMのコンテナ内がごちゃごちゃ…」


これらの課題を一気に解決できるのが「カスタムJavaScript変数」です。
ユーザーがクリックしたバナーの画像やID、記事の精読状況など、これまで諦めていた情報の取得が可能になります。
1つのタグで複数の要素の計測ができるため、タグの管理が効率化されるというメリットもあります。




■難しいからこそ価値がある
カスタムJavaScript変数を使うには「JavaScript」というプログラミング言語を使用します。
ですので、正直なところ「誰にでもおすすめできる」とは言えません。
中途半端な使い方をするくらいなら、むしろ使わないほうが良いとさえ思います。


ですが、難易度の高いスキルだからこそ、覚える価値があると私は思います。




■こんな方におすすめです


Googleタグマネージャーの基本的な操作や概念を理解している方
GTMを使ってGoogleアナリティクス（GA4）のイベント設定ができる方
Googleタグマネージャーの応用力を身につけて、より詳細なデータ計測をしたい方
自分で試行錯誤しながら学習を進める意欲のある方




■このコースに向かない人


Googleタグマネージャーを使ったことがない人
ECサイトやアプリの解析に特化した内容を求めている人
自分の頭で考えて試行錯誤ができない人


このコースは、Googleタグマネージャーの基礎コースに比べて難易度が高くなっています。
GA4やGoogleタグマネージャーを全く使ったことがない方には進めることができません。
このコースは一般的なWebサイト向けです。ECサイトやアプリの解析に特化した内容を求めている方には向きません。
「自分で試行錯誤ができない方」には絶対に無理です。受講しないでください。




■コースを受けるとできるようになること


Googleタグマネージャーの「カスタムJavaScript変数」を理解し設定できるようになる
GTMの標準機能では取得できない詳細なWebサイト上のデータを取得できるようになる
JavaScriptの基礎的な構文を理解し、簡単なコードを読めるようになる
生成AIを使ってカスタムJavaScript変数のコードを生成する方法を習得する


※コースで設定したイベントを可視化する方法についてもお伝えしますが、必要最低限な範囲にとどまります。
データの可視化方法を専門的に学びたい方は、他のコースを受けてください。




■コースで学べる具体的なデータ計測の例
1. CTA（Call To Action）のID取得
サイト内のボタンやバナーに特定の命名規則でIDを付与することで、表示とクリックを効率的に計測します。
手作業でのイベント設定の手間を大幅に削減し、どのCTAが効果的だったかを自動的に可視化できます。


2. クリックされたバナー画像の取得
ユーザーがクリックしたバナー画像のファイル名やURLを取得し、Looker Studioで画像付きのレポートを作成できるようになります。
どのデザインのバナーがユーザーの興味を引き、クリックにつながっているかを視覚的に比較できます。


3. 記事の「精読」の計測
ブログ記事が「しっかり読まれたか」を「記事の最後まで読む」と「ユーザーが記事の中に長時間滞在する」の2つの条件で定義し計測します。
「記事ごとの滞在時間」という可変するデータを取得するためにJavaScriptを使います。
読了率が低い記事の特定や、精読ユーザーのコンバージョン率の分析に役立ちます。




■JavaScriptの基礎も解説します
コードをコピペするだけでなく、JavaScriptの基礎的な部分も分かりやすく解説します
コードの意味を理解することで、応用力を身につけることができます。




■生成AIの活用
複雑なケースにも対応できるよう、生成AIを活用したJavaScript生成の方法にも触れます。
いわゆる「バイブコーディング（Vibe Coding）」と呼ばれている手法です。




カスタムJavaScript変数を知ることで、Googleタグマネージャーのスキルが一段階上がり、これまで以上に解像度の高いイベント計測ができることを実感できるはずです。


それでは、コースの中でお会いしましょう。
target_audience: GA4で解像度の高いデータを計測したいマーケター

courses.description:
You're looking for a complete course that will teach you how to calculate customer value to drive business decisions involving product pricing, acquisition cost, marketing cost, and many other parts of the business., right?
You've found the right course Customer Valuation for Entrepreneurs and Marketers! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different methods to find customer lifetime value and how to find it in Excel using advanced excel tool.
After completing this course you will be able to:
Understand the value of your customers to make intelligent decisions on how to spend money acquiring them
Learn how to measure customer value based on the customer value concept
Use Monte-Carlo simulation to incorporate uncertainty in customer value models
Confidently practice, discuss and understand Customer value models used by organizations
How this course will help you?
A Verifiable Certificate of Completion is presented to all students who undertake this Customer Valuation for Entrepreneurs and Marketers course.
If you are a business manager or an executive, or a student who wants to learn, calculate and apply customer value in real world problems of business, this course will give you a solid base for that by teaching you the most popular Customer lifetime value models and how to implement it.
Why should you choose this course?
We believe in teaching by example. This course is no exception. Every Section’s primary focus is to teach you the concepts through how-to examples. Each section has the following components:
Theoretical concepts and use cases of different Customer value models
Step-by-step instructions on implement such models in excel
Downloadable Excel file containing data and solutions used in each lecture
Class notes and assignments to revise and practice the concepts
The practical classes where we create the model  is something which differentiates this course from any other course available online.
What makes us qualified to teach you?
The course is taught by Abhishek and Pukhraj. As managers in Global Analytics Consulting firm, we have helped businesses solve their business problem using Analytics and we have used our experience to include the practical aspects of Marketing and data analytics in this course
We are also the creators of some of the most popular online courses - with over 170,000 enrollments and thousands of 5-star reviews like these ones:

Our Promise
Teaching our students is our job and we are committed to it. If you have any questions about the course content, practice sheet or anything related to any topic, you can always post a question in the course or send us a direct message.
Download Practice files, take Quizzes, and complete Assignments
With each lecture, there are class notes attached for you to follow along. You can also take quizzes to check your understanding of concepts. Each section contains a practice assignment for you to practically implement your learning.
What is covered in this course?
Understand the value of your customers to make intelligent decisions on how to spend money acquiring them. In this course, we will explore how one can use excel for finding Customer value to
Find lifetime customer value
Take data driven decision on deciding acquisition cost, retention efforts etc
Let me give you a brief overview of the course
Section 1 - Introduction
In this section we will learn about the course structure


Section 2 - Lifetime Customer Value
In this section, we will discuss about the basic of concepts of Customer Lifetime value.


Section 3 - Variations and Sensitivity Analysis
In this section you will learn how to create excel model to find lifetime customer value and perform sensitivity analysis to capture variations in lifetime value under different scenarios.


Section 4 - Monte Carlo Simulation
This section we will learn the basics and use-cases of Monte Carlo Simulation. We will also use Monte Carlo simulation to find customer value in uncertain scenarios.
Some of the examples in this course are from the book Marketing Analytics: Data-Driven Techniques with Microsoft Excel [Winston, Wayne L.]. We suggest this book as reading material for anyone aspiring to be a marketing analyst.
I am pretty confident that the course will give you the necessary knowledge and skills to immediately see practical benefits in your work place.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1
Cheers

courses.title: Comprendre facilement les objectifs dans Matomo
courses.bio: Un cours ludique qui vous apprend les objectifs Matomo à travers l’expérience familière des applications de rencontre.
requirements: Aucune expérience préalable avec Matomo ou l’analytique web n’est nécessaire.
Aucune compétence technique ou en codage requise — ce cours est 100 % adapté aux débutants.
Il vous suffit d’avoir accès à une instance Matomo (auto-hébergée ou en cloud).
Une dose de curiosité et l’envie d’apprendre avec des exemples concrets et ludiques !
courses.description:
Nouveau dans l’analytique web et perdu dans le jargon technique ? Pas de panique — on s’occupe de tout ! Ce cours pour débutants propose une approche originale, simple et ludique pour comprendre les objectifs dans Matomo… à travers une analogie universelle : une application de rencontre.
Imagine un instant que ton site web soit comme ton profil sur une appli de dating. Les visiteurs ? Ce sont les personnes qui font défiler les profils. Une vue de page ? C’est quelqu’un qui consulte le tien. Un clic sur un bouton ? Un petit « like » ou un swipe vers la droite. Et lorsqu’un visiteur effectue une action clé — comme remplir un formulaire, télécharger un fichier ou passer une commande — c’est ce qu’on appelle un objectif. En d'autres mots, c’est… le match parfait !
Ce cours t’apprendra à :
Comprendre ce que sont les objectifs dans Matomo et pourquoi ils comptent vraiment
Créer, configurer et suivre tes objectifs pas à pas, sans stress ni jargon
Découvrir des exemples concrets d’objectifs dans différents contextes (e-commerce, site vitrine, etc.)
Lire les rapports d’objectifs pour optimiser tes résultats et mieux comprendre le comportement de tes utilisateurs
Plutôt que de t’ensevelir sous la théorie, chaque concept est illustré par des situations vécues sur une appli de rencontre. Résultat ? Un apprentissage concret, amusant et facile à assimiler, même si tu n’as jamais mis les pieds dans un outil d’analyse.
Que tu sois marketeur, propriétaire de site, étudiant ou curieux, ce cours est fait pour toi. Tu vas découvrir l’univers de l’analytique sous un nouvel angle, et peut-être même… tomber amoureux de tes données !
target_audience: Les propriétaires de sites web qui souhaitent savoir si leur contenu est performant
Les marketeurs qui veulent suivre les conversions et optimiser les parcours utilisateurs
Les étudiants et enseignants à la recherche d’une introduction simple et accessible à l’analytique web
Les associations, blogueurs ou petites entreprises cherchant un outil respectueux de la vie privée pour mesurer leur succès
Toute personne qui apprend mieux grâce à des analogies concrètes — comme des comparaisons avec des applications de rencontre !

courses.description:
Цей україномовний курс із Аналітики в маркетингу після якого ви зможете визначати авдиторію вашого сатй, джерела трафіку, оптимізовувати маркетинговий бюджет, відслідковувати події, тестувати гіпотези та користуватись GA4, GTM і WVO. Після курсу ви зможете робити:


Гіпотези для покращення роботи бізнесу
Визначати Цільову Авдиторію
Проводити аналітику за допомогою GA4
Покращувати показники сайту
Перерозподіляти маркетинговий бюджет
Розраховувати дохід та витрати бізнесу
Запускати A/B тести
Усі лекції залишаються з вами назавжди, а також вони будуть оновлюватися, щоб ваші знання завжди були актуальними. Курс оновлений на момент жовтня 2025 року.

Що входити в лекції?

1 Мудуль: вступ, аналітика та наша роль в ній, чим займається веб аналітик, які є ще аналітики, основні кроки, щоб отримати першу роботу, зп після закінчення курсу
2 Модуль: аналіз за допомогою google analytics 4 основних джерел трафіку, кастомні звіти визначення цільової авдиторії, робота з рекламою, дослідження та кастомні звіти.
3 Модуль: передача даних до GA4 з інших сервісів (Meta, TikTok решта).
4 Модуль: тестування гіпотез через AA, AB та MVT експерименти.
5 Модуль: знайомство з інтерфейсом Power BI.
Кожна лекція створена з максимально практичним призначенням та носить прикладний характер. Тож не переймайтесь, води не буде. Усі лекції є українською.

Коротко про мене, як про лектора:

Працюю в маркетингу з 2012 року;
Викладаю стратегію, таргетинг та SMM в Нідерландській Міжнародній Академії Маркетингу (NIMA);
Є сертифікованим ментором від Google;
Працюю з проектами в Україні, США, Кореї та ЄС;
Працюю з В2С, В2В і В2G;
Експерт в аналітиці та тестуванні гіпотез;
Веду телеграм канал Тверезий Таргетолог та автор кількох авторських курсів.

Technical Proficiency: A basic understanding of APIs and how they work, including concepts like requests, responses, and data formats (JSON, XML).
Programming Knowledge: While not mandatory, some knowledge of a programming language (like PHP, Python, or JavaScript) can be beneficial for understanding and utilizing the API more effectively.

courses.description:
Welcome to a comprehensive journey into the world of advanced web analytics with Matomo and Mistral AI. This course is designed to transform beginners and intermediate users into proficient analysts capable of leveraging the full potential of Matomo's Reporting API in conjunction with the innovative capabilities of Mistral AI.
What You Will Learn:
Introduction to Matomo: Start with the basics of Matomo Analytics, understanding its importance in the digital world and how it stands out in the analytics landscape.
Diving into Matomo's Reporting API: Get a detailed walkthrough of the Matomo Reporting API, learning how to configure and use it effectively for customized data reporting.
Exploring Mistral AI: Understand the fundamentals of Mistal AI, its role in enhancing data analysis, and the possibilities it opens up when integrated with analytics tools.
Understanding Integration Limitations: Learn about the practical limitations and challenges in integrating Matomo with Mistral AI, including handling HTTP requests, user interface considerations, and utilizing the Mistral AI API.
Comprehensive API Methods Coverage: Delve deep into the numerous methods available in Matomo's API, from AbTesting to VisitsSummary. Each module will be explored to understand its application and how it can be used to extract meaningful insights.
Real-World Applications: Apply the concepts and techniques learned to real-world scenarios, ensuring you can apply these skills in your professional environment.
Who This Course Is For:
This course is ideal for web analysts, digital marketers, IT professionals, and anyone interested in mastering web analytics. Whether you're looking to enhance your skills for professional development or personal interest, this course offers the knowledge and practical experience you need.
Course Outcome:
By the end of this course, you will have a thorough understanding of both Matomo and Mistral AI, equipped with the skills to configure, analyze, and interpret web data effectively. You'll be able to make informed decisions based on comprehensive data analysis, taking your analytics capabilities to the next level.
target_audience: Web Analysts and Data Professionals: Individuals who regularly work with web analytics and are looking to deepen their understanding of Matomo's capabilities, especially in terms of its Reporting API.

Digital Marketing Specialists: Professionals in digital marketing who want to enhance their analytical skills and learn how to extract more nuanced insights from web data using advanced tools like Matomo and Mistral AI.
IT and Web Development Professionals: Those who are involved in website development and maintenance, and are interested in integrating advanced analytics and AI capabilities into their workflows.

Matomo Users Seeking Advanced Skills: Users already familiar with the basic functions of Matomo who want to upgrade their skills, particularly in terms of API utilization and integration with AI technologies.
Business Intelligence Analysts: Professionals who deal with large amounts of web data and require advanced tools to analyze and interpret this information for strategic decision-making.

Students and Academics in Relevant Fields: Students and researchers in fields like data science, marketing, and information technology who are interested in practical applications of web analytics and AI.
Tech Enthusiasts and Hobbyists: Individuals with a keen interest in web technologies, analytics, and AI, looking to expand their knowledge and skills in these areas.

courses.description:
Welcome to our course on using ChatGPT for your side gig! If you're looking to start a side hustle or improve your existing one, you've come to the right place. In this course, we'll be teaching you how to harness the power of ChatGPT, a cutting-edge language model developed by OpenAI, to generate high-quality text for a variety of applications.
ChatGPT is a powerful tool that can save you time and help you create better content for your side gig. Whether you're a blogger, social media manager, or content creator, ChatGPT can help you generate text that is engaging, well-written, and tailored to your audience.
We'll start by introducing you to the basics of ChatGPT, including how to access the model and input text. From there, we'll move on to more advanced topics, such as fine-tuning the model for specific tasks and integrating it into your workflow.
Throughout the course, we'll be providing step-by-step instructions and real-world examples to help you understand how to use ChatGPT in your own side gig. We'll cover a wide range of topics, including:
Writing website content: Learn how to use ChatGPT to generate high-quality blog posts, product descriptions, and other website content.
Creating social media posts: Discover how to use ChatGPT to create engaging and shareable social media posts that will help you grow your following.
Generating email campaigns: See how ChatGPT can help you create effective email campaigns that will engage your subscribers and help you build your business.
Writing books: ChatGPT can be used to generate high-quality text for novels, non-fiction books, and other types of literature. Learn how to use the model to write compelling stories or informative content that will engage your readers.
Creating videos: See how Chat GPT can help you write scripts for videos and create captions for your video content. You can also use it to generate subtitles for different languages, making your videos more accessible.
By the end of the course, you'll have a solid understanding of how to use ChatGPT to improve your side gig and generate high-quality text for a variety of applications. So why wait? Enroll now and start using ChatGPT to take your side gig to the next level!
Thanks.
-Steve B




I asked ChatGPT some questions about itself and here are the answers.
What is ChatGPT?
I am ChatGPT, a large language model developed by OpenAI. I use deep learning algorithms to understand natural language and generate responses to questions or prompts. Essentially, I'm a computer program designed to mimic human conversation and provide helpful answers and insights on a wide range of topics.
What Are The Benefits Of ChatGPT?
There are several benefits of using ChatGPT, including:
Availability: ChatGPT is available 24/7, so users can get answers to their questions or engage in conversation at any time of day.
Speed: ChatGPT is capable of processing large amounts of data quickly, so users can get responses to their queries in a matter of seconds.
Convenience: ChatGPT can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection, making it a convenient tool for people who need information or assistance on-the-go.
Consistency: ChatGPT's responses are consistent and accurate, regardless of the user's mood, tone, or location. This helps to ensure that users receive reliable information every time they use the service.
Personalization: ChatGPT can be trained on specific topics or industries, allowing it to provide personalized answers and insights tailored to the user's needs.
Overall, ChatGPT is a powerful tool that can help individuals and businesses save time and effort by providing quick, reliable, and personalized responses to their questions and queries.
target_audience: Anyone who is interested in using AI technology to improve their side hustle or business.

courses.description:
このコースでは、アンケートの結果データを適切に可視化する方法と、その可視化に必要なデータプレパレーションの方法を学びます。それらの知識やスキルを身につけることで、分析しやすい設問の構成が理解できるため、アンケート調査票の設計スキルが向上します。

アンケートサービスやアンケートフォームから入手可能な結果データの形式は、サービスやフォームによって異なり、以下のいずれかの形になります。


①選択肢ごとに列ができるフラグ形式
②設問ごとに列ができるコード形式


本講座では、いずれのデータ形式でも対応可能な知識とスキルを身につけることができるよう設計しています。


また、受講者の環境によって利用可能なデータプレパレーションツールや可視化ツールは異なると思います。本講座では、以下の2つの組み合わせを取り上げます。


a) Tableau Prepでデータプレパレーションを行い、Tableau Desktopで可視化を行う
b) SQLでデータプレパレーションを行い、Looker Studioで可視化を行う


取り扱うデータは、アンケートサービス Freeasyで実施した実際のデータ（スクリーニング調査結果、レコード数1000、及び、本調査結果、レコード数42）です。講座用に開発したダミーのデータではないため、臨場感をもって学習していただくことができます。


各レクチャーは「スライド」、あるいは「スライドとツールのデモ」で構成されています。スライドではデータプレパレーションやデータ可視化の概念的な理解について学習します。デモでは実際の操作を学ぶことができます。


ツール別に取り上げている内容を次の通りにリストします。


Tableau Prep Builder
データ接続
データクリーニング（フィールドの削除、フィールドの順序変更、フィルタ）
計算フィールドによる項目の追加
ピボット
結合
出力


Tableau Desktop
データ接続
グラフの作成（棒グラフ、ヒートマップ）
計算フィールド（集計計算、LOD計算）
色の編集
規定のプロパティの設定
フィルタ
パラメータ
ダッシュボードの作成
ストーリーの作成


SQL
SELECT
FROM
WHERE
ORDER BY
関数（IF、STRPOS、UNVIPOT）
結合（INNTER JOIN 、CROSS JOIN）
WITH


Looker Studio
データ接続
グラフの作成（棒グラフ、表、ピボットテーブル）
計算フィールドの作成
パラメータ
関数（COUNT_DISTINCT、SUM）
色の指定
ページの追加
コントロール

Apprenez à maîtriser Klaviyo et à propulser votre stratégie d'email marketing !


Ce cours complet vous guidera pas à pas pour créer des campagnes d'email marketing percutantes, automatiser vos séquences d'emails et concevoir des pop-ups efficaces qui capturent l’attention de vos visiteurs.

À la fin de ce cours, vous serez capable de construire une stratégie d'email marketing efficace et adaptée à vos objectifs, augmentant ainsi vos ventes et fidélisant votre clientèle.

Access tInterest in data-driven marketing and analytics.o a computer with internet connection.

courses.description:
In today's hypercompetitive digital landscape, marketers who can't predict market trends are already behind. While your competitors rely on guesswork and outdated analytics, this comprehensive course equips you with the AI-powered arsenal needed to anticipate customer behavior, forecast sales, and identify emerging opportunities before others even see them coming.
Designed specifically for digital and content marketers, this hands-on course takes you from AI fundamentals to advanced predictive modeling in just 6 hours. Unlike theoretical courses that leave you wondering how to apply concepts, we focus on practical implementation through real-world case studies and exercises you can immediately use in your marketing campaigns.
Through this course, you'll master:
Machine Learning Fundamentals - Understand the core concepts that power predictive marketing without needing a technical background
Data Collection & Preparation - Learn to gather, clean, and transform raw data into powerful marketing insights using feature engineering techniques
Exploratory Data Analysis - Discover patterns and relationships in your marketing data through statistical analysis and compelling visualizations
Predictive Model Building - Create sophisticated models using supervised and unsupervised learning to forecast customer behavior and market trends
Model Evaluation & Optimization - Ensure your predictions are accurate and reliable through cross-validation and hyperparameter tuning
Real-World Applications - Apply your skills to predict customer churn and forecast sales with two in-depth case studies
Strategic Implementation - Transform predictive insights into actionable marketing strategies for segmentation and personalization
By the end of this course, you'll possess the rare ability to leverage AI for data-driven marketing decisions that dramatically outperform traditional approaches. You'll join the elite group of marketers who can confidently predict outcomes rather than react to them.
Don't settle for marketing based on intuition when your competitors are advancing with AI. Enroll now and transform yourself from data-confused to prediction-powered in just a few hours. Your future marketing success depends on the decision you make today.
target_audience: Marketing professionals seeking to leverage AI and data analytics.
Entrepreneurs aiming to optimize business growth with AI tools.
Data enthusiasts wanting to explore marketing-focused machine learning.
Beginners interested in learning AI-driven marketing strategies.
Business analysts looking to enhance skills in predictive analytics.
Students or professionals transitioning into AI-powered marketing roles.

objectives: Refresh your knowledge of Google Analytics 101 to Advanced Google Analytics concepts.
Quickly learn Google Analytics

requirements: Basic Understanding of Google analytics
courses.description:
This course is for those who want to quickly learn Google Analytics.  Using this course you can prepare for your Google Analytics Job Interview and/or take Google Analytics Individual Qualification (GAIQ) test and become Google Analytics certified.
This course is designed to teach you Google Analytics as well prepare you for Google Analytics certification.
What covered in this course:
Over view of Web and Digital Analytics
Overview of Google Analytics interface and navigation
Google Analytics account structure
Overview of Various reports in Google Analytics
Google Analytics Data collection
Attribution models in Google Analytics
Segmentation in Google Analytics
Annotations and Alerts in Google Analytics


About the Google Analytics IQ assessment
The Google Analytics IQ assessment is designed to test your knowledge of digital analytics best practices and the Google Analytics. Passing the assessment will provide you Google Analytics IQ certification.


This certification will show your proficiency in Google Analytics and make you stand out from other candidates at your current job or future jobs.
The test has 70 questions and is 90 mins long. You’ll need a score of 80% to pass the assessment.
To keep your individual qualification current, you'll need to successfully pass the assessment every 12 months.
This course will cover key concepts that you are tested on and will also give a sample test that you can take to practice.  In addition to complete practice test, you will also get more questions to practice and brush up your knowledge of Google Analytics.
This course does not teach you full details of Google Analytics as the purpose is to teach you the key concept you need to know to pass this test.
Why you should learn from me?
I have been in Digital Marketing and Analytics for over 15 years. I have trained people from diverse backgrounds and have converted them into high performing Digital Marketers and Analysts.


I understand both the technology and marketing side of business.  I have dealt with many analytics technologies way before Google Tag Manager existed and know the inner working of Digital Analytics.
In addition, I have developed various courses and taught students from all over the world. I am online instructor for University of British Columbia (Canada), University of Washington (USA), Bellevue College (USA) and Digital Analytics Association.


I have an engineering degrees and an MBA.
I have several Best Sellers and Highest Rated courses on Udemy as well.
target_audience: Anybody who wants to be certified in Google Analytics
Anybody preparing for Google Analytics related roles
Anybody who wants to brush up their knowledge about Google Analytics.

courses.description:
Data is essential for making informed decisions about your website. You need to know more about your visitors, like where they’re coming from, how they access your website, and what content they’re interested in. This is why Google Analytics is an essential tool for uncovering the data that will provide these insights and allow you to take action.
During this course, you’ll learn the basics of Google Analytics so you can implement on your website, understand the reports available, and begin tracking your visitors’ behavior on your website.
***Updated Content***
Several new guides have been added to the course. After each section, you will find a step-by-step guide to completing important tasks mentioned in the previous videos. Feel free to download these PDFs for later use.
If you have any questions about the guides or set-up process, please post them in the discussion area, where Janet Driscoll Miller, a Google Analytics certified expert, can answer your questions.
target_audience: Do you have a website? Do you want to track your visitors and gather more data about their visits? Google Analytics can help you with this, and this course is definitely for you!

Are you ready to transform your business with an automated sales funnel that attracts, engages, and converts potential customers on autopilot?
Whether you're a business owner or a professional working at a business, if you are here, you know the power of Marketing Automation and how it helps businesses save time, streamline processes and focus on what really matters.

Enroll now and revolutionize your sales funnel with Marketing Automation and ChatGpt!




I have 13+ years of experience in Digital Marketing and have been working exclusively with Marketing Automation since 2018. I am a HubSpot expert and provide consulting and training services to businesses from all over the world. I am also a Udemy Partner and Bestseller Instructor. This is one of my latest student testimonials:

Thalita successfully managed to transfer her rich knowledge in a meticulous manner. This course is easy to comprehend and incorporate into your business strategy." Tamara Biljman, Content Strategist


Important things to know about this course:
* It's possible to take this course and make adaptations in case you only have a ChatGpt free account. However, you won't have access to the flowcharts we will design together. If you are using a ChatGpt free account, you will have to adapt the prompts used in the course to achieve satisfactory results. In this course, I will be showing you how to do things using a PAID CHATGPT ACCOUNT.
* In this course, I am going from the assumption that you have access to a Marketing Automation tool (a platform in which you can build automated email sequences, and automate business processes in general). If you don't have access to a Marketing Automation tool, check out the course's first lecture to get a link for a free trial, just so that you can at least complete the course.

We'll start from the very basics and go through 7 practical dashboards, which will show you the possibilities of how to work with Google Analytics data in spreadsheets.
You'll learn how to create monthly and hourly website monitoring, how to see the checkout steps flow in time, how to match data from internal search engine and bidding keywords, etc.
target_audience: Everyone who is regularly creating Google Analytics reports
GA users who spend more than 1 hour a week by manually creating a report from Google Analytics data

courses.description:
作为一名信息流投放从业者，你在投放工作中是否经常遇到这些问题：互联网竞争白热化，流量成本越来越贵？选择跟乙方合作，但是经常被坑？绞尽脑汁却缺乏创意，陷入抄袭？明明做了很多，但事倍功半、效果甚微？新平台火起来，不知道该不该跟进投放？
本课程专为解决这些问题而设，三节课特别邀请到拥有11年+从业经验的投放操盘手周超老师，带你了解信息流广告与信息流投放策略，为你详细拆解信息流投手常见的工作问题，教你掌握投放策略制定方法论和数据分析心法，还将带你展望未来，帮作为投手的你规划职业未来。是你实现量大、成本低、转化高等投放目标的操作指南。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。

courses.title: Transforme Leads em Clientes no WhatsApp com ManyChat
courses.bio: Descubra a Arte da Automação Inteligente para Nunca Mais Perder um Lead

Introdução: A Estratégia Ideal para Atrair Leads Qualificados
Defina 2-5 perguntas fundamentais para qualificar seus leads
Setup Inicial do ManyChat: Realize o setup inicial do seu ManyChat
Seu site ou landing page: Crie seu site ou LP com o Wordpress
Envie mensagens em massa para seus conta: Envie mensagens em massa para seus contatos

requirements: Conta no WhatsApp Business: Uma conta ativa no WhatsApp Business (gratuita) associada a um número de telefone dedicado para sua empresa
Conta no ManyChat: Não é necessário ter uma conta previamente - mostraremos como criar e configurar durante o curso
Site ou landing page: Idealmente, ter acesso à administração de um site WordPress ou estar disposto a criar uma landing page simples
Familiaridade com WhatsApp: Uso básico do aplicativo como usuário
courses.description:
Este curso estratégico oferece um método completo para transformar seu WhatsApp em uma poderosa ferramenta de vendas através do ManyChat. Você aprenderá a criar sistemas de automação inteligentes que respondem instantaneamente aos leads, mesmo fora do horário comercial, garantindo que nenhuma oportunidade seja perdida por atrasos no atendimento. O curso demonstra como qualificar contatos através de formulários estratégicos cuidadosamente elaborados, coletando informações essenciais que permitem personalizar cada interação subsequente.
Através de técnicas avançadas de segmentação, você descobrirá como categorizar seus leads com base em critérios específicos como intenção de compra, orçamento disponível e necessidades particulares, direcionando-os para jornadas de conversão otimizadas. O programa integra princípios de storytelling e psicologia de persuasão para criar sequências de mensagens que mantêm conversas personalizadas e naturais, mesmo sendo totalmente automatizadas.
O diferencial deste treinamento está na implementação prática de um funil de vendas automatizado que trabalha ininterruptamente, 24 horas por dia, 7 dias na semana, filtrando apenas os melhores leads e liberando sua equipe para focar exclusivamente nas conversas com maior potencial de conversão. Você aprenderá a configurar sistemas de follow-up que mantêm o engajamento por até 30 dias, recuperando leads que normalmente seriam perdidos, e aumentando significativamente suas taxas de conversão sem a necessidade de expandir sua equipe ou aumentar custos operacionais.
target_audience: Empreendedores e proprietários de pequenos negócios que desejam otimizar o processo de vendas e aumentar a taxa de conversão de leads sem precisar expandir sua equipe
Profissionais de marketing digital que buscam implementar soluções de automação para qualificar melhor os leads antes de enviá-los para a equipe de vendas
Gestores de equipes comerciais que enfrentam desafios com tempo de resposta e qualificação de leads no ambiente digital
Consultores e profissionais de serviços que precisam otimizar seu processo de atendimento enquanto mantêm uma imagem profissional
Agências de marketing e profissionais freelancers que desejam oferecer soluções de automação de WhatsApp como serviço para seus clientes
