courses.description:
Bonjour et bienvenue dans ce cours sur "Automatiser son marketing de A à Z, et bien plus!"

Je m’appelle Elliot,

Passionné entrepreneuriat, et notamment dans les domaines du e-commerce et du marketing. Je m’efforce à vous dévoiler les techniques utilisées par les plus grands e-commerçants du monde.

Et j’ai déjà plus de 25 000 élèves sur mes cours.

Alors vous êtes entre de bonnes-mains !

*****************************************************************************

Regardez les commentaires des autres étudiants sur mes cours :

"Super cours, très clair et didactique, je recommande" 5 étoiles

"Ce cours est très intéressant et très clair. Pour l'instant je suis plus que satisfait." 4.5 étoiles

"C'est exactement ce que je cherchais merci" 4,5 étoiles

"Excellent cours ça va sûrement m'aider pour me lancer." 5 étoiles

*****************************************************************************

Quel que soit votre entreprise, l'automatisation est la clé de la réussite et devrait être l'objectif ultime pour ceux qui cherchent à construire au moins un revenu à six chiffres sur internet. Mais tout automatiser n'est pas toujours facile et les gens se retrouvent souvent coincés dans une recherche sans fin, ou ils ne savent pas par où commencer (et où s’arrêter).
Ce cours vous propose un contenu condensé, rapide et efficace pour automatiser tout votre marketing. En fait, il est même probable que vous aurez trop de choix et je vais vous guider pour choisir les meilleures pour votre business.

*****************************************************************************
Donc, où que vous soyez dans votre voyage dans le monde du e-commerce, ce cours est fait pour vous.
Comme toujours, je vous attends, impatient de partager avec vous !
-Elliot
target_audience: Toute personne souhaitant gagner un temps énorme (et de l'argent) pour son business.
Ou qui cherche à automatiser son marketing /son business pour pouvoir être libre.

courses.description:
Domina Google Looker Studio (antes Google Data Studio) y lleva tus habilidades de análisis de datos al siguiente nivel
Este curso completo de Google Looker Studio está diseñado para enseñarte, paso a paso, cómo transformar datos en visualizaciones impactantes y reportes automatizados de alto nivel. Ideal tanto para principiantes como para quienes ya tienen experiencia en herramientas de análisis de datos, te guiará desde los fundamentos hasta técnicas avanzadas de visualización y conexión de bases de datos.
A lo largo del curso, aprenderás a:
Navegar por la interfaz de Looker Studio y entender su modelo de datos.
Conectar múltiples fuentes de datos, incluyendo la cuenta demo de Google Analytics 4.
Aplicar filtros, campos calculados, parámetros y expresiones regulares para manipular datos de forma efectiva.
Unir y combinar datos de diferentes fuentes para crear reportes más potentes.
Diseñar dashboards claros, funcionales y visualmente atractivos aplicando principios de visualización de datos.
Implementar buenas prácticas en analítica digital orientadas a la toma de decisiones basada en datos.
Este curso no solo te enseña a usar la herramienta antes conocida como Google Data Studio, sino que te prepara para utilizar Looker Studio como una herramienta clave en cualquier entorno profesional donde el análisis de datos y la presentación visual sean fundamentales.
Ya sea que trabajes en marketing digital, análisis de negocio, periodismo de datos o inteligencia empresarial, aprenderás a contar historias con datos y generar reportes automatizados que impacten.
Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu camino hacia el dominio total de Google Looker Studio.
target_audience: Este curso está diseñado para profesionales de datos, analistas de negocios, gerentes de datos, así como especialistas en marketing, marketing digital, publicistas, paid media specialists, SEOs y community managers. Está dirigido a aquellos que buscan ampliar sus habilidades en análisis digital mediante el uso de Looker Studio.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Marketing Mix Modeling: Learn by Doing
courses.bio: Mastering Marketing Mix Modeling: From Fundamentals to Hands-On Practice
objectives: Understand the Fundamentals of Marketing Mix Modeling
Identify the data required to run an MMM project
Master the different steps of the Marketing Mix Modeling workflow
Apply the MMM workflow in a Real Project and deliver MMM actionable Insights
Develop Analytical Thinking Skills Tailored to Marketing Mix Modeling

Introduction: Introduction to the Fundamentals of MMM Course
MMM Workflow - Core Concepts: Data Analytics and Cross-Industry Standard Process for Data Mining (CRISP DM)
MMM Workflow - Practice Project: How to Install the Specialist Software MassTer?
Data Collection and Understanding - Prac: Step 3.1: Organize Your Data in MassTer
Step 3.2: Organize Your Data in MassTer-Group Structure
Data Collection and Understanding - Bonu: Explore Module - Compare, Correlation Matrix & Period
Data Processing & Transformation - Core: MMM Core Concepts: Data Processing - Calendar Variables
MMM Core Concepts: Data Processing - Processed Variables
MMM Core Concepts: Data Processing - Chain Processing

requirements: Basic understanding of marketing principles
Comfort with data analysis
courses.description:
Marketing Mix Modeling (MMM) has become one of the most important tools for measuring marketing effectiveness. But learning it can feel overwhelming—too much theory, too much code, and not enough connection to real business challenges. This course was designed to change that.
In this hands-on program, you’ll go beyond the theory and actually practice the full MMM workflow. You’ll learn how to prepare data, build models, interpret results, and translate numbers into decisions. Along the way, you’ll work with a realistic dataset and complete exercises that mirror the messy, imperfect challenges you’ll face in the real world.
By the end of the course, you’ll understand not just the “science” of MMM, but also the “art”—how to connect models to marketing strategy, business objectives, and media planning. You’ll also gain a practical toolkit that you can immediately put to use in your day-to-day job, making measurement less intimidating and far more actionable for your entire team.
This isn’t just another course where you watch lectures and move on. It’s a practical, learn-by-doing experience that will give you the skills and confidence to start applying MMM in your work. Whether you’re a marketer, analyst, or consultant, you’ll leave fully prepared and confident.
target_audience: Marketing managers and brand strategists seeking to understand how MMM can help them measure and improve ROI across channels.
Media planners and buyers aiming to understand the principles of MMM to allocate budgets more effectively.
Business intelligence professionals interested in applying statistical models to marketing data.
Consultants and agency professionals who support clients with marketing performance analysis.

Este curso veremos las opciones que se pueden realizar con Data Studio, pero los conceptos más avanzados se encuentran disponible en mi catálogo de cursos. [A-Z] Google Data Studio crea reportes, informes y dashboard


¿Si quiero profundizar conceptos de visualización de datos?
Este curso veremos las opciones que se pueden realizar con Data Studio, pero si necesitas conocer parte de fundamentos de visualización puedes tomar el curso gratuito Fundamentos de visualización de datos


¿Si quiero aprender una herramienta como Power BI, Tableau?
Puede tomar el curso [A-Z] Avanza con Power BI analítica y visualización de datos


¿ A quién está dirigido este curso?
Principalmente para convertirse en Technical Digital Analyst, la nueva figura profesional con mucha demanda en agencias y empresas de marketing y de medios, un híbrido entre los desarrolladores front y analistas digitales, que entienden de negocio, objetivos, marketing y campañas, así como medir correctamente los eventos de los usuarios, realizar testing de CRO y analizar los datos a través de insights en Google Data Studio o similar. Sin duda es un curso con módulos más técnicos que te prepara para este trabajo.
¿Necesitas asesoramiento personalizado?
Los cursos avanzados también son disponibles a través de tutoría personalizadas. Puedes buscar mi perfil y contratar la tutoría en Superprof: superprof es marcusRB o a través de mi web personal.


El curso será impartido por:
Marco Russo:
Vengo del mundo de la economía y finanza, he trabajado como financial advisor en BBVA para banca de inversión, pasando por el Marketing Digital y especialista de tráfico de pago (Google Ads). La pasión por resolver problemas me motiva a estudiar Business Analytics & Data Analytics y mantener este perfil híbrido de (business e informática).
Actualmente conozco y trabajo con los siguientes lenguajes JavaScript, SQL, Python, R. He trabajado como front/back principalmente con HTML, CSS, PHP, Go para las tareas de creación de analítica de medición. Especializado en minería de datos, marketing digital, SEO SEM, y conjuntamente con la explotación y visualización de datos.
He creado hace años tres escuelas de formación KPIschool, DataSchool y aiSchool proyecto en pleno crecimiento. Separados por programas de fundamentos y avanzados de Digital Marketing (Google Ads, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Data Studio y Optimize, y Data Science: Big Data y modelado de datos, base de datos SQL y noSQL, Python, Lenguaje R, Data Visualization y de Business Intelligence. Disciplina STEM, cuáles Raspberry Pi y Arduino, e IoT Internet de las cosas además de las herramientas de análisis y visualización de datos, Power BI, Tableau.
Finalmente tengo muchas cualidades como profesor y tutor desde analítica digital a analítica de datos. Desde 2012  como docente en programas de másters y postgrados en diversas escuelas de negocios, entre ellas EAE Business School, IMF, IIM Instituto de Marketing, AdveiSchool, Digital Brain, Neoland, Fictizia además de formador en la Cámara de Comercio de Madrid y otras tantas asociaciones y cooperativas.
Creador de varios cursos de digital marketing en plataformas premium, seminarios y webinar en varias escuelas de negocio. Además de ser profesor colaborador con la Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (asignaturas de visualización de datos, minería de datos y machine learning) y tutor del máster oficial de Data Science.
Actualmente estoy colaborando en diferente proyectos de formación acercándome más al mundo americano, especialmente Perú, Colombia, México, Argentina, Chile, entre otros con planes de aprendizaje más a medida del alumno.

courses.description:
This course is designed to equip you with the essential skills and knowledge to optimize your website's performance and drive more conversions. By understanding the intricacies of the conversion funnel, leveraging powerful tools like GA4 and Clarity, and conducting thorough audits of your website's UX, UI, and SEO, you'll learn how to create a seamless customer journey and maximize your website's revenue potential.
You'll begin by delving into the fundamentals of CRO, including the conversion funnel and the importance of UTM parameters for tracking and analyzing your website's performance. Next, you'll explore how to integrate GA4 and Clarity with your website to gain valuable insights into user behavior and identify areas for improvement.
Throughout the course, you'll learn to conduct
In-depth audits of various aspects of your website, including user experience, user interface, e-commerce structure, website load time, internal site search, browser and mobile responsiveness, on-page SEO, product pages, color psychology, and the checkout process etc.
Analyzing qualitative data from Clarity, you'll gain a deeper understanding of your users' needs and preferences, enabling you to make data-driven decisions to enhance your website's conversion rate.
By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the tools and strategies to optimize your website for maximum conversions, increase your customer base, and drive significant growth for your business.

Odkryj potężne narzędzia automatyzacji marketingu i CRM, które zmienią sposób, w jaki prowadzisz swój biznes! Ten kurs to nie tylko doskonała okazja dla doświadczonych specjalistów oraz osób rozpoczynających karierę w marketingu automation, ale także dla przedsiębiorców i właścicieli biznesów.
Dzięki zawartym lekcjom będziesz w stanie zoptymalizować i zautomatyzować działania swojej firmy, co pozwoli Ci skupić się na zadaniach kreatywnych i strategicznych, eliminując konieczność zatrudniania dodatkowych specjalistów i ponoszenia kosztów stałych. Dzięki temu będziesz mógł skupić się na rozwijaniu swojego biznesu oraz realizowaniu innowacyjnych strategii, które zapewnią Ci przewagę konkurencyjną na rynku. Kurs ten nie tylko pomoże Ci w efektywnym zarządzaniu działaniami marketingowymi, ale także wskaże sposoby na zwiększenie efektywności działań sprzedażowych oraz budowę trwałych relacji z klientami.
Oprócz typowych zagadnień dotyczących marketing automation, poruszymy również kwestie personalizacji, segmentacji, testów A/B, narzędzi CRM, email automation oraz integracji z różnymi narzędziami i systemami. Przeanalizujemy wyzwania specjalisty ds. automatyzacji i pokażę konkretne case study, jak zastosować automatyzację w różnych obszarach biznesowych, w tym w e-commerce. Nie zabraknie również rozmów na temat lejka sprzedażowego i przygotowania planu wdrożenia automatyzacji.
Poznasz nie tylko kluczowe techniki z zakresu automatyzacji marketingu, ale również dowiesz się, czego konkretnie oczekują rekruterzy, co pomoże Ci zdobyć wymarzoną pracę w tej dziedzinie.
Wyposażę Cię w niezbędną wiedzę i umiejętności, abyś mógł/mogła osiągnąć sukces w swojej branży. Niezależnie od tego, czy dopiero rozpoczynasz swoją przygodę z marketingiem automation, czy jesteś doświadczonym przedsiębiorcą, ten kurs zapewni Ci narzędzia i strategie niezbędne do osiągnięcia zamierzonych celów.
Po ukończeniu kursu, dzięki zadaniom, które pogłębią Twoją wiedzę, otrzymasz spersonalizowany certyfikat ukończenia, który będzie doskonałym dodatkiem do Twojego CV. Nie zwlekaj - zapisz się już dziś i otwórz drzwi do nowych możliwości w świecie marketingu!

objectives: GA4 초기 세팅 가이드 및 개념 이해

Windows OS 기반으로 실습이 진행되므로, Windows 환경에서의 강의 수강을 추천해드립니다.
courses.description:
"어제보다 성장하겠습니다. 그리고, 어제보다 성장하려는 사람을 돕겠습니다."


마소캠퍼스의 진심과 소망을 담은 Actionable Content로,
2013년부터 온오프라인으로 함께해 온 누적 강의 1억시간!
이 소중한 경험과 시간은 언제나 마소캠퍼스와 수강생 모두의 성장의 원천입니다.


-


GA4 왜 배워야 할까요?
오프라인 매장의 경우, 어떤 고객들이 어떤 여정을 거쳐 상품을 최종 구매하는지 눈으로 확인할 수 있어 주력 상품의 마케팅을 바로 실행할 수 있습니다. 그러나 규모가 계속해서 커지고 있는 온라인 시장에서 활발하게 소비하고 있는 고객들의 여정은 눈으로 직접 볼 수가 없죠.
웹사이트와 모바일 앱에서 이벤트 기반으로 데이터를 사용하는 Google Analytics 4는, 온라인에서의 고객 여정을 자세히 파악하여 캠페인 성과와 인사이트를 쉽게 얻을 수 있도록 합니다. 즉 GA4는 단순히 데이터를 분석하기 위한 툴이 아닌, ‘소비자’를 이해하고 비즈니스의 방향성을 ‘개선’하기 위한 툴입니다.
2023년 7월 UA(유니버설 애널리틱스) 서비스가 종료되면서 데이터 수집은 GA4를 통해서만 가능하게 될 것입니다. UA 종료 시점에 GA4를 도입한다면 이전의 데이터를 확인할 수 없기 때문에 미리 도입하여 데이터를 적재해두어야 하죠. 따라서 GA4를 처음 도입하는 기업뿐만 아니라 UA를 이용하고 있던 기업들도 이제는 GA4를 시작해야만 할 때가 됐습니다. 특히 세션 기준으로 데이터를 집계하는 UA와 달리, 이벤트와 각 이벤트의 매개변수를 기반으로 데이터가 측정되는 GA4는 기본 보고서가 아닌 탐색 분석을 통해 더 깊은 분석이 가능합니다.
하지만 맨 땅에서 시작하고자 하면 조작이 간단한 UA와 다르게 GA4의 기본적인 세팅부터 외부 데이터 연동과 데이터 활용 및 보고서를 생성하여 시각화하는 방법을 몰라 아까운 데이터만 흘려보내게 됩니다. 이에 마소캠퍼스가 본 강좌를 통해 GA4의 전체적인 개념과 핵심 데이터 처리 구조의 이해를 통해 캠페인을 개선할 수 있는, 온라인 시장에서의 ‘눈’을 만들어 드리겠습니다.




이제는 선택이 아닌 필수가 되어버린 GA4! 더 이상 미루지 말고 <GA4 데이터 분석 입문> 하나로 지금 바로 시작해보세요!


Step 1. Google Analytics 4 이해하기
이벤트? 로그? Dimension? 아직은 생소한 GA4의 용어와 기능! 최신 버전 GA4 기반의 강의로 GA의 진화 과정부터 기본적인 기능과 세팅 방법을 학습합니다. 구글 데모 계정을 이용한 실습이 진행되므로 기업 웹사이트 또는 고객 데이터가 없더라도 누구나 학습 가능합니다. 사내에서 개발자 없이 GA4를 도입하는 분들도 복잡하지 않고 간단하게 추적 코드 동작 과정을 익혀 데이터를 수집할 수 있습니다.
Step 2. GA4 핵심 데이터 처리 구조 살펴보기
GA4에서는 구글이 자동으로 측정하는 이벤트 외에도 내 비즈니스에 맞는 이벤트까지 직접 구현 가능합니다. Gtag.js 를 활용하여 이벤트를 추적하는 방법을 소개하고 전자상거래 데이터를 쉽게 확인할 수 있도록 합니다.
맞춤 이벤트를 정의하면 웹사이트/앱 내에서 우리 고객들이 어떻게 행동하고 어디서 들어왔는지 파악할 수 있어 유의미한 인사이트를 얻을 수 있습니다.
Step 3. GA4 자유 형식 보고서로 탐색적 데이터 분석하기
내가 원하는 GA4 보고서를 설계하고 다양한 측정 기준을 지정해 인사이트를 도출해낼 수 있고, 기존 트래픽 중심이었던 GA3(UA)에서 전환 이벤트 중심으로 변경되면서 기존보다 더욱 다양하고 상세한 관점으로 자유 보고서를 추가하면서 데이터를 탐색적으로 볼 수 있는 능력을 키울 수 있습니다.

데이터를 관리하고 성과를 개선하기 위한 필수 도구 GA4!
GA4의 핵심 개념과 구조에 대한 상세한 설명을 통해 구글 애널리틱스 활용 방법을 학습하는 과정!


[ 강 사 소 개 ]
김 진
現 마소캠퍼스 대표
서울대학교 MBA 졸업
오라클, 네이버를 거쳐 중국 네이버 개발 아웃소싱 센터를 설립 및 지휘하였으며, 서울대 MBA 졸업 후 글로벌 모바일 기업인 Obigo로 옮겨 데이터 분석에 기반한 성과 관리 시스템 도입 등 국내외 다양한 사업 영역을 개척하였습니다. 2010년에는 게임웹진 플레이포럼 M&A 후 데이터 분석과 디지털 마케팅을 실무에 본격 도입해 코리안클릭 수치 기준으로 월 평균 활성유저(MAU) 238만, 월 평균 페이지뷰(PV)수 1,700만을 달성하였습니다. 개발자, 전문 경영인의 길을 걸어온 사업가로서 폭넓은 경험과 IT 기술을 융합해 현재는 기업의 ROI를 높여줄 실무 전문가 교육에 힘 쓰고 있습니다.

courses.title: Google Analytics Set Up - Step by Step Guide to Audit it.
courses.bio: Achieve Advanced Google Analytics Audit Mastery. Validate Google Analytics Setup, Correct and Fine Tune it.
objectives: Properly setup Google Analytics from get go.
Audit Google Analytics setup to make sure your are collecting the right data.
Audit Google Analytics user permissions to secure your data.
Get a template that you can use to audit Google Analytics setup.
Correct Google Analytics setup.
Trust data collected by Google Analytics.

Introduction: Understanding Account Structure in Google Analytics
Step by Step Audit of Google Analytics s: Audit Google Analytics Tags with Google Tag Assistant

requirements: Basic Understanding of Google Analytics
courses.description:
A large number of Google Analytics setups I have come across are either broken or are not set up properly. If the setup is not right then why even look at the data since it is not going to be correct.
The wrong setup leads to wrong insights and hence wrong decisions. These wrong decisions are very expensive and many times irreversible.
Considering these issues, I have developed a course that provides you step by step instructions on how to audit your Google Analytics setup. It also provides a template that you can use to audit your Google Analytics (GA) set up on regular basis. Whether you are a Google Analytics 101 level or are an advanced Google Analytics user, this course is going to help you ensure that you are collecting the right data.
In this course, I will teach you how to ensure that your Google Analytics configuration is correct so that you can be confident about the data it collects.
Don't waste your time analyzing Google Analytics data before you have gone through this course.
This is a must-have course for anybody who uses Google Analytics.
There are too many people wasting time and resources on reporting and optimization before having fixed the measurement part.
However, the issue with this out-of-the-box setup is that accounts often contain spam sessions, internal sessions, no or little goal tracking and inaccurate e-commerce tracking. As a result, this can mean inaccurate measurement and can make it harder to identify and debug website issues.
To help you through this I have put together a Google Analytics audit checklist which I will continue to keep up to date as Google Analytics rolls out new features and functionality.
This is the same checklist we use to audit our clients' setup and charge our clients thousands of dollars.  You can use the template and save that money. That is called great ROI.
If you are already familiar with Google Analytics and know why something is required or not required then you can just jump to the Audit template, which by itself, is worth the value of this course.  If you do want to go through the reason then you can watch videos to figure why something should be checked and audited.
Why you should learn from me?
I have been in Digital Marketing and Analytics for over 15 years. I have trained people from diverse backgrounds and have converted them into high-performing Digital Marketers and Analysts.  I understand both the technology and marketing side of the business.  I have dealt with many analytics technologies way before Google Tag manager existed and know the inner working of Digital Analytics.
In addition, I have developed various courses and taught students from all over the world. I am an online instructor for the University of British Columbia (Canada), University of Washington (USA), Bellevue College (USA), and Digital Analytics Association.
I have an engineering degree and an MBA.
target_audience: Anybody who wants to ensure that Google Analytics is setup properly
Anybody who does not believe their data in Google Analytics is correct
Anybody who has a very low bounce rate

courses.title: Forecasting con Python: ARIMA y Prophet para Negocios
courses.bio: Aprende a preparar datos, modelar y generar predicciones útiles de ventas y demanda con Python paso a paso.
objectives: Comprender los conceptos de series temporales, tendencia, estacionalidad y ruido.
Detectar y corregir outliers y problemas comunes en datos de negocio.
Construir modelos de forecasting con ARIMA y Prophet desde cero.

Exportar y automatizar predicciones en notebooks o scripts programados.

Rompiendo el hielo con las series tempor: Presentación del caso práctico de ventas y objetivos del curso
Comparación entre ARIMA, Prophet y modelos de ML/Deep Learning para dar contexto
Definición y usos comunes en analítica de negocios
Explicación de tendencia, estacionalidad y ruido
La aventura de preparar y explorar tus d: Carga de archivos y revisión inicial de la estructura
Corrección de outliers: stockouts, errores de carga y ventas anómalas
Ejemplo práctico con SQL para acceder a datos
Tratamiento de fechas, nulos, duplicados y outliers
Gráficos básicos de la evolución temporal

Revisión de autocorrelación, normalidad y estacionariedad de residuos
Modelos con estacionalidad explícita y regresores exógenos
Uso de auto_arima y análisis de funciones ACF y PACF
Ajuste del modelo ARIMA con datos de ventas reales
Cálculo de métricas MAPE y RMSE para validar precisión
Gráficos de predicción y comparación con datos observados
Predicciones al estilo Meta con Prophet: Instalación de Prophet y preparación del entorno de trabajo

Modificación de changepoints y su impacto en la tendencia

Gráficos de predicciones y análisis de componentes de la serie
El duelo final - ARIMA vs Prophet: Ventajas y desventajas de ARIMA y Prophet en forecasting
Métricas MAPE, RMSE, AIC y BIC para decidir entre ARIMA y Prophet
Buenas prácticas al presentar forecasts e intervalos de confianza
Comparación visual de modelos ARIMA y Prophet en predicciones
De la predicción a la decisión: Guardar predicciones en CSV y base de datos
Recomendaciones prácticas de uso en negocio
Principales fallos al modelar series temporales
Extensiones y técnicas adicionales para seguir aprendiendo
Exportar modelos a pickle y automatizar forecasts en notebooks o scripts

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de estadística y series temporales.
Familiaridad con Python y SQL (nivel básico).
Tener instalado Python y librerías como statsmodels, pmdarima y prophet.
Nociones de analítica de negocios (opcional, pero recomendable).
El curso está pensado para estudiantes y profesionales que buscan aplicar forecasting a problemas de negocio reales.
courses.description:
La predicción de series temporales es una de las tareas más importantes en analítica de negocios, ya que permite anticipar ventas, precios, demanda o cualquier variable que evoluciona en el tiempo. En este curso aprenderás a aplicar paso a paso dos de los modelos más utilizados en forecasting: ARIMA y Prophet.
Comenzaremos con una introducción a los fundamentos: qué son las series temporales, sus componentes (tendencia, estacionalidad y ruido) y cómo preparar los datos corrigiendo outliers, valores nulos y duplicados. Verás cómo usar SQL y Python para cargar y limpiar información real de ventas.
Luego entrarás en el modelado con ARIMA, entendiendo los parámetros p, d, q, aplicando auto_arima y validando supuestos como autocorrelación, estacionariedad y normalidad de residuos. Aprenderás a calcular métricas de precisión como MAPE y RMSE, y a visualizar los resultados comparados con datos reales.
Posteriormente, exploraremos Prophet, una herramienta desarrollada por Meta que simplifica la creación de modelos de predicción. Verás cómo incorporar variables exógenas (promociones, precios), ajustar changepoints, personalizar parámetros de estacionalidad y holidays, y generar gráficos de componentes para explicar mejor las predicciones.
También compararemos ambos modelos con métricas avanzadas como AIC y BIC, destacando ventajas y desventajas de cada enfoque. El curso cierra con buenas prácticas para presentar forecasts al negocio, incluyendo intervalos de confianza, visualizaciones claras y almacenamiento de resultados en CSV o bases de datos.
Como proyecto final, aprenderás a automatizar predicciones exportando modelos a pickle y programando notebooks o scripts recurrentes.
Este curso combina teoría, práctica y casos reales, ideal para quienes buscan dominar forecasting con ARIMA y Prophet en entornos de negocio.
target_audience: Analistas de datos, científicos de datos y profesionales de BI.
Equipos de marketing, ventas y finanzas que necesitan proyecciones confiables.
Estudiantes o autodidactas interesados en machine learning aplicado a series temporales.
Profesionales que quieran comparar métodos clásicos (ARIMA) con modernos (Prophet).

requirements: パソコン
WordPressブログ
SUMO
courses.description:
ところで、ブログからリストを獲得できていますか？


いまだに、ブログにバナーを貼ったり、メルマガ登録フォームを置いたりして、リストを収集していませんか？


もっと効率よく、洗練されたリストビルディングの仕組みがあれば知りたいですよね。


これは、海外のリストビルディングツール「SUMO（スモ）」の使い方が最速で学べるコースです。


SUMOを使えば、WordPressブログにCTAポップアップを表示して、一旦LPに飛ばし、LPから質の高いリストを獲得する仕組みが作れます。


この仕組みは、インバウンドマーケティングで有名なHubSpot（ハブスポット）が行っているリストビルディングと全く同じ方法です。


だから、あなたも最先端のマーケティング企業が行っている実証済みのリスト獲得の仕組みを作りたいなら、このコースを受講する価値があると思います。


このコースでは、CTAポップアップとは何かということから始めて、CTAポップアップを実装すべき理由や、SUMOを使ってCTAポップアップをWordPressブログに実装する具体的な手順まで、実際に手を動かしながら学んでいきます。


初めてSUMOという名前を耳にするという初心者でも、レクチャーに沿って作業を行えば、無理なくCTAポップアップを実装できるように構成された講座です。


セクションは4つに分かれており、全部で31レクチャーあります。レクチャーは以下の順番で進んでいきます。


セクション1：CTAポップアップを理解する
セクション2：SUMOを理解する

courses.description:
Now You Can Learn The Secrets of the World's Most Successful Online Marketers!
If you can't measure it, you can't manage it! ~ Peter Drucker
Track, measure, and improve that which is working in your business, and the bottlenecks minimizing success. Understanding where to look, what to look for, and what to do with what you see will change everything you do in your business...
Best part: You can check everything out for FREE if you choose!
If you're looking for an “insider" shortcut guide to creating success online that will supercharge your business, your wealth, and give you your life back, then you've gotta read every word on this page.
Because what you're about to learn will bring you whatever you desire in life.
… Buckets of money…… the awe and respect of people who now doubt you…… time to spend with your family and friends…… a new life without financial worry or indecision.
You can get it with …
Google Analytics Mastery eCourse!
...and the reason why...To be successful in business and in life you must have laser focus, and consistent action towards what's working. The secret is to know what's working, and not be distracted one bit by all the blinking new channels, tools, and sites that beg for your attention.
Most people in business can get some traffic to their website, typically spend some time on Facebook or Twitter or any of the many social media sites available to them, and may do some basic search engine optimization. But when it comes to being “successful online", most don't have the time or direction to know where and what to focus on. So we try to do it all – “jack of all trades, master of none"
Look. Everyone has access to Facebook, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn, blah blah blah. The fact is your customers are really there too. They're searching on Google, they're hanging out on Facebook. So why then do most businesses just spin their wheels and flounder around in search of success?
Think of it this way – anyone can own a set of golf clubs. Typically there's an assortment of 10 or more clubs in the bag – and you can whack the little dimpled thing with any one of those clubs.
But to play golf well…to be a master of the game and make the ball go exactly where you want it to go…then you need to know what clubs to use and when. You need to know when the #7 club will put you within inches of your goal where #8 or 9 will leave you in the rough, lost in the sea of all the other golfers.
… you need the inside secrets you will not discover casually on your own.
It's the same with analysis.
The advanced, mega powerful secrets do not appear to you magically, just because now you're in the position of having to sell something. You need a guide.
Google Analytics Mastery is that guide.
It guides you by the hand and leads you through the hell of understanding Google Analytics…
… past the explosion of reports staring back at you on your screen…… past the smoking wreckage of failed business and ruined dreams……and directly to action based steps that will produce ethical wealth and heavenly happiness that will bring you to tears.
This is the “insider" course we wish was around when we were starting out online.  Learning even one or two of these secrets would have short-cut our own success by… oh… five… maybe ten years.  Probably more.
Included in this best-selling eCourse Now Available On Udemy are secrets most businesses never discover… such as:
How to quickly and properly set-up Google Analytics to reap the rewards of accurate data
The magic of tracking goals – and why you can't afford not to have this functioning
How to make advertising dollars go further with connecting cost per click results to your web analytics
Very simple strategy to know where to focus on search engine optimization – what key phrases are worthwhile and which ones are a waste of your time
Why your current data might be wrong, and a quick simple fix to solve it
How to navigate this endless realm of reports and crush the overwhelm – (Looking right over our shoulder we guide you on our screen)
How to analyze in lightning speed by looking only at the data you need to see
Why potential customers immediately bolt for the exit on your web site – and you didn't even realize you had a problem!
How to look at the information visually if you're not a numbers person – or just hate the endless numbers
The insanely effective secret of marketers and what they're looking at
How to explode your offline marketing results through measuring strategies – yes even newspaper advertising can be tracked
What is really driving sales or leads to your business, and whats just wasting your time
How to spy on your prospects and see whats working with them on your site
How some marketing affects other marketing and whether it turns to money
How to discover why your web sites failing within minutes of scanning the data
How to measure a social media strategy immediately – we're talking the second you hit enter on that tweet or Facebook update
Why certain pages on your web site are killing your business
What content on your web site you shouldn't touch – or risk back-tracking months or even years of progress
What the search engines really think your business is about and how to fix it
And… the mystery behind online success, how some marketers seem to do everything right, and how you can apply this priceless observations to your business
…and this is just the beginning. Once you have the basics down, taking actionable, measurable steps towards marketing improvement is easy.
That's just a small sample of what you'll find in this members only eCourse. There is over 5 hours of video training, watching our screens as we guide you to becoming an analytics master. And give you the roadmap you need to start creating your own ridiculously successful marketing campaigns.
The trainings are on average 10 minutes in length. This is a powerful way to learn… watch the video, then apply the learning to your own business! Progress at your own pace or cram all weekend long and implement everything. Whichever works best for you.
In addition, there is over 3 hours of special video case studies for online business management included... This is where the rubber hits the road and we apply all you've learned to real businesses, real data, real lives!
Plus (and probably more critical than any other part of the course) in addition to the all that you get in the members area training – you also receive Lifetime Membership to our monthly members only advanced trainings! Every month we continue to guide you by way of live webinars, special reports, or recorded case studies for members only to advance your learning and your results.
When you think about it, this really isn't a training course you buy, rather an investment into your businesses foundation – membership that will continue to give back for years to come. In fact the course continues to evolve every month as our members grow from the advanced members only trainings. And because this isn't just what we teach, but what we do – if you get stuck, we're just a comment or email away as our Analytics team monitors the members area conversation.
I don't care if you've never looked at a single page of web analytics in your life. Or if you're a veteran just trying to get further ahead with your results. Or if you've tried every shiny object that's come along and failed.
None of that matters.
The ONLY thing that matters…is your desire to get started. To start measuring ALL YOUR efforts and with laser focus, start taking the right actionable steps that bring in sales and new customers in a flood, fast and furious.
This isn't brain surgery. You might be able to figure it all out on your own. Eventually.
Or you can take advantage of the 10+ years of bumps, successes and failures figuring out how to maximize our results, and reduce effort. We've certainly made our mistakes trying to figure all this out, where to focus, what was really working, and what was completely a waste of our time. Lost staring at computer screens for hours, days even weeks – not realizing the time spent was all in vain.
There is absolutely no sane reason why you should want to waste years of your own life attempting to cover this same ground.
This is the course we would have killed to own when we started out.

Anyone with a website
Anyone looking to improve sales and lead conversions
Online Business Managers Looking To Differentiate Themselves
Marketing Companies Interested In Guiding Clients To Better Results

objectives: Explore Looker Studio skillfully, customize the interface, and efficiently access specific reports to maximize productivity.

Using the Google Analytics 4 Demo Account

requirements: No prior knowledge is required; all you need is a computer, an internet connection, and a Gmail account.
courses.description:
This Google Looker Studio course (formerly Google Data Studio) is your ideal starting point to master one of the most essential tools for data analysis and visualization. Alongside Power BI and Tableau, Looker Studio is one of the most widely used platforms in the world of analytics, valued for its versatility and integration capabilities. This course is designed for beginners and professionals new to Looker Studio, providing a step-by-step guide through the fundamentals and equipping you with practical skills to create clear, functional, and impactful dashboards.


What will you learn?
You’ll begin by exploring the Looker Studio interface, understanding its data model, and connecting to data sources like Google Analytics 4’s Demo Account. Each lesson is designed to help you build a solid foundation in data analytics, empowering you to use Looker Studio confidently.
Throughout the course, you will:
Learn how to use each type of chart and understand its specific purpose.
Master connecting various data sources, including Google Analytics 4 and external datasets, to centralize your reporting.
Understand the core functionality of Looker Studio, from its basic tools to advanced capabilities.
Create and utilize calculated dimensions and metrics to customize your data analysis.
Apply key functions to transform, filter, and manipulate your data efficiently.
Create various report types and apply essential tools such as filters and regular expressions.
Manipulate and combine data using data blending to extract meaningful insights.
By the end of the course, you will have the skills to navigate Looker Studio with confidence, transforming raw data into clear and actionable reports.


Who is this course for?
This course is perfect for:
Digital marketers looking to track and report campaign performance.
Small business owners who want to visualize their business data efficiently.
Data analysts seeking an intuitive tool to present insights.
Students and professionals in fields such as economics, business, or IT, interested in building foundational skills in data visualization.
Anyone curious about digital analytics and eager to learn how to turn raw data into meaningful reports.


Industries where this knowledge applies:
The skills you’ll gain are invaluable in industries such as:
Digital marketing: Measure and optimize campaigns with interactive dashboards.
E-commerce: Track sales trends, customer behavior, and product performance.
Finance: Simplify reporting and showcase key metrics.
Healthcare: Visualize patient data and operational metrics for better decision-making.
Education: Analyze enrollment trends, student performance, and institutional data.


Why choose this course?
This introductory Looker Studio course focuses on practical applications, providing you with the tools and knowledge to excel in roles requiring data-driven decision-making. Whether you’re working in marketing, business, or analytics, the ability to create dynamic reports and analyze data effectively will set you apart.
Get ready to explore Google Looker Studio and unlock the power of data visualization. Let’s embark on this learning journey together and build a strong foundation for your success in the world of data analytics!
target_audience: This course is tailored for data professionals, business analysts, data managers, as well as marketing experts, digital marketers, advertisers, paid media specialists, SEOs, and community managers. It is intended for individuals looking to enhance their digital analytics skills through the use of Looker Studio

courses.title: Perilaku Konsumen
courses.bio: Perilaku Konsumen dalam Strategi Pemasaran
objectives: Mampu membuat kerangka untuk menganalisis masalah perilaku konsumen
Mampu memprediksi bagaimana konsumen akan bereaksi terhadap berbagai strategi pemasaran
Mampu memproses berdasarkan mental dan fisik konsumen dalam memperoleh, mengonsumsi, dan mengalami produk
Mampu membuat mekanisme pengaruh yang paling mungkin membuat konsumen mengubah sikap, keyakinan, dan, yang paling penting, tindakan mereka
Mampu mengaplikasikan konsep, teori, model, dan alat dalam pengembangan strategi pemasaran yang didorong oleh perilaku konsumen
Mampu membuat kerangka teoretis dan model yang sesuai untuk mengevaluasi situasi, mengembangkan opsi dan rekomendasi, serta menyampaikan presentasi
requirements: Tidak ada keahlian, pengalaman, ataupun alat tertentu yang dibutuhkan.
courses.description:
Mata kuliah Perilaku Konsumen membawa peserta ke dalam pemahaman mendalam tentang dinamika kompleks yang terlibat dalam keputusan pembelian dan cara merancang strategi pemasaran yang efektif. Kita semua sebagai konsumen memiliki keunikannya masing-masing, membuat tantangan tersendiri bagi para pemasar. Kursus ini mengajak peserta untuk menjelajahi area menarik perilaku konsumen, di mana setiap harinya kita terpapar oleh berbagai stimuli pemasaran yang dirancang untuk memengaruhi keputusan pembelian kita.


Kurikulum kursus ini dirancang untuk memberikan landasan ilmiah dalam memahami dan menganalisis perilaku konsumen. Mulai dari kerangka kerja untuk menganalisis masalah perilaku konsumen, hingga kemampuan memprediksi respons konsumen terhadap berbagai strategi pemasaran, kursus ini memungkinkan peserta untuk mengembangkan wawasan yang mendalam. Kami akan menyelidiki proses mental dan fisik yang terlibat dalam mengakuisisi, mengonsumsi, dan mengalami produk serta menggali mekanisme pengaruh yang dapat merubah sikap, keyakinan, dan tindakan konsumen.


Selain itu, kursus ini juga akan mengajarkan aplikasi konsep, teori, model, dan alat dalam merancang strategi pemasaran yang terfokus pada perilaku konsumen. Peserta akan belajar menggunakan kerangka kerja dan model teoritis yang sesuai dalam ilmu perilaku konsumen untuk mengevaluasi situasi, mengembangkan opsi dan rekomendasi, serta menghadirkan presentasi yang luar biasa.


Dengan mengikuti kursus ini, diharapkan peserta akan mampu mengembangkan pemahaman yang kokoh tentang perilaku konsumen, memperoleh keterampilan untuk menerapkan pengetahuan ini dalam konteks perancangan strategi pemasaran yang efektif, dan menjadi responsif terhadap dinamika kebutuhan pelanggan. Peserta akan dibekali dengan kemampuan analisis yang mendalam, memberikan landasan yang kuat untuk kesuksesan dalam dunia pemasaran yang kompetitif.
target_audience: Mahasiswa Pemasaran atau Bisnis
Profesional Pemasaran
Manajer Produk atau Brand
Pemangku kepentingan dalam Penjualan dan Layanan Pelanggan
Wirausaha

courses.description:
企業でWEB担当をしていた講師が、初心者の方でもサイトの改善ができるような実践コースを作成！
分析を学んだことが無い人でも分かりやすいように、分析とは何か？から丁寧に説明していきます。


【コースの１番の特徴】
ケーススタディが多いこと！
アクセス数が少ないときは？
検索から来てくれないときは？
思った通りに動いてくれないときは？
リピーターを増やしたいときは？
メルマガやLINEを送るタイミングは？
成約率（CVR）を高めたいときは？


【使用している分析ツール】
GA4（Googleアナリティクス）
Googleタグマネージャー
Googleサーチコンソール
ヒートマップ（hot jar）
Googleアナリティクスは、GA4を使用。



【ケーススタディを多くした理由】
分析ツールを導入しても、結局アクセス数を見るだけに終わっていませんか？


本やWEBを見たら、分析のやり方は載っています。
でも、「それでどうすればいいの…？」と悩んでしまう人が多いです。


本来、あなたは分析がしたいわけではないですよね。
「改善」がしたいはず！


それなら、「分析と改善」をセットに伝えた方がためになるはずと思い、ケーススタディを多くしました。


【改善はカンタンか？】
全員にとって簡単とは言い切れませんが、
「なるべく簡単に改善できるところ」をケーススタディでご紹介しています。


ほんの少しの改善でも、売上アップ・新規顧客獲得に繋がります！
実際にサイトを改善したクライアントさんは、売上前年比160％を達成※しています。
※すべての方が同じ結果を出せる保証はありません。


専用のテキストもご用意しているので、ただ聞いているだけにならず、あなたの考える力も育つのも特徴の１つです。
サイトを改善したいけどどうやったらいいのか分からないという方も、最短２週間で変化を実感できるはず！


ご興味が湧いた方は、下のカリキュラムや無料動画もご確認ください↓

courses.title: Маркетинговий аудит конкурентів
courses.bio: Дізнайтеся, як ефективно аналізувати конкурентів, використовувати сучасні інструменти та розробляти конкурентоспроможну
objectives: Пошук та аналіз конкурентів.
Сервіси для аналізу(платні та безоплатні). Як робити висновки.
Цільова аудиторія, сегментація, формування портрета клієнта.
Формування УТП та позиціонування.

Введение: 4. Тарифні плани та сфери застосування інструменту

requirements: Вміння працювати з ПК, інтернет. Особливі вимоги відсутні.
courses.description:
Конкуренція постійно зростає, глибоке розуміння ринку та конкурентів стає ключем до успіху. Наш курс надасть вам практичні навички для:
Виявлення та класифікації конкурентів за допомогою сучасних методів та інструментів.
Аналіз пошукової видачі: Використання ключових слів у пошукових системах (Google, Bing) для визначення компаній, що ранжуються за цими запитами.
Вивчення галузевих каталогів та рейтингів: Дозволяє знайти компанії, що працюють у вашій галузі.
Моніторинг соціальних медіа: Аналіз згадок конкурентів та відгуків клієнтів у соціальних мережах.
Відвідування галузевих заходів: Конференції, виставки, форуми надають можливість познайомитися з конкурентами та їх продукцією.
Аналіз постачальників та клієнтів: Виявлення компаній, з якими працюють ваші постачальники та клієнти.
Використання провідних сервісів, таких як Serpstat, Ahrefs, Google Search Console для збору та аналізу даних про конкурентів.
Проведення SWOT-аналізу для оцінки сильних та слабких сторін конкурентів, а також визначення можливостей та загроз для вашого бізнесу(Дизайн, юзабіліті, контент, SEO-оптимізація, call to action).
Розробки ефективних маркетингових стратегій на основі отриманих даних, що дозволить вам підвищити конкурентоспроможність та адаптуватися до змін на ринку.
Курс орієнтований на підприємців, маркетологів, аналітиків та всіх, хто прагне покращити свої знання у сфері маркетингового аудиту та конкурентного аналізу взятого з інтернету. Після завершення навчання ви зможете самостійно проводити комплексний аналіз конкурентного середовища та приймати обґрунтовані рішення для розвитку вашого бізнесу.
target_audience: Маркетологи-початківці.

My exposure to AI for Marketing and Advertising Excellence started as early as the 2010s, with Early Adoption in (2010–2015) when AI use was limited, mostly rule-based or algorithmic like
· Programmatic Advertising began using early AI to automatically bid on ads in real-time (Real-Time Bidding, RTB).
· Google and Facebook introduced algorithm-driven ad delivery based on user behavior.
· Basic predictive analytics started helping marketers segment audiences or optimize email open rates.
I continued to learn with Mainstream Emergence of AI for Marketing and Advertising Excellence during 2016–2019 when AI matured with deep learning, NLP, and more affordable cloud computing:
· Chatbots powered by AI began to appear on websites (e.g., Drift, Intercom).
· Facebook, Google, and LinkedIn launched AI-powered ad optimization tools.
· Marketing automation platforms like HubSpot and Salesforce began integrating AI for lead scoring and personalization.
· Recommendation engines, like Netflix and Spotify, began shaping consumer expectations.
I learnt a lot more with Explosion of Use Cases in 2020–2023 when COVID-19 accelerated digital transformation and AI adoption:
· Brands leaned on AI for personalization at scale due to shifts to digital buying behavior.
· NLP models like GPT-3 (2020) revolutionized content generation, chatbot capabilities, and copywriting.
· Tools like Persado, Copyai, Jasper began writing high-converting marketing content.
· AI-driven creative optimization helped marketers test and scale visuals, videos, and messaging automatically.
And I continue to learn more in this Excellence Era (2023–Present) with GPT-4, multimodal AI, and tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude, AI moved from support to strategic driver:
· AI can now forecast campaign performance, allocate budgets, and optimize cross-channel strategies in real time.
· Marketing Co-Pilots (like Salesforce Einstein, Adobe Sensei, and HubSpot AI) help teams execute faster, smarter.
· AI in image, video, and design generation lets brands keep up with content demand.
I bring in this course my learnings from this journey and share with you how can you also can successfully use AI for Marketing and Advertising Excellence

This course is designed to equip you with the essential skills to implement Facebook Conversion API (CAPI) and Google Analytics 4 (GA4) server-side tracking using Google Tag Manager. Perfect for modern marketers and developers, it will enable you to collect accurate visitor data and optimize your ad performance on platforms like Facebook and Google.
Why Learn Server-Side Tracking?
With browser-side tracking increasingly affected by updates like iOS 14/14.5 and ITP restrictions from browsers like Safari and Firefox, server-side tracking has become crucial. Facebook’s Conversion API and GA4 offer a robust solution by bypassing browser limitations, ensuring more reliable data collection for better ad optimization and analytics.

What You’ll Learn:

Installing and configuring Google Tag Manager.
Verifying your domain in Meta Business Suite.
Setting up Facebook Pixel for browser-side tracking.
Implementing standard events like View Content, Add to Cart, Initiate Checkout, and Purchase.
Configuring Conversion API for server-side tracking via STAPE.
Handling event deduplication for accurate reporting.
Setting up Lead and Custom Events for both browser and server.
Creating a custom server container URL using your subdomain.
Implementing GA4 eCommerce server-side tracking.
Plus, many additional tips and tricks!
Who Is This Course For?
If you have basic experience with Facebook Business Manager, Facebook Pixel, or Google Tag Manager, this course will be easy to follow.

A WordPress eCommerce website to practice.

courses.description:
إدارة علاقات العملاء CRM، هو نهج يتم استخدامه من قبل القسم التسويقي بالشركات، من أجل إدارة العلاقة بين العلامة التجارية والعملاء الحاليين والمستهدفين. قد يقصد بالعملاء الأفراد على اختلاف خصائصهم، وقد يقصد بهم الشركات التي يتم التعامل معها على أساس شخصياتها الاعتبارية. يمكن الإشارة إلى إدارة العلاقات أيضًا، بكونها الأنظمة الآلية التي تعمل على تحليل أنشطة الجمهور التسويقية وعلاقتها بالعلامة التجارية. في الحالتين، فإن المفهوم البشري والآلي يشتركان في مهمة واحدة، وهي تحسين أسلوب التواصل مع العميل المستهدف ومنحه أفضل تجربة شرائية ممكنة.
تعمل أنظمة إدارة العلاقات على تجميع كل صغيرة وكبيرة تتعلق بالعملاء، بداية من بياناتهم الشخصية كالعمر والمستوى الاجتماعي والمادي، وصولًا إلى دراسة خصائصهم النفسية وتفاعلاتهم المختلفة مع الرسائل التي توجه إليهم. تعمل هذه المعلومات كحجر الأساس التي تقوم عليه الأنشطة التسويقية ككل، فبدونها لن تستطيع الحملات التسويقية تحقيق أهدافها بالكفاءة المطلوبة، وبدونها أيضًا لا تستطيع الشركة التواصل مع جمهورها الحالي أو جذب المزيد من الجمهور المستهدف.
يمكن وصف نهج إدارة العلاقات بكونه قاموسًا شاملًا يضم كل ما يتعلق ببيانات العملاء، بحيث يسهل الرجوع إليه عند الاستعانة به في تأسيس الحملات الدعائية، أو عند صياغة الرسائل الدعائية التي ترغب الشركة في إرسالها. فخبراء التسويق عادة ما ينظرون إلى هذا النهج كونه العنصر الفعال في العملية التسويقية ككل. إذا صح هذا العنصر، صحت معه جميع النتائج المترتبة عليه. إذا فشل هذا العنصر، فشلت معه جميع الوسائل التسويقية المساعدة.

requirements: なし
courses.description:
あなたはマーケティングファネルの全体像を描いた企画書の作り方をご存知ですか？
マーケティングファネルというのは、一貫したメッセージで企画書の全体像を作成できないと、うまく機能させることはできません。
ただ、リードマグネットを作ってメルマガリストを取得し、フロントエンド商品を販売して、バックエンド商品を販売することがマーケティングファネルではありません。
大事なのは、一貫したメッセージの企画書であり、これが作れないままファネルを作っても思ったように商品を購入してもらうことはできないのです。
このコースでは、マーケティングファネルを構成するための基盤となる企画書の作り方の基本を学ぶことができます。
特に、これから初めてマーケティングファネルを実装しようと考えている方は参考になるはずです。

courses.bio: Tüketicilerinizi alışveriş davranışlarına göre gruplandırın, yeniden pazarlama çalışmalarını zenginleştirmeye yön verin.

BigQuery'de RFM Verilerini Oluşturma: Müşteri Satış Verilerinden RFM Değerlerini Oluşturma - Part 1
Müşteri Satış Verilerinden RFM Değerlerini Oluşturma - Part 2
Müşteri Satış Verilerinden RFM Değerlerini Oluşturma - Part 3
Müşteri Satış Verilerinden RFM Değerlerini Oluşturma - Part 4

K-Means Kümelendirme Yöntemi İle RFM Verilerini Segmentlere Ayırma - Part 2
ML.Predict Fonksiyonu ile Müşterileri Ait Olacakları Segmentlere Atamak - Part 1
ML.Predict Fonksiyonu ile Müşterileri Ait Olacakları Segmentlere Atamak - Part 2
DataStudio ile Müşteri Segmentlerini Gör: DataStudio ile Müşteri Segmentlerini Görselleştirme ve Pazarlamada Kullanımı

requirements: Google Cloud hesabı
courses.description:
E-ticaret sitelerinde her ay markanın ve sitenin hacmine göre bin, on bin, yüz binlerce kullanıcı alışveriş yapıyor. Elimizde çok büyük bir tüketici kitlesi var. Peki bu kitleden hangilerinin bizim için daha değerli bir kullanıcı olduğunu nasıl bileceğiz? Ve bunun neticesinde kullanıcılarımızı segmentleyip Google Reklamları ve Facebook Reklamlarıylayeniden pazarlama çalışmalarına nasıl bir yön verebileceğiz?


RFM Nedir?
RFM Analizi yapmak ve kullanıcıları bu analiz neticesinde segmentlemek, hangi kullanıcıların ne kadar değerli olduğunu anlamak için güzel bir yol. Peki RFM’in açılımı nedir?
R=Recency (Bir kullanıcının en son ne zaman alışveriş yaptığı)
F=Frequency (Bir kullanıcının toplam kaç kez alışveriş yaptığı)
M=Monetary (Bir kullanıcının alışverişleri sonucunda toplam ne kadar ciroya katkı sağladığı)
RFM analizi
Müşterilerinizin uzun süre sizinle kalmasına (life time value)
E-ticaret dönüşüm oranlarınızın artışına (transaction rate)
E-ticaret cironuzun artışına (revenue)
Mailing, sms, yeniden pazarlama çalışmalarınızdaki tıklama oranlarının artmasına yardım eder.
Bu teknik ile, BigQuery üzerinden SQL ve makine öğrenimi (machine learning) algoritması kullanarak analiz yapıp analiz sonucunda kullanıcıları segmentleyeceğiz ve bu verileri görselleştireceğiz. Daha sonra bu kullanıcıları dijital pazarlama kanalları üzerinden nasıl hedefleyebileceğimizi konuşacağız.

Google BigQuery, Google’ın bulut bilişim(cloud service) hizmetlerinden birisidir. BigQuery sayesinde, birkaç farklı platformdan topladığımız verileri BigQuery’e aktarıp tablolar oluşturabiliriz. Daha sonra bu veriler üzerinde SQL ile sorgu işlemleri yaparak veri anlamlandırma, analiz etme, sonuca ulaşma, görsel raporlar oluşturma ve hatta analiz sonuçlarından çıkan dataları pazarlama aktivitelerinde kullanma şansına sahibiz.
Tüm işlemler bittikten sonra verileri görselleştirmek istediğimizde, verileri Google Data Studio‘ya aktararak aşağıdaki gibi bir rapor elde edceğiz.
target_audience: e-ticaret sitesi sahipleri
web analytics alanında çalışanlar
dijital pazarlama alanında çalışanlar
veri analizi alanında çalışanlar
e-ticaret ve perakende şirketlerinde çalışanlar

courses.title: Tipps & Tricks: ChatGPT im Marketing! - Teil 4
courses.bio: Mit ChatGPT Profi im Werbetexten und der Bildgenerierung werden!
objectives: ChatGPT im Marketing einsetzt
Werbetexten mit ChatGPT
Bilderstellung mit ChatGPT
Personalisierte Grusskarten
requirements: Keine Kenntnisse notwendig, Du lernst alles, was Du wissen musst.
courses.description:
Das Erlernen des Umgangs mit ChatGPT zur Perfektionierung deiner Fähigkeiten im Werbetexten und in der Bildgenerierung kann deine Marketingstrategien revolutionieren und dir einen erheblichen Vorteil in der digitalen Welt verschaffen. ChatGPT ist nicht nur ein leistungsfähiges Tool für die Erstellung überzeugender Werbetexte, sondern bietet auch die Möglichkeit, durch künstliche Intelligenz generierte Bilder zu erstellen, die deine Botschaft visuell unterstützen. Diese Kombination aus textlichen und visuellen Inhalten ermöglicht eine tiefgreifende und ansprechende Kommunikation mit deinem Zielpublikum.
Indem du ChatGPT nutzt, um massgeschneiderte Werbetexte zu generieren, kannst du Botschaften kreieren, die genau auf die Bedürfnisse und Interessen deiner Zielgruppe zugeschnitten sind. Von fesselnden Produktbeschreibungen bis hin zu überzeugenden Call-to-Actions, ChatGPT hilft dir, Texte zu verfassen, die Engagement und Konversionen fördern.
Zusätzlich eröffnet die Bildgenerierung mit Hilfe von KI neue Horizonte für kreatives Marketing. Durch die Erstellung einzigartiger, auf deine Marke zugeschnittener Bilder kannst du visuelle Inhalte produzieren, die Aufmerksamkeit erregen und eine emotionale Verbindung zum Betrachter aufbauen.
Die Fähigkeit, sowohl Werbetexte als auch Bilder effektiv zu generieren und zu kombinieren, macht dich zu einem wahren Profi im digitalen Marketing. Die Nutzung von ChatGPT für diese Zwecke bedeutet, dass du in der Lage bist, konsistente und ansprechende Kampagnen zu entwickeln, die sowohl inhaltlich als auch visuell überzeugen. Durch die kontinuierliche Anpassung und Optimierung deiner Inhalte mit ChatGPT kannst du sicherstellen, dass deine Marketingstrategien frisch, relevant und wirkungsvoll bleiben.

Introduction to AI and Market Analysis: Analyze a specific industry trend using AI-powered market analysis tools
Introduction to AI and Market Analysis

Mastering the Art of Text Prompts
AI for marketers: Creating compelling co: Using an AI-driven image generation tool, create visual marketing materials

requirements: The course is designed to be accessible to those with no prior knowledge of AI or coding
courses.description:
Unleash the Power of AI for Market Domination: Craft Insights, Make Predictions, Win Big!
Feeling overwhelmed by the ever-changing market landscape? Wish you could predict trends and gain a competitive edge? This course is your gateway to the future of market analysis: Artificial Intelligence (AI). And who can learn it better than an AI itself? All the materials for this course were made with the help of top-edge AI services which means that you get the best experience you can on a large base of materials all over the internet in an accessible and structured way.
No coding experience is required! We'll break down AI into clear, actionable steps, empowering YOU to harness its potential.
Imagine this:
Effortlessly crafting AI prompts that unlock a treasure trove of market research reports competitor intel, and customer insights.
Transforming raw data into captivating visuals with AI-powered tools, creating presentations and infographics that grab attention and drive decisions.
Making informed, data-driven choices with the power of AI guiding your every move.
But it doesn't stop there. We'll also delve into the ethical considerations of AI, ensuring you use this powerful tool responsibly.
By the end of this course, you'll be equipped to:
Master the art of crafting effective AI prompts to get the insights you crave.
Navigate the world of AI data visualization and create stunning visuals that tell a compelling story.
Understand the ethical implications of AI and apply responsible practices in your market analysis.
This course is your launchpad to becoming an AI-powered market analysis pro! Stop feeling lost in the data deluge, and start making predictions that propel your business or career forward. Enroll today and unlock the future of market intelligence!
target_audience: Marketing specialists
Students or recent graduates of marketing specialty
Entrepreneurs and business owners exploring the potential of AI to identify market opportunities and develop innovative products and services
Career changers looking to enter the field of AI-powered market analysis

courses.description:
Hi,
Ich bin Matthew Mockridge, Startup-Gründer, Bestseller-Autor und Ausnahmejungunternehmer.
Mit diesem ersten Einblick in den Onlinekurs zeige ich dir Alternativen auf und erkläre dir, wie du von null auf hundert durchstarten kannst, ohne großartiges Startkapital und ohne hochkarätigen Hochschul-Abschluss!
Folgendes bieten wir dir in diesem Kurs
In über 60 HD Video Lektionen geht es neben der gezielten Arbeit an deinen Start-Up-Skills, vor allem auch um die erprobte Entwicklung deiner Soft-Skills: Kreativität, Networking, Small-Talk, Leadership und Teamwork. In diesem Kurs erhälst du einen weiteren Einblick in das Kapitel Ideenfindungstools. Die innovative 66 Tage Formel fokussiert dabei deine Top-Performance an Hand neuronaler Plastizität durch tägliche, gezielte Reize am präfrontalen Cortex zur langfristigen Installationen deiner Fähigkeiten von innen nach außen und durch spürbaren Fortschritt. Deshalb ist es wichtig das du Lektionen auf verschiedene Tage aufteilst.
target_audience: Alle Visionäre die jetzt starten, sind die Rockstars von morgen – mit eigenen Firmen, selbstbestimmten Lebensmodellen und echter Erfüllung! Es ist mein Ziel möglichst vielen Menschen die komplexen ersten Schritte zu erleichtern und sie in der schnellstmöglichen Zeit, zu sofort sichtbaren Ergebnissen zu führen!

courses.title: 手把手教你写好超高转化率的营销文案
courses.bio: 营销文案创作全过程详解
objectives: 学习如何把握用户需求，提高营销文案的吸引力
学习如何将产品卖点融入营销文案，提升用户购买欲
学习文案撰写策略，提升产品转化率
学会营销文案的组织与表达
requirements: 工作中有营销文案撰写需求的新人
courses.description:
优秀的营销文案是获取市场份额的关键武器之一，但很多人发现自己的文案在营销转化数据方面长期低迷，又找不到提升改进思路。市面上的其他课程，在涉及文案写作时，大多以一些精彩案例辅以总结少数技巧、注意事项就结束了，但对于新人而言，这样的课程无法帮助他们落地。
我们的这门课程，针对“营销转化型文案”的写作，从整个文案创作的过程来进行细致讲解，在很多关键点上都有很重要、落地性很强的工具方法交付。
帮助学员找到产品卖点和特色，4步学会文案成稿，提升点击率、转化率，让学员在创作文案时，梳理出文案的创作思路，并落笔写成文案。
课程内容可有效覆盖的文案撰写场景包括——
1）朋友圈、微博营销卖货文案；
2）微信公号营销推文；
3）APP Push，或营销推文标题；
4）营销海报文案；
5）社群、私域转化文案；
6）产品售卖详情页文案；
target_audience: 从事运营相关工作的新人
工作中有营销文案撰写需求的人员
涉及流量、用户活跃/互动相关工作的从业者

如今，积分体系随处可见，小到商超、大到国民级的 APP都搭建了自身的积分体系。要设计一个完整的积分系统需要非常多的考量与步骤。
什么产品适合加入积分体系？积分的获取和消耗如何设计？积分体系的预算成本如何控制？积分体系的关键数据指标有哪些？
本节课，三节课邀请到有超过10年互联网产品经验，带领团队完成多个ToB、ToC产品规划与设计实施的David 老师，与你分享跟积分体系相关的那些事。
课程会帮助你整体认识什么是积分体系，并通过积分体系步骤拆解，系统把握积分体系三要素和搭建通用步骤，并从产品架构图、用户端设计、产品原型框架几个角度系统把握产品方案框架设计。
希望你能建立完善合理的可持续积分体系，不断提升用户活跃留存，培养用户忠诚度。

courses.title: "Du bist jetzt zuständig für Analytics"
courses.bio: Survival Guide für die Unternehmenskommunikation
objectives: Strukturierung und Analyse von Kommunikationsinhalten
Tipps zur Transformation von Teams zur datengetriebene Kommunikation

Einleitung: Wie Kontext den Zahlen erst Wirkung verleiht
Tipps für die Transformation zur datenge: Tipps für die Transformation zur datengetriebenen Kommunikation

requirements: Grundsätzliches Verständnis von Kommunikationskanälen und -Inhalten
courses.description:
Früher oder später hört man als Kommunikationsberater*in, ob man sich nicht um Analytics kümmern kann. Genau so war es in meinen ersten Jobs als PR-Berater für Kunden wie Nintendo oder Google, oder dann als Communications Manager bei Microsoft.
In diesem Kurs vermittele ich meine persönliche Vorgehensweise und die Tricks, mit denen ich im Datenjungle überlebt und es bis zum Job als Data Analyst in der Siemens Konzernzentrale geschafft habe.
Im Kurs behandele ich sowohl die Analytics-Grundlagen von organischen Inhalten, als auch von bezahlte Maßnahnen und klassischer Public Relations.
Dazu behandeln die ersten Lektionen die Strukturierung der Kommunikationsinhalte und -Kanäle. Die daraus resultierende, individuelle KPI-Tabelle wird dann dazu benutzt, um die Inhalte in den nächsten Lektionen zu analysieren.
In den abschließenden Lektionen möchte ich zeigen, dass der Weg zu einer datengetriebenen Kommunikation, oft weniger auf Zahlen sondern mehr auf Empathie basiert.
Mein Kurs beinhaltet HD-Videos mit Erklärungen für das schrittweise Vorgehen der Datenanalyse. Der erste Block befasst sich mit der Strukturierung der Inhalte:
Zieldefinition
KPI-Tabelle nach Zielen und Kanälen
Definition von Tag-Gruppen und Medientypen
Nachfolgend behandelt der Kurs die Analyse in folgenden Aspekten:
Die Verknüpfung der Inhalte mit Zahlen
Beispiel-Analyse in Power BI und Ermittlung von Benchmarks
Und zu guter Letzt teile ich persönliche Tricks, wie Analytics letztlich ins Unternehmen transportiert werden kann:
Wie Crossing the Chasm und Machiavelli’s “Der Fürst” helfen können
Mit persönlichen Erfolgsstories datengetriebene Entscheidungen fördern
target_audience: Kommunikationsmanager*innen

courses.title: Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management using Excel
courses.bio: Retail analytics using MS Excel - Covering Forecasting, Market Basket, RFM, Customer Valuation & Price Bundling
objectives: Become proficient in using powerful tools such as excel solver to create forecasting models
Learn how to estimate the trend and seasonal aspects of sales
Perform market basket analysis and calculate lift to derive a store layout that maximizes sales from complementary products
Understand how to interpret the result of Linear Regression model and translate them into actionable insight
Learn practical concepts of how to get revenue/profit optimized price point in case of Bundle products.
Learn why cable companies bundle landlines, cell phone service, TV service, and Internet service (Bundling)
Perform RFM (Recency, frequency, and monetary value) analysis to help you maximize profit from promotional mail campaigns.
Learn to calculate customer’s lifetime value under different scenarios and use it to increase the company’s profitability.
Incorporate the impact of discount rate and retention rate to calculate customer value

1.1 Getting Data ready for Regression Mo: The Data and the Data Dictionary
Descriptive Data Analytics or EDD in Excel
Dummy variable creation: Handling qualitative data
1.2 Forecasting using Regression Model: Basic Equations and Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) method

1.3 Handling Special events like Holiday: Forecasting in presence of special events

Excel: Estimating Power Demand Curve with points

requirements: You will need a PC with any version of Excel installed in it
Basic understanding of Excel operations like opening, closing and saving a file
courses.description:
You're looking for a complete course on understanding Marketing Analytics and Retail Business Management to drive business decisions involving production schedules, inventory management, promotional mail optimization, store layouting, estimating right bundle price, customer valuation and many other parts of the business., right?
You've found the right Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management course! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different forecasting models, Market Basket analysis, conducting market research, marketing analytics, RFM (recency, frequency, monetary) analysis, Customer Valuation methods & Price Bundling analysis and how to implement these models in Excel using advanced excel tool.
After completing this course you will be able to:
Implement forecasting models such as simple linear, simple multiple regression, Additive and multiplicative trend and seasonality model and many more, required for devising marketing analytics strategies effectively.
Perform marketing analytics and market basket analysis and calculate lift to derive a store layout that maximizes sales from complementary products.
Do RFM (Recency, frequency, and monetary value) analysis to help you maximize profit from promotional mail campaigns.
Increase revenue/profit of your firm by implementing revenue / profit maximizing bundle price point using marketing analytics tool like Excel solver Add-in
Understand the value of your customers to make intelligent decisions based on recommendations of marketing analytics and marketing research on how to spend money acquiring them
Confidently practice, discuss and understand different marketing analytics models used by organizations
How this course will help you?
A Verifiable Certificate of Completion is presented to all students who undertake this Marketing Analytics & Retail Business Management course.
If you are a business manager or an executive, or a student who wants to learn and apply forecasting models, marketing analytics techniques based on marketing research in real world problems of business, this course will give you a solid base for that by teaching you the most popular forecasting models and marketing analytics strategies and how to implement them.
Why should you choose this course?
We believe in teaching by example. This course is no exception. Every Section’s primary focus is to teach you the concepts of marketing analytics, marketing research through how-to examples. Each section has the following components:
Theoretical concepts and cases of different forecasting models and marketing analytics techniques
Step-by-step instructions on implementing forecasting models and marketing analytics in excel
Downloadable Excel file containing data and solutions used in each lecture on marketing analytics and retail business management
Class notes and assignments to revise and practice the concepts on marketing analytics and retail business management
The practical classes where we create the model for each of these strategies is something which differentiates this course from any other course available online.
What makes us qualified to teach you?
The course is taught by Abhishek and Pukhraj. As managers in Global Analytics Consulting firm, we have helped businesses solve their business problem using Analytics and we have used our experience to include the practical aspects of Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques and data analytics in this course.
We are also the creators of some of the most popular online courses - with over 170,000 enrollments and thousands of 5-star reviews like these ones:
This is very good, i love the fact the all explanation given can be understood by a layman - Joshua
Thank you Author for this wonderful course. You are the best and this course is worth any price. - Daisy
Our Promise
Teaching our students is our job and we are committed to it. If you have any questions about the course content, marketing analytics, marketing research, practice sheet or anything related to any topic, you can always post a question in the course or send us a direct message.
Download Practice files, take Quizzes, and complete Assignments
With each lecture, there are class notes attached for you to follow along. You can also take quizzes to check your understanding of concepts on Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques. Each section contains a practice assignment for you to practically implement your learning on Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques.
What is covered in this course?
Understanding how future sales will change is one of the key information needed by manager to take data driven decisions. In this course, we will explore how one can use marketing analytics tools and forecasting models to
See patterns in time series data
Make forecasts based on models
Let me give you a brief overview of the course
Section 1 - Introduction
In this section we will learn about the course structure containing Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques.
Section 2 - Basics of Forecasting
In this section, we will discuss about the basic of forecasting and we will also learn the easiest way to create simple linear regression model in Excel
Section 3 - Getting Data Ready for Regression Model
In this section you will learn what actions you need to take step by step to get the data and then prepare it for the marketing analytics purpose. These steps are very important.
We start with understanding the importance of business knowledge then we will see how to do data exploration. We learn how to do uni-variate analysis and bi-variate analysis then we cover topics like outlier treatment and missing value imputation. These are the building blocks of implementing marketing analytics techniques effectively.
Section 4 - Forecasting using Regression Model
This section starts with simple linear regression and then covers multiple linear regression. We have covered the basic theory behind each concept without getting too mathematical about it so that you understand where the concept is coming from and how it is important. But even if you don't understand it, it will be okay as long as you learn how to run and interpret the result as taught in the practical lectures.
We also look at how to quantify models accuracy, what is the meaning of F statistic, how categorical variables in the independent variables data set are interpreted in the results.
Section 5 - Handling Special events like Holiday sales
In this section we will learn how to incorporate effects of Day of Week Effect, Month Effect or any special event such Holidays, pay day etc.
Section 6 - Identifying Seasonality & Trend for Forecasting
In this section we will learn about trends and seasonality and how to use the Solver to develop an additive or multiplicative model to estimate trends and seasonality. We will also learn how to use moving averages to eliminate seasonality to easily see trends in sales.
Section 7 - Market Basket Analysis and Lift
In this section we will learn about Marketing analytics, marketing research, market basket analysis and learn how to calculate lift to derive a store layout that maximizes sales from complementary products.
Section 8 - Recency, frequency, and monetary value analysis
In this section we will learn techniques to perform RFM (Recency, frequency, and monetary value) analysis to help you maximize profit from promotional mail campaigns.
Section 9 - Recency, frequency, and monetary value analysis
In this section we will learn price bundling techniques and learn how to increase revenue/profit of your firm by implementing revenue / profit maximizing price point using Excel solver Add-in
Section 10 - Recency, frequency, and monetary value analysis
In this section, we will discuss about the basic of concepts of Customer Lifetime value and learn how to create excel model to find lifetime customer value and perform sensitivity analysis to capture variations in lifetime value under different scenarios.
Section 11 - Excel crash course
If you're new to Excel, or you've played around with it but want to get more comfortable with Excel's advanced features required for this course. Either way, this section will be great for you to revise your rusty excel skills .
Some of the examples in this course are from the book Marketing Analytics: Data-Driven Techniques with Microsoft Excel [Winston, Wayne L.]. We suggest this book as reading material for anyone aspiring to be a marketing analyst and gaining knowledge on Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques and data analytics.
I am pretty confident that the course will give you the necessary knowledge and skills related to Marketing analytics, marketing research, forecasting techniques, to immediately see practical benefits in your workplace.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1 of this Marketing Analytics course!
Cheers
Start-Tech Academy
target_audience: Anyone curious to learn the analytics behind most popular marketing startegies

WHAT PEOPLE SAY

— Parekh Harsh Babubhai (5 stars)

"I have an amazing experience with this course. Instructor is very knowledgeable and his teaching style is superb at all levels.."
— Hitesh Kumar Singh (5 stars)


"This course is extremely great."
— Shagun Chauhan (5 stars)


Starting with the basics, you'll learn how to set up and navigate your GA4 account effectively. The course covers everything from account structure and interface overview to advanced features, ensuring a complete understanding of GA4's capabilities. As you progress, you'll explore intricate subjects such as creating custom reports, understanding user insights, and leveraging data for strategic decision-making.
A key focus of our training is real-world application. You'll engage with practical examples across various platforms, including integrating GA4 with AdSense, analyzing Facebook Ads performance, and tracking e-commerce activities on platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce. These scenarios will provide you with a hands-on experience, crucial for applying GA4 insights to real business challenges.


Topics Covered in Our Course
Setting Up and Structuring Your Google Analytics 4 (GA4) Account
Dive into the foundational aspects of GA4, focusing on account structure tailored to various business types. We'll guide you through real-world examples, demonstrating how to set up GA4 across popular eCommerce platforms like WordPress, Shopify, and Squarespace, as well as on custom websites.
Mastering Premade Reports and Customizing Dashboards
Start with Google Analytics' premade reports and dashboards, designed for common analytics needs. Learn how to adapt these tools to align with your unique business objectives, making your analytics more relevant and insightful.
Developing Advanced Custom Reports for Specific Business Requirements
Utilize GA4's exploration tools to uncover and compare audience insights. We'll show you how to select and pair dimensions and metrics effectively, transition between different exploration methods, and integrate your findings into GA4 for segment creation and remarketing purposes.
Comprehensive Overview of Google Analytics 4 and Best Practices
Delve into a more theoretical exploration of GA4, covering its various components, setup intricacies, and data limitations. This segment includes a high-level interface walkthrough and tips for users transitioning from Universal Analytics, highlighting where to find familiar reports within the GA4 environment.
Each module in our course is designed to build a robust understanding of Google Analytics 4, from its basic setup to advanced reporting techniques. The course is structured to provide practical skills and insights, ensuring you can effectively apply GA4 analytics to your specific business context.
Moreover, our course offers exclusive tutorials on using Skillshop for further learning, helping you stay updated with the latest GA4 features and practices. This, coupled with our free resources, ensures that your learning journey is both cost-effective and high in value.
Upon completion, you will receive a certification in Google Analytics 4, signifying your proficiency and readiness to leverage GA4 for any analytics tasks. Whether it’s optimizing AdSense revenue, understanding Facebook Ads results, or gleaning e-commerce insights from Shopify and WooCommerce, this course equips you with the necessary skills.
target_audience: Digital Marketer
Online Business Owners
If you are running your own eCommerce store and want to track revenue and conversions and get deeper insights into which products get the most engagement then join this course.
If you are a marketer who wants to understand customers' journeys and be able to get deeper insights into the campaigns you are running, then this course is for you as well.
If you are a small business owner and would like to optimize your sales funnels and learn where your customers are coming from, you will learn how to do that as well.

New Age Digital Startups
