Welcome to Marketing Analytics & A/B Testing with Excel, Python, PowerBI course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will learn how to analyze marketing data, evaluate marketing campaign performance, segment customer data, and run effective A/B testing. This course is a perfect combination between marketing and data analysis, making it an ideal opportunity to practice your statistical skills while improving your technical knowledge in digital marketing. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of marketing analytics and A/B testing, such as getting to know marketing campaign key metrics and workflow. Then in the next section, we will start analyzing marketing data using Microsoft Excel. In the first section, we are going to analyze marketing campaign performance by calculating key metrics such as conversion rates, click through rates, and engagement scores across different channels to understand which campaigns perform best. Then, we are going to segment customer data based on purchase behavior and demographics to help tailor more effective marketing strategies for specific groups. After that, we are going to calculate return on investment by comparing planned marketing budgets with actual spending and sales revenue to evaluate the financial efficiency of each campaign. Next, we are going to conduct a basic A/B test by comparing different campaign versions, like email subject lines or landing pages, and measure results such as open and conversion rates to determine which version performs better. Then, we are also going to analyze customer retention by tracking repeat purchases over time to understand customer loyalty. Following that, we are going to estimate Customer Lifetime Value by using metrics like purchase history, tenure, total spend to help us to assess the long term value of our customers. Afterward, in the next section, we are going to analyze web traffic data using Python by evaluating total sessions, bounce rates, and session durations to understand how users interact with a website. Then, we are also going to calculate web conversion rates to identify how many visitors complete desired actions, such as signing up or making a purchase. Following that, we are going to segment customer data using hierarchical clustering based on behavior and transaction history to identify meaningful groups that can be targeted more effectively. We are going to run A/B testing using SciPy specifically, we will perform statistical tests to compare control and test groups, helping us make decisions based on data. In the next section, we are going to predict customer churn using CatBoost. This machine learning model will analyze factors like tenure, balance, and usage patterns to predict if the customer is more likely to leave or stay. After that, we are going to predict Customer Lifetime Value using the Multi Layer Perceptron Regression model to forecast future customer worth based on purchase history and total spend data. Lastly, at the end of the course, we are going to visualize marketing data using Power BI. We are going to visualize marketing campaign performance, customer demographics, and web traffic data using pie charts, bar charts and scatter plots.
Before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves, why marketing analytics is very important? Well, here is my answer, marketing analytics helps businesses turn marketing data into actionable and valuable insights that enable better decision-making, campaign optimization, and customer targeting. It also helps companies to allocate their budgets more effectively, improve ROI, and gain a competitive edge by understanding what truly drives customer engagement and conversions.
Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:
Learn the basic fundamentals of marketing analytics and A/B testing
Learn about important marketing metrics, such as conversion rate, customer acquisition cost, ROI, click through rate, and customer lifetime value
Learn how to analyze marketing campaign performance
Learn how to calculate ROI and compare initial marketing budget vs actual spend
Learn how to analyze customer retention
Learn how to analyze customer lifetime value
Learn how to analyze web traffic data
Learn how to analyze web conversion rate
Learn how to conduct customer segmentation analysis using unsupervised machine learning
Learn how to perform A/B testing with SciPy
Learn how to predict customer churn using CatBoost Classifier
Learn how to predict customer lifetime value using MLP Regressor
Learn how to visualize customer demographics data using PowerBI
Learn how to visualize marketing campaign performance data using PowerBI
Learn how to visualize web traffic data using PowerBI
target_audience: Digital marketers who are interested in turning marketing data into actionable and valuable business insights
Data analysts who are interested in analysing and visualising marketing data using Excel, Python, and Power BI

courses.description: Hubspot CRM - Başlangıçtan Zirveye eğitimi, Hubspot CRM yazılımına dair bilinmesi gereken en önemli başlıkları içeren, hem teorik bilgilere hem de uygulamalara yer veren kapsamlı bir eğitimdir. Eğitim süresince Hubspot CRM'i derinlemesine öğrenirken aynı zamanda contact yönetimi, pazarlama otomasyonu, müşteri deneyimi tasarımı, süreç otomasyonu ve e-mail pazarlama gibi konularda geniş ölçüde bilgi edinme fırsatı bulacaksınız. İzlediğiniz bu eğitim içeriklerindeki tüm konular uygulamaya da dönüştürüldüğünden başlı başına bir know-how edinme fırsatı da yakalayacaksınız. Bu bakımdan müşteri ilişkileri, kampanya yönetimi, pazarlama, müşteri deneyimi ve satış yönetimi gibi branşlarda çalışan herkesin CRM konusundaki bilgilerini tazeleyecek ve öğrendiklerini uygulamalarla süsleyecek bir eğitim. Eğitim süresi boyunca Hubspot CRM yazılımı içerisindeki contact işlemlerini, pazarlama aktivitelerini, randevu takvimi özelliğini, temel entegrasyonları, iş akışlarını, ticket ve deal işlemleri ile temel Hubspot ayarları konusunda bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. Contact işlemlerinde öğreneceğiniz bilgiler CRM'i etkin ve verimli bir şekilde kullanarak iş süreçlerinizi daha verimli hale getirmenize olanak sağlarken, iş akışlarında öğreneceğiniz bilgiler hem müşteri deneyimi tasarımı oluşturmak hem de pazarlama otomasyonu oluşturarak müşterilerinizi ürün ve hizmetleriniz hakkında bilgilendirmek hem de süreçlerinizi otomatize ederek zamanınızı etkin ve verimli bir şekilde kullanmanıza fayda sağlayacak. Eğitmeniniz, eğitim süresince her zaman yanınızda olacak ve karşılaştığınız tüm problemlerde ya da kafanıza takılan sorularda sizlere yardımcı olacak. Soru-cevap kısmı aracılığıyla ya da eğitim içeriğinde belirtilen iletişim adresi aracılığıyla eğitmeninize sorular sorabilir, dilediğiniz an destek talep edebilirsiniz. Son olarak kurs boyunca Zoom ve Google entegrasyonu gibi temel entegrasyonları da göreceğiz ve böylece Hubspot'un farklı uygulamalarla nasıl entegre bir şekilde çalıştığını görme fırsatınız olacak.

courses.description:
Marketing Analytics for Beginners is designed to help you build a solid foundation in tracking, measuring, and analyzing marketing performance—even if you have no prior experience. Whether you're a small business owner, aspiring marketer, freelancer, or student, this course will teach you how to use data to make smarter marketing decisions.
You’ll start by learning the basics—what marketing analytics is, why it matters, and how to set meaningful KPIs. Then we’ll dive into the most essential tools and concepts, including how to set up and use Google Analytics, interpret key website metrics, and create simple dashboards to visualize your performance. You’ll also learn how to track the success of your campaigns using UTM parameters, and understand the difference between paid, organic, and referral traffic.
By the end of the course, you'll feel confident reading reports, spotting trends, and making data-backed decisions. You’ll be able to answer questions like: Where is my traffic coming from? What’s driving conversions? And how can I improve my marketing strategy?
This is a hands-on course with real-world examples, guided walkthroughs, and no technical jargon. You don’t need a background in data or coding—just a willingness to learn and apply what you discover.
Join today and start using marketing data to grow your brand, optimize your efforts, and stand out in the digital world!

courses.title: Data Visualization for Marketing Insights
courses.bio: Learn how to use the right chart and build dashboards.
objectives: Produce graphics according to marketing strategy.
Using the right chart at the right time.
Learning to read a graph.
Build dashboards.
Understand graphic design: types, colors, meanings and applications.
Build charts and dashboards without complicated software.
requirements: Internet access.
courses.description:
The course "Data Visualization for Marketing Insights" was developed by university professor Larissa Perfeito, who has been teaching since 2006.
The course aims to identify the right type of graph for each data. For example, to demonstrate a company's profit over 5 years, is it better to use a bar graph or a pie chart? Or a line graph? Or an area graph? The professor defines the functions of each graph and puts their applicability into practice during the classes. She also demonstrates when graphs are not efficient, causing doubt in the viewer. She also addresses storytelling, that is, the story contained in each graph and the persuasion of those who will present the data.
All classes have practical exercises, commented by professor Larissa, on video. And also, PDF pages that were used during the classes and are provided to the student.
The course also aims to build dashboards - without the use of software, but rather using ready-made templates that facilitate and speed up the time of those who need to build panels with data.
The "Data Visualization for Marketing Insights" course has four units. The first, called "Key Points", teaches the types of graphs and reading in Z. The second, "Design", covers colors, fonts, icons and layout. And the third, "Dashboards", teaches how to build and analyze dashboards. Finally, in the "Tutorial" unit, the teacher demonstrates step by step how to build graphs and dashboards, free of charge and without the use of software.
This is a dynamic, well-illustrated course with valuable teaching material that will greatly help those who wish to learn about data storytelling.
target_audience: Digital Marketers, Content Marketers, Entrepreneurs, Managers, Coordinators, Students.

courses.description:
Why should I join this Marketo certification course?
You should join this course If you want to become a Marketo Certified Professional & learn Marketo together.
You should join this course If you are a student and want to grow your career in Marketing automation.
You should join this course If you want to secure the best Marketo job.


If you are the person who needs a detailed explanation of why this answer is correct and wants to see how it will work Marketo. You can't bear time, then you are the ideal person for this Marketo certification course to get the maximum benefit.


Why should you buy this Marketo certification course if you can access these questions online for free?
This is a great question that everyone should ask. You will get a lot of questions online which will help you crack the certification. I went through the same process to clear the Marketo certification exam, if you have plenty of time and are capable of understanding the concepts yourself, then you can skip this page. You should not buy this course.


Can you answer and justify your answer to this Marketo Certification question?
A marketer would like to send an email alert in a trigger campaign. Which of the following can not be sent as an alert email?
1. lead owner
2. account owner
3. opportunity owner
4. a lead or program token


Answer with explanation:
Well, if you are looking for a technical reason then stop it, you won't be able to. This is more related to the sales process, so let's first understand these 3 terms - lead, account, and opportunity owner
Lead owner - a person who has the responsibility to take care of lead/contacts
Account owner - take care of a whole account (company or list of similar companies)
Opportunity owner - they work at fields to close the deal
Now, let's see the typical stages in a sales process?
Now, let's see the typical stages in a sales process?
Marketing qualified > Sales qualified > Opportunity > Customer
Did you see the account owner or lead owner? Therefore, the primary purpose of sending an alert to these lead/account owners is to notify them about the possibility of a new opportunity.
Because, in the opportunity stage, the lead is already talking to sales to get answers to all of their questions.

requirements: 中学校の数学(放物線・連立方程式)を理解していると学習がスムーズになります。
courses.description:
マーケティング分野において非常によく使われる回帰分析。
結果を出すだけならツールを使えば誰でも簡単にできてしまいます。ですが、出てきた結果にどうも自信が持てない・・・そう思うことはありませんか？

そうです。得体の知れないブラックボックスから答えが出てきても、使いこなせているという感覚がないと結果にも自信が持てませんよね。

このコースでは、回帰分析の基礎[単回帰分析]に絞ってそのブラックボックスの中身を覗きます。
実際にステップバイステップで手を動かしながら中身を見ていくことでその理論的背景を理解できるようになります。
(また、コースの最後では、単純なモデル例として[最低気温]から[コーヒーの売り上げ数量]を予測します。)


ただし、わずか90分というコース時間に圧縮したため、本当に基礎の基礎の部分しか盛り込むことができませんでした。
ですので、「もっと難しいことを知りたい！」「もっともっと深く知りたい！」という方の気持ちには答えられていないかもしれません。

ただ、逆に、短時間で基本部分を理解し、自信を持って回帰分析ができるようになりたいあなたにはぴったりのコースです。
ぜひ一緒に奥の深い回帰分析の世界に入っていきましょう。

B2B or B2C Experience (Optional): Familiarity with business models and customer acquisition strategies, particularly in complex sales cycles.
Basic CRM or Marketing Automation Understanding: Knowledge of tools like HubSpot, Marketo, or Salesforce is beneficial but not required.
Creativity & Problem-Solving: Willingness to experiment with different demand generation tactics to drive results.
courses.description:
Introduction to Demand Generation is an online marketing training course offers a foundational understanding of demand generation as a strategic approach in modern marketing.
This course explores the key goals of demand generation, such as building awareness, creating interest, and fostering customer engagement, ultimately driving quality leads through the sales pipeline. It also distinguishes demand generation from lead generation, clarifying that demand generation focuses on nurturing interest across the entire buyer journey, not just collecting contact information.
Learners will gain insight into the critical components of a successful demand generation strategy, including identifying target audiences, creating valuable content, leveraging multi-channel marketing, and aligning sales and marketing efforts. This part sets the stage for deeper exploration into demand generation tactics, illustrating how a well-rounded strategy builds brand visibility, supports long-term customer relationships, and leads to measurable business growth.


Who should attend


· Marketing professionals looking to enhance their demand generation skills.

· Sales and marketing alignment roles aiming to drive more qualified leads.

· Business owners and entrepreneurs seeking to grow their customer base.

· Anyone interested in learning advanced marketing strategies to boost brand visibility and revenue.


What you’ll learn


Master the Basics of Demand Generation
Learn how to create awareness, spark interest, and keep your audience engaged throughout their journey.
Understand the Lead Funnel
Discover how to guide prospects step-by-step through the funnel—from awareness (TOFU) to decision-making (BOFU)—and keep them moving forward.


Qualify Leads Effectively
Find out how to identify your best leads using tools like lead scoring and frameworks like BANT (Budget, Authority, Need, Timing).


Build a Seamless Lead Management Process
Explore how to align sales and marketing, hand off leads effectively, and avoid common bottlenecks.


Create Personalised Campaigns
Use emails, retargeting ads, and content tailored to your audience's needs to build trust and drive action.


Leverage Content for Every Stage
Learn what kind of content works for each stage of the funnel, blog posts for awareness or product demos for decision-making.


Track Funnel Performance
Keep an eye on key metrics like conversion rates, lead velocity, and engagement to figure out what’s working and what’s not.


Refine Your Strategy
Test, tweak, and improve your workflows, content, and lead management processes to boost your results.


Everything You Need to Master Demand Generation

Practical Tools, Resources, and Guidance
· On this course, you can expect a hands-on, practical learning experience designed to help you master the art of demand generation. Through engaging video lessons, interactive presentations, and real-world examples, you’ll gain a deep understanding of how to attract, nurture, and convert leads effectively.


· You'll also have access to a range of downloadable resources, including knowledge articles, templates, and tools to help you apply what you’ve learned. From lead scoring sheets to funnel optimisation guides, these materials are designed to make implementing your strategy easier.


· Whether you’re new to demand generation or looking to refine your skills, this course provides everything you need to build a winning strategy and see real results.
target_audience: Marketing Professionals: Looking to enhance your demand generation skills and create high-performing campaigns
Business Owners & Entrepreneurs: Seeking to attract and convert more customers through strategic demand generation.
Sales & Revenue Leaders: Wanting to align sales and marketing efforts to generate high-quality leads and increase conversions.
B2B & SaaS Marketers: Managing long sales cycles and complex distribution channels, requiring effective demand gen strategies.
Marketing Agencies & Consultants: Aiming to offer demand generation as a service or improve results for clients.

courses.description:
HubSpot Workflows & Reporting for Marketing Professionals is designed to help you master two critical aspects of HubSpot—Automation and Reporting.
If you’re already familiar with HubSpot’s basic features and the CRM, this course will take your skills to the next level by diving into Workflows and Reporting tools.
Whether you're a marketer looking to improve your automation processes or a business owner wanting to track marketing performance more effectively, this course will walk you through everything you need to know to implement HubSpot's Marketing Automation and Reporting functionalities.


By the end of this course, you will be able to:


Master HubSpot Automation:
Work with the two key elements of a HubSpot Workflow: Triggers and Actions.
Set up and manage Workflows to automate tasks like sending emails, assigning tasks, or updating contact records.
Use different types of triggers to automate processes from form submissions, email interactions, content engagement, and others!
Work with advanced actions, such as creating tasks, sending internal notifications, and assigning contacts on autopilot
Create Advanced HubSpot Workflows:
Split workflows into multiple journeys using branching logic to send contacts down different paths based on their actions (e.g., form submissions, email opens, or specific property values), as well as other events.
Customize workflows to automate personalized experiences for your audience, ensuring each contact follows the most relevant journey.
Set up advanced actions like enrolling deals or companies into workflows based on behavior.
Use HubSpot’s integrated apps to trigger workflow actions for seamless automation across different platforms.
Analyze workflow performance and optimize for better results using workflow analytics.
Build Effective Marketing Reports:
Create marketing dashboards using HubSpot templates to track key marketing performance metrics.
Customize marketing reports to analyze data and optimize your marketing strategies.
Explore advanced report types like attribution reports, funnel reports, and customer journey reports.
Monitor and Improve Your Marketing Efforts:
Organize and manage your daily tasks with HubSpot’s automation tools.
Create and update marketing reports to measure the performance of your campaigns.
Use HubSpot’s reporting features to identify areas of improvement and adjust your strategy accordingly.


Attention:
You’ll need access to HubSpot Workflows and Custom Reports for this course, and if you don’t already have access, a 14-day free trial is available to get started.
This is NOT a beginner-level course, so if you’re new to HubSpot, I recommend starting with a foundational course to familiarize yourself with the basics before tackling this one. Check out my course "HubSpot for Beginners" here on Udemy if this is the case!

--

I am a certified HubSpot expert, providing HubSpot account management and training services to companies worldwide since 2018. Here’s one of my client testimonials:
"I just completed the course - and my only reaction is: WOW! Super valuable for entrepreneurs, consultants (such as myself), and small businesses. Thalita successfully managed to transfer her rich knowledge in a meticulous manner. This course is easy to comprehend and incorporate into your business strategy. I honestly never knew the actual possibilities of the HubSpot platform (free version) and now I finally do! I can't wait to start using it to its full extent! Thank you so much for this course!" - Tamara Biljman, Content Strategist
Feel free to check out my website for more testimonials. I take pride in assisting my students and coaching clients throughout the learning journey, so feel free to ask me any questions at any time during the course.


This is an independently developed course by Thalita Milan and has not been created, endorsed, or verified by HubSpot, Inc. HubSpot, Inc. shall not have any liability with respect to this course offered by Thalita Milan.

ماذا يعني أن تكون متمحور حول العملاء؟
أنت تضع عملائك أولاً. لن يقول الكثير من الشركات الصغيرة خلاف ذلك. ولكن فإن "الشركات التي تتخذ نهجًا يتمحور حول العملاء تفعل أكثر مما تقول أنها تضع عملائها أولاً ؛ يجعلونها أولوية لتوفير تجربة عملاء استثنائية في نقطة البيع وبعد البيع لزيادة الأرباح واكتساب ميزة تنافسية ".

تعرف على كيفية استخدام Mailchimp ، وقم بتنمية قائمة المشتركين بالبريد الإلكتروني وإنشاء حملات تسويق عالية الجودة عبر البريد الإلكتروني!

• إنشاء محتوى بريد إلكتروني يتم فتحه وتحويله

• تعرف على كيفية التسويق والاستفادة من قائمة البريد الإلكتروني المتزايدة
كيف أحصل على قائمة بريد إلكتروني؟
سترى أعلى عائد استثمار عند إنشاء وصيانة قائمة المشتركين المتفاعلة ، والتي تتكون من الأشخاص الذين يريدون تلقي رسائلك (والذين اشتركوا عن قصد). على الرغم من أن إنشاء قائمة نظيفة يمكن أن يستغرق المزيد من العمل في بداية استراتيجية التسويق عبر البريد الإلكتروني ، فإن قوائم موقع ميل شيمب تحتوي على أدوات مدمجة لمساعدتك على طول الطريق.

courses.description:
Imagine having the ability to connect with your audience at the right time and with the right message, all without breaking a sweat. That's what marketing automation does, and it's changing the game for businesses like yours.


Marketing automation refers to applying different tools and AI to cut down on the human contribution to tasks.
It gets rid of the repetitive, time-consuming tasks that used to bog down your team. No more manual data entry; instead, you can focus on your strategy, creativity, and innovation.
Moreover, marketing automation gives you access to loads of data and insights. Dive into customer information, track how your campaigns are doing, and make smart decisions based on the data. Data-driven marketing is your not-so-secret weapon.
Because of that, with marketing automation and AI, you can create tailored campaigns that connect with individual preferences and behaviors. This personalization leads to more engagement and sales. It also ensures your messages hit your audience at just the right moment. Whether it's a welcome email, a product recommendation, or a follow-up message, automation guarantees you won't miss any opportunities.
When you offer personalized, well-timed, and relevant content, your audience feels valued and understood. Keep in touch with them, provide valuable content and information, and wait until they're ready to buy. This steady approach increases your chances of sealing the deal.
In a crowded market, those who use automation get ahead. Stay on top of the game while your competitors play catch-up.

**UPDATED AS OF NOVEMBER 2015 - JOIN 9,000+ SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS!**
Become a technical marketer with this course on using SQL for data analysis. You'll learn:
Initial Setup and SQL Basics
The 6 Components that Make Up Every SQL Query
How to Use SQL to Query Any Database
Pre-built Queries You Can Run Today to Get Info About Your Customers
Technical marketers are in high demand and low supply. Being able to dive into data on your own, with no help from engineering, makes you a much better marketer.
This is why SQL is so powerful - it allows you to see any data you want about anything your customers do. Knowing how to use SQL is literally a marketing superpower.
As someone who can understand and use SQL, you'll be a (highly paid) marketing unicorn - able to dig into data and also execute high-level marketing campaigns. Many companies - including Udemy! - are now requiring that their marketing leaders have an understanding of SQL.
Many marketers have tried to become "technical" - including me - but have failed over and over again after coming across resources meant only for engineers. I know I've had this issue - every SQL tutorial out there was created for developers, not marketers. Other tutorials include topics like creating a database, inserting data, managing tables, and other specifics that database administrators need to know.
What if I told you that marketers only need to know a small amount of SQL to use it for analytics... and to run more profitable campaigns?
Good news - This is the truth!
This course is the best resource for marketers, growth hackers and product managers who want to get more technical and learn SQL. It's what I wish existed when I was going through tutorial after tutorial, sifting through lots of information that didn't apply to me and trying to learn on my own.
And - best of all - you don't need to know programming or be technical to take this course. In fact, you don't have to be technical to know how to use SQL!
SQL is simple enough that - just by learning a few concepts I'll cover in this course - you'll be able to use it for any kind of data analysis, cohort analysis or campaign breakdown.
Everything I've put into this course are the product of years of teaching myself to program, understanding software technology and writing thousands of SQL queries for my own marketing and growth campaigns. The concepts and queries in this course are used every day by the marketing teams at companies like eBay, Moz, Udemy, HubSpot... you name it.
I've used my knowledge of SQL to cut churn by more than 60% while running growth at developer-tools startup Airbrake (acquired by Rackspace), and to analyze and improve multiple profitable marketing campaigns. Knowing SQL has given me incredible insight into our customer base, and allowed our marketing team to move much faster than we did when we had to wait for engineering to give us the data we requested.
But don't just listen to me. Here's what a few other people have said:
"About four weeks back, I learned SQL, and it's been one of the greatest skills I could have ever acquired as a marketing / business guy at a startup."
- Dinesh Thiru, Head of Marketing at Udemy
"I loved this course. I was able to power through it within 3 hours and have a solid base of understanding for SQL.
As a digital marketer, it's important that I have access to my database and customer information BUT that I do not waste valuable developer resources. This course aims to bridge that gap by teaching you the tools you need to query your SQL database and running your own reports.
I can't recommend this course enough for SQL newbies. I now have a base of understanding of SQL and excited to use it at work this week!"
- Benjamin Hoffman, course student
Some things you'll learn in this course:
The 6 components that make up every SQL query a marketer will ever use
How to find your most profitable users, and how to make sure you run campaigns that attract more like them
5 key metrics you can measure right away after learning SQL
How to run a cohort analysis
How to discover the "aha" moment in your product that indicates whether a new user will stay an active customer or close their account
Access to pre-built queries you can start using immediately to learn about your customer base
Trust me, this is just a small sample of what you'll learn. By the end of this course you'll be more technical than 90% of marketers out there, and 100% better at your job.
I'll also personally respond to any questions you may have as you go through the material, so there's no worry if you think this might be too technical or too confusing. I've included only the essentials marketers need to know, and created the course I wish I had years ago when I was learning this stuff.
As a last bonus, I'll personally guarantee your satisfaction. If for any reason you don't think the course was valuable, I'll personally refund your entire purchase amount, no questions asked.
See you inside,
Justin Mares
P.S. If you have (or are looking) to become a better marketer, investing a few dollars in yourself will be the best investment you ever make. And, if you don't like the course, I'll give you a 100% refund - my guarantee.

courses.description:
Are you ready to revolutionize the way you work, streamline business processes, and embrace innovation without the need to delve into the complexities of traditional coding? In an era where efficiency and agility are the keystones of success, mastering no-code automation tools is no longer just an option but a necessity.

In this comprehensive course, we'll embark on an exciting journey, navigating through the transformative world of no-code and low-code platforms, which are reshaping the landscape of business operations, project management, customer relations, marketing strategies, and much more. This course is meticulously designed to empower professionals, entrepreneurs, and businesses to harness the power of automation, fostering innovation, enhancing productivity, and driving growth without the prerequisite of technical coding knowledge.

Why is this course relevant today? As the digital transformation accelerates, the demand for agile, efficient, and cost-effective solutions is at an all-time high. No-code automation stands at the forefront of this revolution, democratizing technology and putting the power of automation in the hands of non-technical users. It's a pivotal skill set that can set you apart in a competitive job market, enable you to optimize your business processes, and open the door to endless possibilities for innovation.

Our journey through the course will unfold in several engaging and insightful sections, each crafted to provide you with a solid foundation in no-code automation and a plethora of practical applications. From understanding the basics of no-code and low-code platforms, exploring popular tools like Zapier, Airtable, and Make (formerly Integromat), to building custom apps and automating complex workflows, you'll gain hands-on experience and valuable insights from real-world examples.

One of the most enticing aspects of this course is the project-based learning approach we've adopted. You’ll have the opportunity to apply what you’ve learned by starting new projects from scratch, following along with step-by-step guidance, and ultimately creating portfolio-ready projects by the end of the course. Whether you're a beginner eager to dive into the world of automation or a seasoned professional looking to expand your toolkit, our course is structured to accommodate and challenge learners at all levels.

As we progress, you'll discover the keys to identifying business processes ripe for automation, setting actionable goals, selecting the right no-code tools tailored to your specific needs, and best practices in organizing your projects for maximum efficiency and impact. Our deep dive into platforms like Zapier and Airtable will equip you with the skills to streamline workflows, while our exploration of no-code app development will unveil the simplicity behind creating custom applications that can drive your business forward.

What makes our course uniquely valuable? It's not just about learning to use tools – it's about fostering a mindset of innovation and problem-solving. It's about embracing the future of work, where technology enables us to achieve more with less, breaking down barriers that once required extensive coding skills or hefty budgets for software development. Our course is grounded in the reality of today's business needs and the potential for tomorrow's growth and innovation.

By integrating AI and machine learning, financial process automation, customer relationship management, marketing strategies, e-commerce operations, and much more, we cover an extensive breadth of applications, ensuring that you’re well-equipped to tackle challenges and seize opportunities using no-code automation.

Collaboration and community engagement are also integral components of our course. We encourage peer-to-peer learning, sharing of insights, and constructive feedback, fostering a vibrant community of no-code enthusiasts. Beyond the course materials, you'll gain access to a wealth of resources, ongoing support, and a network of like-minded individuals and professionals, all united in the pursuit of leveraging no-code automation for business and personal growth.

In summary, this course isn't just an educational journey; it's a transformational experience that equips you with the skills, knowledge, and confidence to innovate, automate, and excel in today's digital age. Whether you aim to optimize your business operations, pursue entrepreneurial ventures, or simply stay ahead in your career, mastering no-code automation offers a pathway to achieving those goals with creativity, efficiency, and effectiveness.

Don’t let the opportunity to be at the forefront of business innovation slip through your fingers. Take the leap, join us, and let’s unlock the full potential of no-code automation together.

courses.description:
The #1 Mistake That Most People Do
Marketing Automation is extremely important in keeping your brand top of the mind of your potential customers and improving user experience.
However, it can also be quite complex due to various factors. When sales and click-throughs aren’t what you expect, we start to ask ourselves questions like:
“Did they face any challenges in the sales journey?”
“Did I made any mistake?”
“Why are they not buying?”
…lots of others as well. The most common mistake I have seen people making is not following a proper roadmap.
Setting up random workflows that lacks personlization, using too many promotional words, ending up in the spam/promotional tab of your audience, getting worse CTR than expected are the worst scenerios that can happen to you.
Now the most important question that people often ask me is- “What should i do to make my system foolproof?”
The answer to this is quite simple!


Follow A Roadmap
You see, there is a roadmap behind every successful marketing campaign. And this roadmap consists of 30 Lessons that you need to learn in order to get the max out of your marketing automation. And if you’re missing even just one step from this roadmap, you run the risk of burning money and “spamming“ your audience.
So, what if you had a set of step-by-step instructions of initiating successful marketing campaigns from scratch on complete autopilot? Imagine if you could follow these steps with… EVEN if you know nothing about marketing automation!
No More Doing Repetitive Manual Work!
No More Fear Of Messing it up!
No more wasting time or money!


Imagine for just a moment...
Once you get the game & the rules, you never have to stress on it ever again, right? Once it’s done… it’s done! Every system will give you crazy ROI and engagement. Isn’t it great to build something once and get it to work for you for years? Wouldn’t that be nice? Well, you don’t have to “imagine” any longer. Because… it’s here.


This one course on Marketing Automation will help you stay in touch with your customers wherever they are, on autopilot!
In this course you will majorly learn:
Email Marketing - Deliver valuable content straight to your audience's inboxes
SMS Marketing - Reach your prospects on their mobile phones while they’re on the go
Conversion Ads Automation - Nurture your leads in real time from the conversion ads campaigns


Why do you need Marketing Automation in Your Business?
360° Automation - By setting up automated email flows paired with chatbots and SMS to advance leads from stage to stage of your sales process and close more deals.
Transactional Emails - Sending automated emails triggered by user behavior to deliver valuable information to your customers at key moments of their journey (failed & successful payments).
Enhance Customer Satisfaction - Make every customer feel special with personalized messages and lightning-fast responses.
Say No To Repetitive Tasks - Using automation to keep time-consuming tasks on autopilot and get the time you need to focus on high-value work.


Why is this course different?
No need to get separate courses for different Marketing Automation needs. From lead gen to customer emails, This course will help you manage your entire funnel – so you get more conversions and less chaos.
Just one course will cater to all the Automation needed in your business. It will be a completely power-packed course which will be easy to follow, informative and definitely practical in approach.


Enroll now for this course and give your Marketing Campaigns the high-performing makeover it deserves!


See you inside the course.

Mid-level Digital Marketers, Business Owners, Coaches and Consultants
Anyone who is interested to learn about automation tools in the field of digital marketing

courses.title: N8N for Beginners: Lead Generation, Automation & AI Agents
courses.bio: N8N Made Simple: Automation, Lead Generation & AI Agents for Beginners

Introduction to N8N: N8N for Beginners: Lead Generation, Automation & AI Agents

requirements: No prior coding experience required.
A stable internet connection.
Curiosity and willingness to follow along with hands-on exercises.
Optional: a VPS and domain if you want to replicate the complete setup.
courses.description:
Do you spend hours every week replying to repetitive emails, managing leads, or manually keeping track of requests? What if you could automate those tasks, respond instantly, and never miss a high-value lead again?
That’s exactly what you’ll achieve in “N8N for Beginners: Lead Generation, Automation & AI Agents.”
This course is your step-by-step guide to mastering N8N, the powerful open-source automation tool that allows you to connect apps, create workflows, and build intelligent AI-driven agents — all without writing a single line of code. Whether you’re a business owner, marketer, or freelancer, this course will show you how to save time, eliminate manual work, and scale your productivity.
You’ll start with the fundamentals — understanding N8N, setting up your environment, and learning the basics of nodes, triggers, and credentials. Then, you’ll move into hands-on projects where you’ll build real-world automations. For example, you’ll create an Email Classifier Workflow that:
Monitors your inbox for new emails.
Uses AI to analyze the content and classify it into categories (support requests, paid collaborations, inbound leads, etc.).
Automatically applies labels so you can prioritize what matters.
Generates and sends a personalized AI response within seconds.
Imagine the transformation: instead of being chained to your inbox, you’ll have an automation system that sorts and replies for you — freeing you to focus on growth, strategy, or simply enjoying more of your time.
But this course goes far beyond email. You’ll learn how to set up AI-powered lead generation workflows, automate follow-ups, and integrate N8N with tools you already use. By the end, you’ll have a toolkit of automations that work for you 24/7.
Here’s the truth: if you don’t learn this now, you’ll continue wasting hours on tasks that can be automated. You’ll risk falling behind competitors who are already using AI and automation to scale faster, respond quicker, and close more opportunities.
By joining this course, you’ll experience a complete shift in how you approach your work. You’ll go from:
Manual to automated: No more repetitive copy-paste work.
Reactive to proactive: Let AI handle sorting, while you focus on what matters most.
Beginner to confident builder: Even if you’ve never used automation tools before, you’ll finish this course with working workflows you can deploy immediately.
Every lesson is designed to be practical and beginner-friendly. You won’t just learn concepts — you’ll build real automations together, step by step. Each project is structured so you can follow along and customize it for your own business needs.
By the end of this course, you’ll not only understand N8N — you’ll have mastered the skill of creating AI-powered automations that save you time, boost your efficiency, and give you a serious edge in the digital age.
If you’re ready to stop drowning in repetitive tasks and start working smarter with automation, this course is your starting point.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs who want to automate lead generation and client communication.
Digital marketers looking to streamline campaigns and outreach.
Freelancers and consultants wanting to save time and scale efficiently.
Beginners curious about automation and AI with no technical background.
Small business owners who receive frequent emails and want smarter management.

courses.bio: Başarılı TikTok Reklamlarına Hızlı Giriş! İşletmenizi Büyütün, Hedef Kitlenizi Yakalayın ve Viral Kampanyalar Oluşturun!
objectives: TikTok Business Manager kurulumu ve hesap oluşturma adımları.

requirements: Temel bilgisayar becerileri, internet ve tarayıcı kullanımı konusunda yeterlilik.
TikTok hesabına sahip olma ya da yeni bir hesap oluşturabilme yeteneği.
Dijital pazarlamaya ilgi, sosyal medya reklamcılığına yönelik merak.
İnternet bağlantısı ve TikTok Business Manager’a erişim sağlayabilmek için bir bilgisayar.
Başlangıç düzeyinde reklamcılık bilgisi avantaj olabilir, ancak zorunlu değildir.
courses.description:
TikTok, günümüzün en hızlı büyüyen sosyal medya platformlarından biri olarak, milyonlarca aktif kullanıcıya sahip ve markalar için olağanüstü bir fırsat sunuyor. Eğer markanızı, ürünlerinizi veya hizmetlerinizi TikTok platformunda başarılı bir şekilde tanıtmak istiyorsanız, TikTok Business Manager kullanarak etkili reklam kampanyaları oluşturmak çok önemli. Bu kapsamlı kurs ile sıfırdan başlayarak TikTok Business Manager’ın kurulumunu ve en iyi reklam stratejilerini öğreneceksiniz.
Bu kurs, TikTok'un gücünden yararlanarak işletmenizi büyütmenin anahtarını elinizde tutmanızı sağlayacak. Hedef kitle belirlemeden, etkili reklam görselleri hazırlamaya; bütçe ayarlamalarından performans analizine kadar her adımı öğrenerek TikTok'ta markanızı nasıl daha geniş kitlelere ulaştırabileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.
Bu kurs size neler kazandıracak:
TikTok Business Manager Kurulumu: Kendi TikTok Business Manager hesabınızı nasıl açacağınızı adım adım öğrenin. Bu süreçte karşılaşabileceğiniz olası sorunları ve çözümleri de ele alıyoruz.
Reklam Hesabı Yönetimi: Reklam hesabı oluşturma, düzenleme ve optimizasyon yöntemleri. Farklı hedef kitleleri belirlemek ve reklamlarınızı doğru kişilere ulaştırmak için en iyi stratejiler.
Hedef Kitle Seçimi ve Optimizasyonu: Reklamlarınızın doğru kişilere ulaştığından emin olmak için hedef kitle oluşturma ve optimize etme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Yaş, cinsiyet, ilgi alanları ve daha fazlasına göre ayrıntılı hedefleme yapabileceksiniz.
Reklam Görselleri ve Videoları Hazırlama: TikTok’ta dikkat çekici reklam videoları ve görselleri nasıl tasarlanır? Video süresi, içerik kalitesi, renkler ve mesajınızın nasıl olacağı konularını derinlemesine inceleyin.
Reklam Bütçesi Belirleme ve Yönetme: Reklam kampanyaları için bütçenizi nasıl belirleyeceğinizi öğrenin. Küçük bütçelerle başlayarak kampanyalarınızı test edin ve başarıya ulaşan stratejileri daha büyük bütçelerle optimize edin.
İlk Reklam Kampanyanızı Oluşturun: Reklam kampanyalarını nasıl başlatacağınızı öğrenin. Etkileşim, dönüşüm ve farkındalık gibi farklı kampanya türlerini keşfedin ve işletmenize en uygun kampanyayı oluşturun.
Kampanya Performans Analizi ve Raporlama: Reklam kampanyalarınızın performansını takip etmek ve optimize etmek için TikTok Business Manager’ın sunduğu raporlama araçlarını etkin bir şekilde kullanmayı öğrenin.
Reklam Optimizasyonu ve A/B Testleri: Başarılı reklamların sırlarını öğrenin! A/B testleri yaparak hangi kampanyaların daha iyi sonuç verdiğini keşfedin ve daha iyi sonuçlar elde etmek için kampanyalarınızı optimize edin.
target_audience: Küçük ve orta ölçekli işletme sahipleri, TikTok üzerinden ürün veya hizmetlerini tanıtmak isteyenler.
Dijital pazarlama uzmanları, TikTok Business Manager kullanarak kampanya yönetim becerilerini geliştirmek isteyenler.
Sosyal medya yöneticileri, TikTok platformunda reklam stratejilerini öğrenmek ve etkili kampanyalar oluşturmak isteyenler.
Girişimciler, markalarını TikTok’ta geniş kitlelere ulaştırmak için pratik çözümler arayanlar.
Reklamcılığa yeni başlayanlar, TikTok’un reklam araçlarını ve sosyal medya pazarlama stratejilerini öğrenmek isteyen herkes.

Thalita es una experta certificada en HubSpot, proporcionando servicios de gestión de cuentas y formación desde 2018. Ha enseñado a más de 15,000 estudiantes en Udemy y se enorgullece de ofrecer orientación práctica y directa para sacar el máximo provecho de las herramientas de HubSpot.

courses.description:
Dive deep into the world of digital analytics and transform raw data into actionable business strategy with this comprehensive mastery course. Whether you're starting your analytics journey or looking to sharpen your existing skills, this curriculum is designed to make you a proficient expert in both Adobe Analytics and the powerful Customer Journey Analytics (CJA).
This course goes beyond simple definitions, focusing on practical application to solve real-world business challenges. You will begin by building a rock-solid foundation in Adobe Analytics, learning to navigate the Analysis Workspace with confidence. We’ll guide you through applying metrics, dimensions, and segments to uncover critical insights. You'll master the art of data visualization by building everything from line and bar charts to sophisticated fallout, flow, and cohort analyses that reveal how users truly interact with your digital properties.
From there, we will elevate your skills by exploring Customer Journey Analytics. You’ll understand how to perform true cross-channel analysis by stitching together user identities and leveraging curated Data Views. We'll demystify Adobe Experience Platform and show you how to conduct people-based analysis, build audiences for activation, and even use the AI Assistant to accelerate your workflow.
Finally, we advance your expertise by tackling the most powerful features of the platform. You will learn to build complex, multi-layered segments from scratch, create sophisticated calculated metrics using key functions, and customize components to fit your unique business needs. We cover advanced reporting techniques, data ingestion into tools like Excel, API access, and building mobile scorecards, ensuring you can deliver insights wherever your stakeholders are. By the end of this course, you will not just know the tools; you will be a data storyteller, capable of driving meaningful business growth.

courses.description:
You're looking for a complete course on understanding Forecasting models and forecasting analytics to drive business decisions involving production schedules, inventory management, manpower planning, demand forecasting, and many other parts of the business., right?
You've found the right Marketing Analytics: Forecasting Models with Excel! This course teaches you everything you need to know about different forecasting models and how to implement these models for devising forecasting analytics in Excel using advanced excel tool.
After completing this course you will be able to:
Implement forecasting analytics and forecasting models such as simple linear, simple multiple regression, Ratio to Moving Average, Winter's method for exponential smoothing with trend and seasonality, famous Bass diffusion model and many more.
Increase revenue/profit of your firm by implementing accurate forecasting analytics using Excel solver Add-in
Confidently practice, discuss and understand different Forecasting analytics strategies and forecasting models used by organizations
Creating demand forecasting strategies using forecasting analytics techniques and various forecasting models.
How this course will help you?
A Verifiable Certificate of Completion is presented to all students who undertake this Marketing Analytics: Forecasting Models with Excel course.
If you are a business manager or an executive, or a student who wants to learn and apply forecasting analytics and forecasting models in real world problems of business, this course will give you a solid base by teaching you the most popular forecasting models and how to implement it for effective demand forecasting and for devising forecasting analytics techniques.
Why should you choose this course?
We believe in teaching by example. This course is no exception. Every Section’s primary focus is to teach you the concepts on forecasting analytics, demand forecasting, forecasting models through how-to examples. Each section has the following components:
Theoretical concepts and use cases of different forecasting models and forecasting analytics techniques
Step-by-step instructions on implement forecasting models and forecasting analytics techniques in excel for demand forecasting
Downloadable Excel file containing data and solutions used in each lecture on forecasting models and forecasting analytics
Class notes and assignments to revise and practice the concepts on demand forecasting, forecasting models and forecasting analytics techniques
The practical classes where we create the model for each of these strategies is something which differentiates this course from any other course available online.
What makes us qualified to teach you?
The course is taught by Abhishek and Pukhraj. As managers in Global Analytics Consulting firm, we have helped businesses solve their business problem using Analytics and we have used our experience to include the practical aspects of Marketing and data analytics in this course
We are also the creators of some of the most popular online courses - with over 170,000 enrollments and thousands of 5-star reviews like these ones:
This is very good, i love the fact the all explanation given can be understood by a layman - Joshua
Thank you Author for this wonderful course. You are the best and this course is worth any price. - Daisy
Our Promise
Teaching our students is our job and we are committed to it. If you have any questions about the course content, practice sheet or anything related to any topic, you can always post a question in the course or send us a direct message.
Download Practice files, take Quizzes, and complete Assignments
With each lecture, there are class notes attached for you to follow along. You can also take quizzes to check your understanding of concepts. Each section contains a practice assignment for you to practically implement your learning.
What is covered in this course?
Understanding how future sales will change is one of the key information needed by manager to take data driven decisions. In this course, we will explore how one can use forecasting models to
See patterns in time series data
Make forecasts based on models
Let me give you a brief overview of the course
Section 1 - Introduction
In this section we will learn about the course structure
Section 2 - Basics of Forecasting
In this section, we will discuss about the basic of forecasting and we will also learn the easiest way to create simple linear regression model in Excel
Section 3 - Getting Data Ready for Regression Model
In this section you will learn what actions you need to take a step by step to get the data and then prepare it for the analysis these steps are very important.
We start with understanding the importance of business knowledge then we will see how to do data exploration. We learn how to do uni-variate analysis and bi-variate analysis then we cover topics like outlier treatment and missing value imputation.
Section 4 - Forecasting using Regression Model
This section starts with simple linear regression and then covers multiple linear regression.We have covered the basic theory behind each concept without getting too mathematical about it so that you understand where the concept is coming from and how it is important. But even if you don't understand it, it will be okay as long as you learn how to run and interpret the result as taught in the practical lectures.
We also look at how to quantify models accuracy, what is the meaning of F statistic, how categorical variables in the independent variables dataset are interpreted in the results.
Section 5 - Handling Special events like Holiday sales
In this section we will learn how to incorporate effects of Day of Week Effect, Month Effect or any special event such Holidays, pay day etc.
Section 6 - Identifying Seasonality & Trend for Forecasting
In this section we will learn about trends and seasonality and how to use the Solver to develop an additive or multiplicative model to estimate trends and seasonality. We will also learn how to use moving averages to eliminate seasonality to easily see trends in sales.
Section 7 - Handling Changing Trend & Seasonality over time
In this section we will learn about Winter’s Method that changes trend and seasonal index estimates during each period has a better chance of keeping up with changes than other methods.
Section 8 - Forecasting models for New Products
In this section we will learn techniques to forecast new product sales. It is difficult to forecast when we have little or no historical data. The S curve can be used when we have little data and the famous bass diffusion model can be used to predict product sales even before the product is launched in the market.
Some of the examples in this course are from the book Marketing Analytics: Data-Driven Techniques with Microsoft Excel [Winston, Wayne L.]. We suggest this book as reading material for anyone aspiring to be a marketing analyst.
I am pretty confident that the course will give you the necessary knowledge and skills related to forecasting analytics, forecasting models and demand forecasting strategies; to immediately see practical benefits in your work place.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1 of this course on forecasting analytics and forecasting models!
Cheers
Start-Tech Academy

-


GA4 왜 배워야 할까요?
오프라인 매장의 경우, 어떤 고객들이 어떤 여정을 거쳐 상품을 최종 구매하는지 눈으로 확인할 수 있어 주력 상품의 마케팅을 바로 실행할 수 있습니다. 그러나 규모가 계속해서 커지고 있는 온라인 시장에서 활발하게 소비하고 있는 고객들의 여정은 눈으로 직접 볼 수가 없죠.
웹사이트와 모바일 앱에서 이벤트 기반으로 데이터를 사용하는 Google Analytics 4는, 온라인에서의 고객 여정을 자세히 파악하여 캠페인 성과와 인사이트를 쉽게 얻을 수 있도록 합니다. 즉 GA4는 단순히 데이터를 분석하기 위한 툴이 아닌, ‘소비자’를 이해하고 비즈니스의 방향성을 ‘개선’하기 위한 툴입니다.
2023년 7월 UA(유니버설 애널리틱스) 서비스가 종료되면서 데이터 수집은 GA4를 통해서만 가능하게 될 것입니다. UA 종료 시점에 GA4를 도입한다면 이전의 데이터를 확인할 수 없기 때문에 미리 도입하여 데이터를 적재해두어야 하죠. 따라서 GA4를 처음 도입하는 기업뿐만 아니라 UA를 이용하고 있던 기업들도 이제는 GA4를 시작해야만 할 때가 됐습니다. 특히 세션 기준으로 데이터를 집계하는 UA와 달리, 이벤트와 각 이벤트의 매개변수를 기반으로 데이터가 측정되는 GA4는 기본 보고서가 아닌 탐색 분석을 통해 더 깊은 분석이 가능합니다.
하지만 맨 땅에서 시작하고자 하면 조작이 간단한 UA와 다르게 GA4의 기본적인 세팅부터 외부 데이터 연동과 데이터 활용 및 보고서를 생성하여 시각화하는 방법을 몰라 아까운 데이터만 흘려보내게 됩니다. 이에 마소캠퍼스가 본 강좌를 통해 GA4의 전체적인 개념과 핵심 데이터 처리 구조의 이해를 통해 캠페인을 개선할 수 있는, 온라인 시장에서의 ‘눈’을 만들어 드리겠습니다.




이제는 선택이 아닌 필수가 되어버린 GA4! 더 이상 미루지 말고 <GA4 완전정복 실무 마스터 클래스> 하나로 실무에 바로 적용해보세요!
Step1. Google Analytics 4 이해하기
이벤트? 로그? Dimension? 아직은 생소한 GA4의 용어와 기능! 최신 버전 GA4 기반의 강의로 GA의 진화 과정부터 기본적인 기능과 세팅 방법을 학습합니다. 구글 데모 계정을 이용한 실습이 진행되므로 기업 웹사이트 또는 고객 데이터가 없더라도 누구나 학습 가능합니다. 사내에서 개발자 없이 GA4를 도입하는 분들도 복잡하지 않고 간단하게 추적 코드 동작 과정을 익혀 데이터를 수집할 수 있습니다.
Step2. GA4 이벤트 추적하기
GA4에서는 구글이 자동으로 측정하는 이벤트 외에도 내 비즈니스에 맞는 이벤트까지 직접 구현 가능합니다. Gtag.js 를 활용하여 이벤트를 추적하는 방법을 소개하고 전자상거래 데이터를 쉽게 확인할 수 있도록 합니다.
맞춤 이벤트를 정의하면 웹사이트/앱 내에서 우리 고객들이 어떻게 행동하고 어디서 들어왔는지 파악할 수 있어 유의미한 인사이트를 얻을 수 있습니다.
Step3. GA4 맞춤 보고서 작성하기
우리회사, 우리 조직에 딱 맞는 GA4 맞춤 보고서를 설계하고 원하는 관점의 세그먼트를 지정해 인사이트를 도출해낼 수 있습니다. ‘고객이 상품을 조회하고 장바구니에 담아 결제를 진행하여 최종 구매를 하기’까지의 퍼널 분석으로 유입 경로를 탐색하고 세그먼트 분석 보고서를 통해 직접 가설을 검증해보세요.
GA4의 최대 강점인 ‘예측 기능’을 활용하여 비즈니스 목표 설정과 각종 이슈에 대비하는 능력을 키울 수 있습니다.
Step4. 마케팅 캠페인 성과 분석하기
이번 마케팅 캠페인 성과는 지난 캠페인과 비교했을 때 어떤 차이가 있을까?
구매 고객이 다른 웹사이트에서 우리 사이트/앱으로 이동한 과정에서 어떤 마케팅 채널의 기여도가 가장 높을까?
GA4의 기여 분석 모델을 학습한 후, 머신러닝 기반의 유입 채널에 대한 전환 기여도를 계산해보세요! 어떤 채널과 터치포인트에 집중하고 어떻게 마케팅 예산을 분배해야 할지 그 해답이 보일 것입니다.

데이터를 관리하고 성과를 개선하기 위한 필수 도구 GA4!
GA4의 핵심 개념과 구조에 대한 상세한 설명을 통해 구글 애널리틱스 활용 방법을 학습하는 과정!


<구글 애널리틱스 GA4 완전정복 실무 마스터 클래스> 강의를 듣고 나면,
여러분께서는 다음과 같은 역량을 확보하실 수 있습니다.
– GA4 주요 항목 이해 및 활용: 생소한 GA4의 각종 용어와 항목들을 완벽하게 숙지하고 100% 활용하는 능력
– GA4의 다양한 이벤트 추적 방식 이해: 구글이 알아서 측정해주고 자동으로 모니터링해주는 이벤트, 그리고 내가 직접 추적해보는 이벤트까지! 복잡하기만 했던 트래킹 간단하게 적용하고 분석하는 능력
– 맞춤 분석 보고서 작성 및 인사이트 도출: 자유 형식, 유입 경로 분석, 세그먼트 중복 분석 등 다양한 탐색적 데이터 분석으로 우리 고객에 대한 이해를 높이는 능력
– 외부 캠페인 트래킹: 티스토리 블로그에 직접 코드를 설치하고 이벤트 데이터를 세팅하는 실습을 통해 데이터 경로의 분석과 데이터를 시각화 하는 능력 향상
– 외부 채널 및 구글 서비스 연동: 외부 마케팅 채널과 구글의 다양한 서비스(GTM, Google BigQuery, Google Ads, Google Search Console)를 연동하여 데이터를 효과적으로 관리하는 능력


[ 강 사 소 개 ]
김 진
現 마소캠퍼스 대표
서울대학교 MBA 졸업
오라클, 네이버를 거쳐 중국 네이버 개발 아웃소싱 센터를 설립 및 지휘하였으며, 서울대 MBA 졸업 후 글로벌 모바일 기업인 Obigo로 옮겨 데이터 분석에 기반한 성과 관리 시스템 도입 등 국내외 다양한 사업 영역을 개척하였습니다. 2010년에는 게임웹진 플레이포럼 M&A 후 데이터 분석과 디지털 마케팅을 실무에 본격 도입해 코리안클릭 수치 기준으로 월 평균 활성유저(MAU) 238만, 월 평균 페이지뷰(PV)수 1,700만을 달성하였습니다. 개발자, 전문 경영인의 길을 걸어온 사업가로서 폭넓은 경험과 IT 기술을 융합해 현재는 기업의 ROI를 높여줄 실무 전문가 교육에 힘 쓰고 있습니다.
