courses.description:
In this big data age, knowing how to organize, synthesize, and analyze large quantities of marketing data is no longer an "good-to-have" skill. It is absolutely essential! Are you a student looking to set yourself apart from your peers? Are you looking to break into social media marketing? Do you want to become an expert in marketing analytics? If so, then this course is for you!
In this course, we'll teach you everything you need to know to become an expert in marketing analytics. No prior experience in social media marketing, statistics, or marketing required!
Our course is based on the hands-on, case-study method to learning. In other words, we'll learn by analyzing the data in a real-life scenario. The course begins with an introduction to big data, data analytics, and marketing analytics. This will allow you to feel comfortable with these terms.
Afterwards, we move on to learning the most important web, social media, digital advertising, customer, and revenue metrics in marketing. As we learn each new metric, we'll immediately apply it to the real-life case study.
We cap off the course by teaching you how to properly model out a new marketing initiative. This model will project out a campaign's revenue and expenses for 2 years and will be complete with scenario and sensitivity analyses. We then conclude by summarizing our data in a beautiful, dynamic dashboard.
We are excited to have you join us on this journey and look forward to seeing you in the course!
target_audience: Social media professionals
Marketing students
Digital advertisers
Marketing professsionals

courses.description:

You're not alone! 83% of marketers say they struggle "to adapt to the volume of data" created by their marketing efforts, while 80% feel that there are "too many performance metrics" to keep track of. Today, it's essential for everyone to possess a foundation in data literacy. Whether you're an analyst, a brand manager, creative, or even a CMO, understanding how to collect, interpret and action your marketing data is quickly becoming the standard, rather than the exception.
I designed this course based on more than 10 years of knowledge and experience working directly in the field of data analytics and market research. We'll cover everything from theory to application, to ensure you're equipped with the knowledge to make sense of your marketing data and make logical, data-driven decisions both quickly and consistently.

التجربة والتطبيق العملي
لا حاجة لمعرفة البرمجة، أو لأتقان أي من لغات البرمجة
courses.description:
هل تتطلع إلى فهم أعمق لبيانات التسويق وكيفية تسخيرها لتحقيق نتائج استثنائية؟ هل تريد أن تصبح خبيرًا في تحليل الحملات التسويقية واتخاذ قرارات مستنيرة تدفع النمو؟ إذا كان الأمر كذلك، فإن دورة "تحليلات التسويق: من البيانات إلى القرارات" هي البوابة التي تفتح لك آفاقًا جديدة في عالم التسويق القائم على البيانات.

ماذا ستتعلم؟
أساسيات تحليلات التسويق: ستكتسب فهمًا شاملاً لمفاهيم التحليلات الأساسية، وكيفية جمع البيانات، وأهم المقاييس التي يجب تتبعها.
فهم البيانات: اكتشف أنواع البيانات المختلفة وكيفية جمعها وتنظيمها.
مقاييس الأداء الرئيسية (KPIs): تعرف على أهم المقاييس التي يجب تتبعها لتقييم أداء حملاتك التسويقية.
تحليل الحملات التسويقية: ستتعلم كيفية تقييم أداء الحملات التسويقية عبر مختلف القنوات، وتحديد نقاط القوة والضعف، وتقديم توصيات
قابلة للتنفيذ.
اتخاذ قرارات مستنيرة: ستكتسب القدرة على تحليل البيانات واستخلاص رؤى ذات مغزى تساعدك في اتخاذ قرارات تسويقية استراتيجية.
تقارير البيانات: تعلم كيفية إنشاء تقارير بيانات واضحة وموجزة تساعدك في اتخاذ قرارات مستنيرة.


لماذا هذه الدورة؟
محتوى شامل ومحدث: تغطي الدورة أحدث الاتجاهات والممارسات في مجال تحليلات التسويق.
نهج عملي وتطبيقي: ستتعلم من خلال أمثلة واقعية وتمارين تفاعلية تساعدك على تطبيق المفاهيم على الفور.
مدرب خبير: ستتلقى التوجيه من مدرب ذو خبرة واسعة في مجال تحليلات التسويق.


هذه الدورة مثالية لك إذا كنت:
مسوقًا مبتدئًا: ترغب في بناء أساس قوي في تحليلات التسويق.
مسوقًا متمرسًا: ترغب في تطوير مهاراتك في تحليل البيانات واتخاذ القرارات.
رائد أعمال: ترغب في فهم كيفية استخدام البيانات لتنمية أعمالك.
طالبًا: ترغب في اكتساب مهارات قابلة للتسويق في مجال تحليلات البيانات.


فسواء كنت مسوقًا مبتدئًا أو محترفًا متمرسًا، فإن هذه الدورة ستزودك بالمعرفة والمهارات اللازمة للتفوق في عالم التسويق القائم على البيانات. انضم إلينا اليوم وابدأ رحلتك نحو أن تصبح خبيرًا في تحليلات التسويق

courses.bio: Prepare for Adobe Analytics Business Practitioner AD0-E208 exam. 50 high-quality questions and answers among 3 tests.
courses.description:
Preparing for Adobe Analytics Business Practitioner AD0-E208 exam? This is THE practice exams course to give you the winning edge.
These practice exams have been authored by Logan Jung who brings 10+ years of experience in analytics, 4 years of experience in Digital Analytics, and a myriad of certifications in numerous analytics tools and software.
The tone and tenor of the questions mimic the real exam.
We want you to think of this course as the final pit-stop so that you can cross the winning line with absolute confidence and get Adobe Analytics Certified!
All questions have been written from scratch!


You will get Three high-quality practice exams to be ready for your certification


Quality speaks for itself.
SAMPLE QUESTION:
A cellphone manufacturer runs media campaigns offering products to those using the device from competing brands. Daily, some metrics of these campaigns are evaluated for strategic decision-making.


Which metrics can be added to a project in Workspace that would bring the best view to evaluate daily?


Visits, Order, Units, Revenue
Visits, Bounce Rate, Conversion Rate, Revenue
Visits, Order, Revenue


What's your guess, Scroll below for the answer.
Correct: 2.
Correct option:
Visits, Bounce Rate, Conversion Rate, Revenue
Let's start off by defining each metric:
The ‘Visits’ metric shows the number of sessions across all visitors on your site.
The ‘Bounce rate’ metric shows the ratio of visits that contained exactly one hit compared to the number of visits on that page. You can use this metric to understand which dimension items have the highest bounce rate or to see an aggregated total bounce rate of your site over time.
A conversion occurs when a user completes a desired action or goal on a website, online app, or other digital platforms. This can be an event (a.k.a. conversion event), such as a purchase or form submission, or a metric such as the number of return visits within a given time period.
The ‘Revenue’ metric shows the monetary amount of products purchased within all orders. This metric is vital for eCommerce sites in measuring conversion. You can combine this metric with any dimension to see which dimension items contributed to revenue.


Because conversion rate is the only available in one of the choices, that would be the correct answer because we want to know how well a marketing campaign is performing in converting customers from using a competitor brand to ours.


Welcome to the best practice exams to help you prepare for your exam.
You can retake the exams as many times as you want
This is a huge original question bank
You get support from instructors if you have questions
Each question has a detailed explanation
Mobile-compatible with the Udemy app
30-days money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied
We hope that by now you're convinced. And there are a lot more questions inside the course.
Happy learning and best of luck!

courses.description:
「また、セールスレターの作成に何時間も溶かしてしまった...」

そんな悩みを抱えてませんか？


もう、セールスレター作成に時間もお金も浪費する必要はありません。

なぜなら、最新のAI「ChatGPT」を活用すれば
たった数十分で、プロ級のセールスレターを作成できるからです。


特別なAIに関する専門知識や、難しいプロンプトを覚える必要はありません。
「売れるセールスレター」は、もはやAIが全自動で作る時代。

本講座でその仕組みを手にいれ、ビジネスを安定させる第一歩を踏み出しましょう！


■ AIを駆使して、売れるセールスレターを最短でマスター！

初心者でも簡単に使えるテンプレート＆プロンプトつき
高価格帯の商品にも対応できる、プロ級のセールスレター構成をマスター


■ このコースの詳細と全体像
このコースは、最新のAI技術ChatGPT(GPTs)を駆使して、売上を劇的に伸ばすセールスレターの作成術を完全習得できます。
さらに、実績豊富なマーケターによるセールスレターを徹底解剖し、実際にどのようにセールスレターを執筆するかを、リアルタイムで実演解説しました。

ヘッダー、ボディ、フッターといった、各パーツごとの重要部分を自分の力で書き上げられるスキルが身につき、高価格帯の商品にも対応可能なクオリティを目指せるのが特徴です。


また、初心者でもすぐに活用できるテンプレートとプロンプト集を多数ご用意。
これにより、迷わずに作業を進められ、

AIやマーケティングの知識がなくても、直感的な操作で、プロさえ唸るクオリティのセールスレターを作成できます。


■ 受講後、あなたのビジネスはこう変わります

セールスレターを外注せずに自分で作成できるようになり、外注費を大幅に削減できる
ChatGPTを使いこなすスキルが身につき、短時間で高品質なセールスレターを作成可能に
セールスレターで売上を自動化し、対面クロージングやセミナーに頼らないビジネスモデルを構築

効率的な作業フローとテンプレートの活用により、継続的にクオリティの高いセールスレターを量産できる

AIの進化は加速の一途をたどっています。 この波に乗るか、取り残されるか。
その分岐点に、あなたは立っています。


■ こんな方が受講に向いています

セールスレターの外注費が重く、利益が圧迫されていると感じている方
AIを使ったセールスレター作成に挑戦したいが、使いこなせるか不安がある方

高価格帯の商品を扱っているが、それに見合ったセールスレターを書けないと悩んでいる方
過去にAI講座で挫折した経験があり、再挑戦に不安を感じている方

全部で約6時間38分のコースです。
その他、必要に応じてワークシートが用意されています。

ワークシートに沿って実践していただくことで、セールスレター作成スキルを着実に身につけられます。

もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。

それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！

courses.description:
HubSpot Sequences, Workflows & Analytics for Sales is designed to empower you with the essential tools needed to streamline sales processes through Automation and Reporting.
If you’re already familiar with HubSpot’s CRM basics and are ready to maximize sales efficiency, this course dives into the core of HubSpot’s automation and analytics features for sales, including Sequences, Workflows, and Reporting.
Whether you're a sales professional looking to improve your follow-up process or a business owner wanting to track and enhance sales performance, this course will guide you in implementing HubSpot's sales automation and reporting functionalities.


By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Master HubSpot Sales Automation:
Understand the key elements of a Workflow—triggers and actions—and how to set them up to automate sales tasks.
Work with Sales Sequences to automate prospect outreach and follow-up.
Implement workflows to handle recurring sales tasks, from sending emails to setting reminders and assigning deals.
Work with both contact-based and deal-based Workflows (highly relevant to Sales)!
Create and Customize Sales Workflows:
Use branching logic to split workflows into different journeys, personalizing sales interactions based on actions prospects take (e.g., document views, email responses, or meeting bookings), as well as their attributes.
Set up advanced actions to automate complex processes
Implement conditional workflows to dynamically adjust contact journeys based on real-time engagement, ensuring every lead receives timely and relevant follow-up.
Build Effective Sales Reports:
Create dashboards and reports tailored for sales to track your team’s performance metrics.
Customize reports to gain insights into lead activity, conversion stages, and deal progression.
Explore advanced report types, such as customer journey reports and funnel reports, to optimize your sales process.
Monitor and Enhance Sales Performance:
Measure the effectiveness of your workflows and sequences with HubSpot’s analytics.
Identify areas of improvement and adjust your sales strategy by leveraging HubSpot's reporting tools.


Attention:
To get the most from this course, you’ll need access to HubSpot Sales Sequences, Workflows, and Custom Reports.
This is not a beginner-level course. If you’re new to HubSpot, I recommend beginning with an introductory course on HubSpot basics. Check out my HubSpot for Beginners course on Udemy if you need foundational knowledge before diving into automation and analytics.


--
I am a certified HubSpot expert, providing HubSpot account management and training services to companies worldwide since 2018. Here’s one of my client testimonials:
"I just completed the course - and my only reaction is: WOW! Super valuable for entrepreneurs, consultants (such as myself), and small businesses. Thalita successfully managed to transfer her rich knowledge in a meticulous manner. This course is easy to comprehend and incorporate into your business strategy. I honestly never knew the actual possibilities of the HubSpot platform (free version) and now I finally do! I can't wait to start using it to its full extent! Thank you so much for this course!" - Tamara Biljman, Content Strategist
Feel free to check out my website for more testimonials. I take pride in assisting my students and coaching clients throughout the learning journey, so feel free to ask me any questions at any time during the course.


This is an independently developed course by Thalita Milan and has not been created, endorsed, or verified by HubSpot, Inc. HubSpot, Inc. shall not have any liability with respect to this course offered by Thalita Milan.

courses.description:
Google Analytics 4: Webanalyse meistern mit GA4 2025
Meistere Google Analytics (GA4) und Google Tag Manager (GTM) für datengetriebenes Marketing und optimierte Webanalyse!


Hast du dich jemals gefragt, wie du Google Analytics 4 wirklich effektiv nutzen kannst? Möchtest du tief in die Welt der Webanalyse eintauchen und verstehen, welche Daten dein Online-Business wirklich voranbringen? Dann bist du hier genau richtig! In diesem umfassenden Kurs lernst du, wie du Google Analytics 4 meisterst und dein Marketing datengetrieben optimierst. Egal, ob du Einsteiger bist oder bereits mit Google-Analytics gearbeitet hast – du wirst praxisnahe Einblicke und wertvolle Tipps erhalten, um deine Online-Performance zu verbessern.


Warum du diesen Kurs brauchst
Daten sind das Gold des digitalen Zeitalters. Doch nur, wenn du sie richtig interpretierst, kannst du fundierte Entscheidungen treffen. Google Analytics 4 bietet dir genau die Tools, die du brauchst, um tiefgehende Analysen zu erstellen, Nutzerverhalten zu verstehen und dein Marketing auf das nächste Level zu heben.


Mit diesem Kurs lernst du:
Die Grundlagen und Funktionen von Google Analytics 4 – perfekt für Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene
Wie du GA4 effektiv für dein Business nutzt – keine Theorie, sondern direkt umsetzbare Strategien
Fortgeschrittene Techniken zur Analyse und Optimierung – von Event-Tracking bis Conversion-Messung
Die Integration mit anderen Google-Tools – Google Tag Manager, Google Looker Studio und mehr


Das erwartet dich im Kurs
Modul 1: Einführung – Dein erster Schritt in die Welt von GA4
Pro Tool: Google Analytics 4 - KI Assistent für deine Fragen
Entdecke, wie der KI-gestützte Assistent in GA4 dir hilft, wichtige Erkenntnisse zu gewinnen, anstatt stundenlang durch endlose Berichte zu klicken.
Pro Tipp: 3 Goldene Nuggets für deinen Einstieg mit GA4
Diese drei essenziellen Tipps sorgen dafür, dass du von Anfang an auf dem richtigen Weg bist und die typischen Anfängerfehler vermeidest.


Modul 2: Grundlagen & Einblick – So funktioniert Google Analytics 4
Was ist Google Analytics 4 und warum ist es wichtig?
GA4 ist nicht einfach nur der Nachfolger von Universal Analytics – es ist eine komplette Revolution in der Webanalyse. Erfahre, warum du GA4 jetzt nutzen solltest.
Vorteile von GA4
Lerne, warum GA4 mit seinem ereignisbasierten Tracking, den KI-gestützten Prognosen und der verbesserten Datenstruktur die Zukunft der Webanalyse ist.
Wichtige Funktionen im Überblick
Entdecke die leistungsstarken Features von GA4 – von Echtzeit-Daten bis hin zu individuellen Berichten.
Wo finde ich Google Analytics 4?
Falls du GA4 noch nicht nutzt, zeige ich dir genau, wie und wo du es findest und einrichtest.
Einführung in die Benutzeroberfläche
Die Benutzeroberfläche von GA4 kann anfangs überwältigend sein – ich führe dich Schritt für Schritt durch die wichtigsten Bereiche.


Modul 3: Google Analytics 4 – Die wichtigsten Berichte verstehen
Startseite und Dashboard
Dein erster Anlaufpunkt für schnelle Einblicke in dein Nutzerverhalten.
Standard- und benutzerdefinierte Berichte
Erfahre, wie du GA4-Berichte liest, anpasst und für dein Business optimierst.
Explorative Datenanalysen
Nutze explorative Analysen, um tiefere Einblicke in deine Daten zu erhalten und Muster im Nutzerverhalten zu erkennen.
Arbeitsbereich Werbung
Optimiere deine Kampagnen mit detaillierten Werbeanalysen.
Verwaltung & Einstellungen
Lerne, wie du GA4 an deine individuellen Bedürfnisse anpasst.


Modul 4: Einrichtung & Nutzung – GA4 auf das nächste Level bringen
Der Google Analytics 4 Einrichtungsassistent
Schnell und einfach starten – so richtest du GA4 in wenigen Minuten ein.
Deine Website mit GA4 verbinden
Eine ausführliche Anleitung zur korrekten Verknüpfung deiner Website mit GA4.
Google Signale & Conversion Tracking
Verstehe, wie du wichtige Nutzerinteraktionen erfasst und optimierst.
Zielgruppen & Rechtemanagement
Lerne, wie du Zielgruppen segmentierst und individuelle Berechtigungen vergibst.


Modul 5: Datenschutz & DSGVO – Was du wissen musst
Google Analytics 4 & DSGVO leicht verständlich erklärt
So nutzt du GA4 in Einklang mit den Datenschutzbestimmungen.
Cookies & Datenschutz
Erfahre, welche Rolle Cookies in GA4 spielen und welche Einstellungen du beachten solltest.


Modul 6: Dashboards & Berichte mit Google Looker Studio
Einführung in Google Looker Studio
So visualisierst du deine GA4-Daten verständlich und übersichtlich.
Data Connectors & individuelle Dashboards
Integriere verschiedene Datenquellen und erstelle personalisierte Berichte für dein Business.


Modul 7: Google Tag Manager verstehen & effektiv nutzen
Google Tag Manager einrichten
Tracke Nutzeraktionen flexibel und unabhängig von Entwicklern.
Ereignisse und Tags verwalten
Übertrage wichtige Ereignisse an GA4, um tiefere Analysen zu ermöglichen.


Modul 8: Praxistipps & Best Practices
Die 4 häufigsten Fehler in GA4 – und wie du sie vermeidest
Spare dir Stunden der Frustration mit diesen Tipps.
Mit KI zu mehr Erfolg
Lerne, wie du KI-gestützte Analysen für dein Marketing nutzt.


Modul 9: Erweiterte Analyse-Tools & Benchmarks
KPI-Benchmarking in GA4
So setzt du realistische Ziele und vergleichst deine Performance mit der Konkurrenz.
Google Analytics 4 Events: Das ultimative Cheat Sheet
Die wichtigsten Events für dein Tracking im Überblick.


Starte jetzt und werde ein Profi in Google Analytics 4!

Marketing-Profis, die datengetriebenes Marketing optimieren wollen
Unternehmen, die ihre Webanalyse und Conversion-Optimierung verbessern möchten

courses.description:
Hola, te doy la bienvenida a este mi primer curso de introducción al mundo de la analítica digital, aprenderás los conceptos desde la creación del plan de medición e como llevar a cabo un plan de implementación antes de comenzar de entender el sistema de etiquetados Google Tag Manager, incluyendo parte de Google Analytics 4
>>> IMPORTANTE <<<
Udemy ha cambiado su política respecto a los cursos gratuitos, por lo que el máximo de tiempo disponible para este módulo, serán de 2 horas. Solo mostraré unos conceptos de Analítica, Tag Manager y Data Studio para que puedas valorar la calidad y así tomar el resto de mis cursos avanzados, y con descuentos! Una buena valoración del mismo me permite seguir ofreciendo cursos de calidad y actulizarlos.
¿Qué cosa incluye este curso?
Pasaremos a los conceptos generales de Google Analytics la herramientas imprescindible para todos aquellos que trabajan en marketing, que tienen un sitio web y desearán trabajar en una agencia, pero no tienen suficientes nociones básicas.
Es la introducción de dos módulos para que quién avanzar más estarán disponibles otros dos cursos avanzados de Google Analytics y de Google Tag Manager y Data Studio.


¿Cómo está organizado el curso?
En la primera parte y presentación se hablará de analítica web, plan de medición e implementación, tag management system y tag manager. La segunda parte de este curso como instalar tag manager e implementación de las etiquetas. Los objetivos del curso completo es avanzar desde cero hasta ya personalizar las etiquetas. El programa consta de 12 módulos.
Historia de la analítica web
Plan de Medición
Plan Implementación
Introducción al Administrador de Etiquetas de Google: Google Tag Manager
Fundamentos y conceptos de Google Analytics
Casos Prácticos de GTM y GA

¿Si quiero profundizar conceptos de Tag Manager?
Este curso es de básico e introductorio, por lo que muchos conceptos de Google Tag Manager, se encuentran en el propio curso específico disponible en mi catálogo de cursos: [A-Z] Google Tag Manager de básico a especialista de tags

¿Si quiero profundizar conceptos de Google Analytics?
Este curso es de básico e introductorio por lo que muchos conceptos de Google Analytics, se encuentran en el propio curso específico disponible en mi catálogo de cursos: [A-Z] avanzado con analítica digital: Google Analytics + GTM

¿Si quiero profundizar conceptos de Data Studio?
Este curso veremos las opciones que se pueden realizar con Data Studio, pero los conceptos más avanzados se encuentran disponible en mi catálogo de cursos. [A-Z] Google Data Studio crea reportes, informes y dashboard


¿Si quiero profundizar conceptos de visualización de datos?
Este curso veremos las opciones que se pueden realizar con Data Studio, pero si necesitas conocer parte de fundamentos de visualización puedes tomar el curso gratuito Fundamentos de visualización de datos


¿Si quiero aprender una herramienta como Power BI, Tableau?
Puede tomar el curso [A-Z] Avanza con Power BI analítica y visualización de datos


¿ A quién está dirigido este curso?
Principalmente para convertirse en Technical Digital Analyst, la nueva figura profesional con mucha demanda en agencias y empresas de marketing y de medios, un híbrido entre los desarrolladores front y analistas digitales, que entienden de negocio, objetivos, marketing y campañas, así como medir correctamente los eventos de los usuarios, realizar testing de CRO y analizar los datos a través de insights en Google Data Studio o similar. Sin duda es un curso con módulos más técnicos que te prepara para este trabajo.
¿Necesitas certificarte en Google Analytics?
Aunque es un curso orientado a quien quiere conocer la herramienta desde la base, también aquellos que quieren prepararse incluso a la certificación oficial de Google Analytics, tengo bastante años certificando muchos alumnos con un promedio del 95%. Se realizarán pruebas para el examen para la Certificación oficial de Google Analytics 2020 (skillshop withgoogle com) o si prefieres puedes prepararlo solo mirando mis vídeos tutoriales.
¿Necesitas asesoramiento personalizado?
Los cursos avanzados también son disponibles a través de tutoría personalizadas. Puedes buscar mi perfil y contratar la tutoría en Superprof: superprof es marcusRB o a través de mi web personal.




El curso será impartido por:
Marco Russo:
Vengo del mundo de la economía y finanza, he trabajado como financial advisor en BBVA para banca de inversión, pasando por el Marketing Digital y especialista de tráfico de pago (Google Ads). La pasión por resolver problemas me motiva a estudiar Business Analytics & Data Analytics y mantener este perfil híbrido de (business e informática).
Actualmente conozco y trabajo con los siguientes lenguajes JavaScript, SQL, Python, R. He trabajado como front/back principalmente con HTML, CSS, PHP, Go para las tareas de creación de analítica de medición. Especializado en minería de datos, marketing digital, SEO SEM, y conjuntamente con la explotación y visualización de datos.
He creado hace años tres escuelas de formación KPIschool, DataSchool y aiSchool proyecto en pleno crecimiento. Separados por programas de fundamentos y avanzados de Digital Marketing (Google Ads, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Data Studio y Optimize, y Data Science: Big Data y modelado de datos, base de datos SQL y noSQL, Python, Lenguaje R, Data Visualization y de Business Intelligence. Disciplina STEM, cuáles Raspberry Pi y Arduino, e IoT Internet de las cosas además de las herramientas de análisis y visualización de datos, Power BI, Tableau.
Finalmente tengo muchas cualidades como profesor y tutor desde analítica digital a analítica de datos. Desde 2012  como docente en programas de másters y postgrados en diversas escuelas de negocios, entre ellas EAE Business School, IMF, IIM Instituto de Marketing, AdveiSchool, Digital Brain, Neoland, Fictizia además de formador en la Cámara de Comercio de Madrid y otras tantas asociaciones y cooperativas.
Creador de varios cursos de digital marketing en plataformas premium, seminarios y webinar en varias escuelas de negocio. Además de ser profesor colaborador con la Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (asignaturas de visualización de datos, minería de datos y machine learning) y tutor del máster oficial de Data Science.
Actualmente estoy colaborando en diferente proyectos de formación acercándome más al mundo americano, especialmente Perú, Colombia, México, Argentina, Chile, entre otros con planes de aprendizaje más a medida del alumno.
target_audience: profesionales autónomos, empresarios que tienen una página web

profesionales del marketing en su inicios con la analítica web
community manager, social media y otras figuras del marketing
aquellos que realizan SEO SEM SMM que quieren conocer algo más sobre la analítica web

requirements: Domínio e hospedagem
courses.description:
No marketing digital, uma página de captura é uma página usada para capturar clientes em potencial, geralmente fornecendo conteúdo gratuito em troca das informações de contato do usuário. Décadas atrás, os profissionais de marketing adquiriam clientes em potencial comprando uma lista telefônica de um quilômetro de comprimento ou criando um grande número de formulários físicos. Mas com o rápido desenvolvimento do marketing digital, a página de captura (ou página de destino) tornou-se uma das principais pessoas responsáveis pela captura de contatos.
A estrutura de sua página de destino pode variar dependendo de seus objetivos, mas, em geral, estes são alguns dos elementos mais comuns:
Título: Aqui é onde o título do conteúdo / isca digital fornecido geralmente aparece (mais sobre isso mais tarde) e uma breve descrição (que também pode ser usada como legenda). Texto: O texto da página de captura deve ser simples e claro, explicar o que o usuário receberá após o preenchimento do formulário e resumir seu conteúdo em alguns casos. Formulário: o formulário é a parte mais importante da página de captura.
No curso você irá aprender o passo-a-passo para criação de página de captura de Leads profissional utilizando ferramentas de fácil aprendizagem de forma que possam escalar seu negócio e alavancar suas vendas.
target_audience: Empreendedores de marketing Digital, produtores e etc.

創新行銷企劃：KOL 合作、跨場景活動設計。
五、學習成果
能獨立規劃一份 品牌行銷 AI 商業計畫書。
具備 行銷數據分析 與 AI 工具應用的實戰經驗。
完成至少 1 個 品牌短影音行銷活動企劃。
擁有 品牌 KPI 與成效管理能力。
可直接應用於 職場專案、創業規劃、電商經營。
target_audience: 行銷企劃人員 —— 希望提升數位行銷與品牌管理能力。
社群經營者 / KOL / 自媒體經營者 —— 需要運用 AI 工具強化社群互動與粉絲經營。
品牌經理 / 產品經理 —— 對於產品策略、品牌定位與績效指標制定有需求。
創業者 / 中小企業主 —— 想用 AI 行銷工具，快速建立品牌曝光與銷售成效。
零售 / 餐飲業者 —— 需透過行銷創意與數位化工具提升來客數與營收。
廣告與公關公司人員 —— 想學習 AI 在廣告自動化、內容生成、顧客分析上的應用。
數位轉型顧問 / 商業顧問 —— 協助企業在行銷活動中導入 AI。
電商從業者 —— 想掌握 AI 推薦、客製化促銷與流量經營。
大專院校行銷、商管、傳播相關科系學生 —— 作為實務導向的補充訓練。
希望培養第二專長的人才 —— 例如跨領域專業人士，想強化行銷與 AI 應用能力。
顧問、行銷講師、培訓師
想轉職數位行銷的跨領域人才

objectives: Digital Marketers

requirements: No prerequisites
courses.description:
Get started with Google Analytics 4 quickly and easily
Learn everything you need to get started with GA4, including developing reports, analyzing data, and making marketing decisions that move the needle!


The Google Analytics 4 Fast Track course will take you from zero to hero with GA4! You don't need to have any prior knowledge of Google Analytics to get started - simply follow the course's steps to set up and start using your Google Analytics 4 account.


The course comes with video tutorials and downloadable notes to help you to move fast and implement everything quickly and easily! You will learn how to set up and configure GA4 from scratch, how to configure the tool, and how to develop meaningful and informative website reports that you can use in your day-to-day digital marketing role!


Google Analytics 4 Fast Track Course Agenda:


Everything you need to get started:

1. Google Analytics 4 Setup
2. Google Analytics 4 Configuration
3. Google Analytics 4 Events & Conversion Tracking
4. Google Analytics 4 Interface
5. Google Analytics 4 Metrics
6. Google Analytics 4 UTM Tags

Website Reporting & Marketing Analysis:

1. Looker Studio Reporting
2. Marketing Channel Analysis
3. Attribution Analysis
4. Page (Content) Performance Analysis
5. Location (Geo-Targeting) Analysis
target_audience: Everything you need to get started with Google Analytics 4

courses.title: 【한글자막】 마케팅 분석 : 가격 전략 및 가격 분석으로 비즈니스 매출을 극대화 시키는 법
courses.bio: 마케팅 분석 중 가격 전략과 가격 분석에 대한 실용 강의! 엑셀 Diff 가격 전략 및 고급 가격 책정 모델을 활용해서 수익을 증대시키고 엑셀 가격 분석 완료하여 성공적으로 마케팅하기
objectives: 번들링, 수량 할인, 이부요율제, 초기 고가격 전략, 매출 관리의 경우 매출/수익을 최적화할 수 있게 가격을 책정하는 법을 배웁니다.
가장 흔히 사용되는 두 개의 수요 곡선(선형 및 거듭제곱)을 특정 마케팅 상황에 적용하는 법을 배웁니다.
케이블 회사가 유선 전화, 휴대 전화 서비스, TV 서비스, 인터넷 서비스를 결합으로 제공하는(번들링) 이유를 학습합니다.
왜 기업들이 수량 할인을 실시하며 어떻게 할인 수량을 결정하는지(수량 할인)를 배웁니다.
왜 골프장에서 회당 라운딩 요금에 멤버십 가입 비용까지 부과하는지(이부요율제) 알아봅니다.
왜 하이테크 제품 가격은 보통 시간의 흐름에 따라 하락하는지(초기 고가격 전략)를 학습합니다.
왜 항공사들이 좌석을 오버부킹하는지(매출 관리) 알아봅니다.
마케팅 기초와 가격 책정 개념에 대해 확실히 이해합니다.
엑셀 해찾기, 엑셀 목표값 찾기, 추세선 등 강력한 도구를 최대 매출/수익을 위한 가격 최적화 문제 해결에 능숙하게 사용하는 법을 배웁니다.

단계 2: 수요 추정: 엑셀: 탄력성을 이용한 거듭제곱 수요 곡선 추정
엑셀: 점을 이용한 거듭제곱 수요 곡선 추정
엑셀: 엑셀 해찾기를 활용해 매출 극대화하기
단계 3: 비용 추정: 엑셀: 비용 함수 모델링과 수익 극대화
부록 1: 엑셀 단기 강좌: Lookup 수식(V Lookup, H Lookup, Index-Match)
엑셀 차트: 전달될 수 있는 메시지 카테고리

requirements: 어떤 버전이든 엑셀이 설치된 PC가 필요합니다.
파일 열기, 닫기, 저장 등 엑셀 조작에 대한 기본적인 이해합니다.
courses.description:
마케팅 분석 중 가격 전략과 가격 분석에 대한 실용 강의!
엑셀을 활용하여 가격을 책정하세요!
각종 수업 노트 및 과제, 엑셀 파일 등 학습 도움 자료 포함!


"마케팅 분석 : 가격 전략 및 가격 분석으로 비즈니스 매출을 극대화 시키는 법"을 선택해야 하는 이유
여러분의 비즈니스 매출/수익을 극대화할 수 있는 가격 전략과 가격 분석에 대한 수업을 찾고 계시다면, 올바른 마케팅 분석과 가격 전략 코스를 찾으신 겁니다!
이 코스에서는 여러분이 알아야 할 다양한 가격 책정 전략과 이를 수익을 극대화하는 가격을 구현하는 데 활용하는 법을 알려드릴 겁니다.


저희는 이해하기 쉽고 적용 가능한 예시를 통한 교육이 옳다고 생각합니다. 이 강의도 그렇습니다. 모든 섹션의 주요 초점은 방법 예시를 통해 개념을 알려드리는 겁니다. 이 강의를 듣고 나면 가격 책정 전략과 가격 전략과 가격 분석에 대해 마스터 하게 되실 겁니다.


각 섹션은 다음과 같은 요소로 구성됩니다:
가격 책정 전략의 이론적 개념과 용도
엑셀에서 매출/수익을 극대화하는 가격을 찾는 단계별 방법
각 강의에 사용된 데이터와 솔루션이 포함된 다운로드 가능한 엑셀 파일
개념 수정과 연습을 위한 수업 노트 및 과제


이러한 각 전략에 대한 모형을 생성하는 실습 수업이야말로 이 강의가 다른 강의와 차별화된 부분입니다.
여러분이 비즈니스 관리자나 경영진, 실제 비즈니스 문제에 있어 가격 책정 전략을 배우고 적용하고자 하는 학생이라면, 가장 인기 있는 가격 책정 전략과 그 실행 방법을 제시하는 이 강의가 견고한 토대가 될 것입니다.


이 강의에서는 다음의 내용을 다룹니다:
가격 책정이 매출과 수익성에 미치는 영향을 이해하는 것은 관리자들이 맞닥뜨리는 가장 중요한 문제 중 하나입니다. 이 강의에서는 기업이 목표를 달성하도록 가격 책정 전략을 결정하기 위해 분석을 어떻게 활용할지 살펴보도록 하겠습니다.
강의에 대해 간략히 소개하겠습니다.


섹션 1 - 소개
이 강의에서는 가격 책정 전략 고안과 마케팅 분석 관련 강의 구조와 단계를 살펴보겠습니다.


섹션 2 - 단계 1: 가격 책정 목표 결정하기
이 강의에서는 기업에서의 다양한 가격 책정 목표를 다룹니다.


섹션 3 - 단계 2: 수요 추정
이 강의에서는 다양한 수요 곡선을 배웁니다. 또한 엑셀을 이용해 어떻게 빨리 수요 곡선을 추정해내는지를 알아보겠습니다.


섹션 4 - 단계 3: 비용 추정
비용 곡선은 수익 극대화 문제와 가격 책정 전략 결정에 있어 중요한 역할을 합니다. 이 강의에서는 비용 함수를 추산하는 법, 보완재가 가격 책정 전략 및 마케팅 분석에 미치는 영향을 알아보겠습니다.


섹션 5 - 단계 4: 경쟁자 분석
이 강의에서는 경쟁자의 가격 책정 전략 분석과 그것이 우리의 가격 책정 전략과 마케팅 분석에 미치는 영향을 살펴봅니다.


섹션 6 - 단계 5: 가격 책정 전략 평가
수요와 비용이 있으면 여러 가격 책정 전략을 이용해 격에서의 매출과 수익을 추정할 수 있습니다. 이 강의에서는 단순 선형 가격 책정, 가격 번들링, 수량 할인, 초기 고가격 전략, 이부요율제 등 여러 가격 책정 전략을 살펴보겠습니다. 이런 가격 책정 전략들은 모두 실제로 기업들이 활용 중인 방법입니다. 특정 가격 책정 전략을 택하는 데 있어 어떤 사고와 분석이 뒷받침되는지 알아볼 예정입니다.
이 강좌의 일부 예시는 책 엑셀을 활용한 마케팅 분석 기법(Marketing Analytics: Data-Driven Techniques with Microsoft Excel [Winston, Wayne L.])에서 가져왔습니다. 마케팅 분석가가 되고자 하는 분이라면 이 책을 읽기 자료로 활용해보실 것을 권합니다. 이 책은 가격 책정 전략과 가격 분석을 이해하는 데 도움이 될 겁니다.


[ 강사 약력 ]
Abhishek 및 Pukhraj가 이 수업을 제공합니다. Global Analytics Consulting 사의 매니저로서, 저희는 기업들이 애널리틱스를 이용해 비즈니스 문제를 해결하도록 지원해왔으며, 이 강의에 마케팅과 데이터 분석의 실질적 측면을 반영하기 위해 그간의 경험을 활용했습니다.
저희는 170,000명 이상이 등록하고 다음과 같은 수천 개의 별 5개 리뷰로 가장 인기 있는 온라인 강좌의 제작자이기도 합니다.
아주 좋습니다. 주어지는 모든 설명들이 비전문가도 이해할 수 있다는 점이 마음에 듭니다 - Joshua
이 훌륭한 과정을 마련한 작성자에게 감사드립니다. 이 강의는 어떤 것과 견주어도 비교 불가능한 최고의 강의입니다. – Daisy


[ Start-Tech Academy와 소속 강사의 약속 ]
학생을 가르치는 것은 저희의 사명이라는 생각으로 저희는 이에 최선을 다하고 있습니다. 이 강의 내용이나 연습 문제, 주제에 관련된 어떤 것에 대해서라도 질문이 있다면 강의에 질문을 올리거나 직접 메시지를 보내면 됩니다. (강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 남겨주세요. 그래야 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :))


실습 파일을 다운로드하고 퀴즈를 풀며 과제를 완료하세요
각 수업마다 다양한 가격 책정 전략과 가격 분석에 대한 수업 노트가 함께 제공됩니다. 퀴즈를 통해 가격 책정 전략에 대해 얼마나 이해했는지 확인해볼 수 있습니다. 각 섹션에는 연습 과제가 포함되어 있어 가격 책정 전략, 마케팅 분석에 대해 배운 것을 실제로 적용해볼 수 있습니다.


저희는 이 강의를 통해 가격 책정 전략, 가격 책정 및 마케팅 분석과 관련된 지식과 기술을 습득할 수 있으며, 이를 즉각적으로 업무에 활용해 실질적인 이점을 얻을 수 있다고 단연 확신합니다.


가격 책정 전략 수업 강의 1편에서 뵙겠습니다.
감사합니다.


-Start-Tech Academy
target_audience: 초보부터 고급 수준까지 가격 분석을 마스터하고 싶은 사람 누구나

courses.description:
Everything you need to know abouty Marketing Automation is here.
This is a comprehensive course designed to take you from zero to confident in implementing marketing automation in a business – whether it's for a job, your clients, or your own company.
This course is perfect for:
- Professionals looking to get a job in Marketing Automation
- Marketers looking to specialize in Marketing Automation to grow in their careers

requirements: Entry level marketing

courses.description:
In the context of marketing and sales, a funnel refers to the stages that potential customers go through in the process of becoming paying customers. It is called a "funnel" because the number of potential customers typically decreases as they move through each stage, similar to how the volume of liquid decreases as it flows through a funnel.
A sales funnel is a visual representation of the customer journey from the initial contact with a business to the final purchase. It consists of several stages, which can vary depending on the specific model or framework used.
The goal of a sales funnel is to guide potential customers through these stages effectively, addressing their needs, overcoming objections, and ultimately converting them into loyal, repeat customers. By understanding the sales funnel and optimizing each stage, businesses can improve their conversion rates, increase customer retention, and drive revenue growth.
A funnel helps businesses attract and generate leads by capturing the attention of potential customers and guiding them towards the desired action, such as providing their contact information or making a purchase.
Funnel lessons are beneficial for a wide range of individuals and professionals who are involved in marketing, sales, or business development. Funnel lessons are accessible to individuals at various skill levels, from beginners to experienced professionals.
the specific steps and strategies in implementing a funnel can vary depending on your industry, target audience, and business goals. It's important to adapt the funnel approach to suit your specific circumstances and continuously refine it based on your results and customer feedback.
Learn all the details about Funnel with Dopinger, create your funnel according to your sales and marketing strategy!
Topics:
What is Funnel? How to create one?
How to Target Audience With Funnel? & Funnel Strategies
What is a Value Ladder?
What Are the Best Sales Funnel Tools?
What Is Clickfunnels? How Does It Work

courses.description:
デジタル社会が到来した現在、データの民主化というキーワードが示すように一般ビジネスパーソンも、データ分析の必要性が増してきています。一方でTableauや、ログ解析のソフトなどデータ分析のためのツールが安価で手に入る状況にあります。このような現在では、データの加工技術よりも、考察するスキル（仮説を設定するスキル）の重要性が増していくと考えております。
本講座は、難解な統計知識を使わなくとも、データ分析ができるようになり、マーケティング業務の精度向上に役立てることができることを主目的として制作しました。
Excelが苦手で、ホストコンピューターから抜き出したデータ分析に手間取っている方、インターネットで統計データを探しているが、有効な情報にたどり着けないとお悩みの方、ダウンロードしたデータの加工分析に自信がない方などを対象としています。
この講座を受講することで以下の３つの効果があります。①マーケティングや企画に役立つ統計オープンデータを活用できるようになる②基本分析方法をマスターし、定量データ分析を実践できるようになる③定量データから有効な仮説を設定することができるようになる
target_audience: マーケティングや企画業務を担っている（予定も含む）ビジネスパーソン

courses.title: Google Analytics Practice Tests - GAIQ Certification
courses.bio: Test your knowledge of Google Analytics. Prepare for Google Analytics Certification exam or Web Analytics Job Interview
courses.description:
These practice tests are for those who want to take Google Analytics Individual Qualification test and become Google Analytics certified or just test their knowledge of Google Analytics and prepare for Job Interviews.
I am constantly updating the course with new questions so make sure to come back and redo the practice tests.
About the Google Analytics IQ assessment
The Google Analytics IQ assessment is designed to test your knowledge of digital analytics best practices and the Google Analytics. Passing the assessment will provide you Google Analytics IQ certification.
This certification will show your proficiency in Google analytics and make you stand out from other candidates at your current job or future jobs.
GAIQ Exam has 70 questions and is 90 mins long. You’ll need a score of 80% to pass the assessment.
To keep your individual qualification current, you'll need to successfully pass the assessment every 12 months.
This course will cover key concepts that you are tested on and will also give a sample test that you can take to practice.  In addition to complete practice test, you will also get more questions to practice and brush up your knowledge of Google Analytics.
These practice tests  do not have any video content, these tests are designed to help your final practice before you take the actual test.
I will be adding more questions to help you keep your Google Analytics knowledge up to date.
Why you should learn from me?
I have been in Digital Marketing and Analytics for over 15 years. I have trained people from diverse backgrounds and have converted them into high performing Digital Marketers and Analysts.  I understand both the technology and marketing side of business.  I have dealt with many analytics technologies way before Google Tag manager existed and know the inner working of Digital Analytics.
In addition, I have developed various course and taught students from all over the world. I am online instructor for University of British Columbia (Canada), University of Washington (USA), Bellevue College (USA) and Digital Analytics Association.
I have an engineering degrees and an MBA.
I have several Best Sellers and Highest Rated courses on Udemy as well.
target_audience: Anybody who want to take Google Analytics Certification - GAIQ
Anybody who wants to see if they are ready for GAIQ
Anybody who wants to test their knowledge of Google Analytics
Anybody who is preparing for Digital Analytics interviews

courses.description:
HubSpot CRM and Email from Scratch - Intensive Course is an in-depth guide to mastering the HubSpot CRM and Email tools - HubSpot's most relevant features to any professional.
Whether you're a business owner, a sales or marketing professional, or anyone looking to organize contacts and communicate effectively through HubSpot, this course will take you step-by-step through HubSpot's CRM and email functionalities.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Master HubSpot CRM Basics:
Navigate and customize your HubSpot account, understanding key account settings and CRM views.
Learn how HubSpot organizes information with objects and object associations for seamless data management.
Use HubSpot default properties, including lifecycle stages, conversion, and web analytics properties, to manage and categorize your contacts effectively. You will also learn how to create your own custom properties.
Add and Manage Contacts in HubSpot:
Add individual contacts, import lists, or sync data from another CRM for efficient contact management.
Customize contact records and use HubSpot’s flexible CRM view to suit your workflow.
Use HubSpot Lists to segment contacts and create targeted groups based on specific criteria.
Capture Leads and Communicate Effectively:
Capture leads through HubSpot Forms and set up personalized marketing emails to engage with your audience.
Create 1-1 emails for sales communications and leverage the HubSpot Sales Extension for streamlined outreach.
Personalize your email communication to build stronger connections with your contacts and customers.
Implement CRM Best Practices:
Ensure data consistency and eliminate duplicate records to keep your CRM clean and effective.
Regularly manage and update contact records by removing outdated or incorrect information.
Organize your deals and tickets data, and learn lead segmentation techniques to enhance your CRM's efficiency.


I’m Thalita, a certified HubSpot expert with over 15 years in Digital Marketing, specializing in HubSpot since 2018. I’ve helped businesses and professionals worldwide leverage HubSpot CRM and email tools to achieve their goals.


Here’s what one student had to say about my courses:
"I just completed the course—and my only reaction is: WOW! Super valuable for entrepreneurs, consultants (such as myself), and small businesses. Thalita successfully managed to transfer her rich knowledge in a meticulous manner. This course is easy to comprehend and incorporate into your business strategy. Thank you so much for this course!" — Tamara Biljman, Content Strategist


Feel free to check out my website for more testimonials. I’m here to support my students and coaching clients throughout the learning journey, so don’t hesitate to reach out with questions during the course.
This course is independently developed by Thalita Milan and has not been created, endorsed, or verified by HubSpot, Inc. HubSpot, Inc. shall not be liable for any claims related to this course.

requirements: Basic Computer Skills:  Learners should be comfortable navigating and using a computer, as the courses involve online platforms, software tools, and video editing.
Internet Connection:  Access to a stable internet connection is necessary for streaming video content, participating in online discussions, and accessing course materials.
Email Address:  A valid email address is required for course communication, updates, and account creation on various platforms.

Device:  A personal computer or laptop is recommended for the optimal learning experience. While some content can be accessed on mobile devices, a larger screen facilitates certain activities like video editing.

Software:  Basic familiarity with software tools like Microsoft Office or Google Workspace is beneficial but not mandatory. Specific software requirements, such as Vyond or ConvertKit, will be covered within the course.
No Prior Marketing Knowledge Required:  The courses are designed to cater to learners with varying levels of marketing expertise, including beginners. No prior marketing knowledge is necessary.

Eagerness to Learn:  An open mind, curiosity, and a willingness to learn are the most important prerequisites. The courses cover a diverse range of topics, and a positive attitude towards acquiring new skills is key.

courses.title: Market Research: Tools for Informed Business Decisions
courses.bio: Unlock power of market research with comprehensive insights into its principles, methods, and real-world applications.
objectives: Fundamentals of Market Research: Understanding the basics of market research, including its definition, concept, and historical development.
Market Research Process: Learning about the step-by-step process involved in conducting market research, from defining information needs to report structure
Market Research Techniques: Exploring various methodologies and data sources used in market research, along with different types and applications.
Market Research Case Studies: Analyzing real-world case studies to gain practical insights into market research strategies, including company overviews
Application of Market Research: Understanding how market research is applied in different contexts, including customer segmentation, geo assessment profiling
Evaluation and Course Correction: Learning how to evaluate market research results, identify areas for course correction, and realize objectives effectively.
Data Analysis and Interpretation: Developing skills in data analysis, interpretation, and deriving actionable insights from market research findings.
Strategic Decision Making: Using market research insights to inform strategic decision-making processes within organizations, optimizing marketing strategies
Ethical Considerations: Understanding the ethical considerations and best practices involved in conducting market research and handling sensitive consumer data
Practical Application: Engaging in practical exercises, discussions, and assignments to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios

Introduction: History of Marketing Practice and Thought
The history of Marketing Thought Continue

requirements: Analytical mind – One needs to have the ability to collect and analyze information, solve problems, and make decisions. Passion to learn – To go through any course for a good amount of time one needs to be driven with a passion to pursue it so their attention is undivided and they can enjoy the learning process without losing interest. A computer with an internet connection – so one can access the course from anywhere and anytime as suited to them.
courses.description:
The course "Comprehensive Market Research" provides students with a thorough understanding of the principles, methods, and applications of market research in contemporary business environments. Through a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical case studies, students will explore the multifaceted aspects of market research, equipping them with the skills necessary to conduct effective research and derive actionable insights to support strategic decision-making. Whether aspiring marketers, business analysts, or entrepreneurs, this course offers valuable insights into the dynamic field of market research, enabling students to make informed decisions and drive business growth.
Section 1: Introduction
In this section, students will be introduced to the course and its objectives, providing an overview of the importance and role of market research in contemporary business practices.
Section 2: Market Research
This section delves into the foundational concepts of market research, including the marketing biosphere, definition, and concept. Students will explore the historical evolution of marketing practice and thought, examining its role, attributes, and various types. Data sources, methodologies, and approaches in market research will also be discussed.
Section 3: Process
Students will learn about the research process, from articulating information needs to defining research objectives, designing methodologies, and planning analysis and reporting structures. Emphasis will be placed on sampling techniques, fieldwork plans, and output matrices.
Section 4: Market Research Case Study #1
Through a detailed case study, students will apply their knowledge of market research to a real-world scenario. They will analyze a company's background, vision, mission, business verticals, and financial performance. The case study will cover strategic objectives, key observations, research strategies, and various analysis frameworks like SWOT and PESTLE.
Section 5: Market Research Case Study #2
Continuing the application of market research principles, students will engage with another comprehensive case study. They will explore the company's product portfolio, financial performance, and market segmentation strategies. The case study will include pre-research ethos, geo assessment profiling, and in-depth market analysis, culminating in evaluation and impact analysis.
Throughout the course, students will develop practical skills in conducting market research, analyzing data, and deriving actionable insights to drive strategic decision-making in business contexts.
target_audience: Marketing Professionals: Individuals working in marketing roles who want to enhance their understanding of market research methodologies, techniques, and best practices.

Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Small business owners and entrepreneurs seeking to gather insights into market trends, consumer behavior, and competitor analysis to make informed business decisions.
Market Research Analysts: Professionals involved in market research, data analysis, and market intelligence functions who wish to deepen their knowledge and skills in conducting effective research.
Students and Graduates: Undergraduate and graduate students studying marketing, business administration, or related fields who want to build a strong foundation in market research principles.
Marketing Consultants: Consultants providing advisory services to businesses on marketing strategies, branding, and market positioning, looking to expand their expertise in market research.
Sales and Product Managers: Sales professionals and product managers interested in understanding customer needs, preferences, and market dynamics to improve product development and sales strategies.

Marketing Enthusiasts: Individuals passionate about marketing who want to explore the intricacies of market research and gain practical insights into applying research findings to marketing strategies.
Professionals Transitioning into Marketing: Individuals transitioning from other fields into marketing roles who need to acquire knowledge and skills in market research to succeed in their new roles.
Freelancers and Consultants: Freelancers and independent consultants offering marketing services who seek to enhance their credibility and expertise by mastering market research techniques.

Anyone Interested in Marketing: Individuals with a general interest in marketing who want to broaden their understanding of market research principles and their applications in business decision-making.
